anzala minas-sama'i ma'an fa salat audiyatum biqadariha fahtamalas-sailu zabadar rabiya, wa mimma yuqiduna 'alaihi fin-naribtiga'a hilyatin au mata'in zabadum misluh, kazalika yadribullahul-haqqa wal-batil, fa ammaz-zabadu fa yaz-habu jufa'a, wa amma ma yanfa'un-nasa fa yamkusu fil-ard, kazalika yadribullahul-amsal
lillazinastajabu lirabbihimul-husna, wallazina lam yastajibu lahu lau anna lahum ma fil-ardi jami'aw wa mislahu ma'ahu laftadau bih, ula'ika lahum su'ul-hisabi wa ma'wahum jahannam, wa bi'sal-mihad
a fa may ya'lamu annama unzila ilaika mir rabbikal-haqqu kaman huwa a'ma, innama yatazakkaru ulul-albab
allazina yufuna bi'ahdillahi wa la yangqudunal-misaq
wallazina yasiluna ma amarallahu bihi ay yusala wa yakhsyauna rabbahum wa yakhafuna su'al-hisab
wallazina sabarubtiga'a waj-hi rabbihim wa aqamus-salata wa anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirraw wa 'alaniyataw wa yadra'una bil-hasanatis-sayyi'ata ula'ika lahum 'uqbad-dar
jannatu 'adniy yadkhulunaha wa man salaha min aba'ihim wa azwajihim wa zurriyyatihim wal-mala'ikatu yadkhuluna 'alaihim ming kulli bab
salamun 'alaikum bima sabartum fa ni'ma 'uqbad-dar
wallazina yangquduna 'ahdallahi mim ba'di misaqihi wa yaqta'una ma amarallahu bihi ay yusala wa yufsiduna fil-ardi ula'ika lahumul-la'natu wa lahum su'ud-dar
allahu yabsutur-rizqa limay yasya'u wa yaqdir, wa farihu bil-hayatid-dun-ya, wa mal-hayatud-dun-ya fil-akhirati illa mata'
wa yaqulullazina kafaru lau la unzila 'alaihi ayatum mir rabbih, qul innallaha yudillu may yasya'u wa yahdi ilaihi man anab
allazina amanu wa tatma'innu qulubuhum bizikrillah, ala bizikrillahi tatma'innul-qulub
allazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati tuba lahum wa husnu ma'ab
kazalika arsalnaka fi ummating qad khalat ming qabliha umamul litatluwa 'alaihimullazi auhaina ilaika wa hum yakfuruna bir-rahman, qul huwa rabbi la ilaha illa huw, 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi matab

walau anna qur'anan suyyirat bihil-jibalu au qutti'at bihil-ardu au kullima bihil-mauta, bal lillahil-amru jami'a, a fa lam yai'asillazina amanu al lau yasya'ullahu lahadan-nasa jami'a, wa la yazalullazina kafaru tusibuhum bima sana'u qari'atun au tahullu qaribam min darihim hatta ya'tiya wa'dullah, innallaha la yukhliful-mi'ad
wa laqadistuhzi'a birusulim ming qablika fa amlaitu lillazina kafaru summa akhaztuhum fa kaifa kana 'iqab

a fa man huwa qa'imun 'ala kulli nafsim bima kasabat, wa ja'alu lillahi syuraka', qul sammuhum, am tunabbi'unahu bima la ya'lamu fil-ardi am bizahirim minal-qaul, bal zuyyina lillazina kafaru makruhum wa suddu 'anis-sabil, wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu min had
lahum 'azabun fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa la'azabul-akhirati asyaqq, wa ma lahum minallahi miw waq
masalul-jannatillati wu'idal-muttaqun, tajri min tahtihal-an-har, ukuluha da'imuw wa zilluha, tilka 'uqballazinattaqaw wa 'uqbal-kafirinan-nar
wallazina atainahumul-kitaba yafrahuna bima unzila ilaika wa minal-ahzabi may yungkiru ba'dah, qul innama umirtu an a'budallaha wa la usyrika bih, ilaihi ad'u wa ilaihi ma'ab
wa kazalika anzalnahu hukman 'arabiyya, wa la'inittaba'ta ahwa'ahum ba'da ma ja'aka minal-'ilmi ma laka minallahi miw waliyyiw wa la waq
wa laqad arsalna rusulam ming qablika wa ja'alna lahum azwajaw wa zurriyyah, wa ma kana lirasulin ay ya'tiya bi'ayatin illa bi'iznillah, likulli ajaling kitab
yam-hullahu ma yasya'u wa yusbit, wa 'indahu ummul-kitab
wa im ma nuriyannaka ba'dallazi na'iduhum au natawaffayannaka fa innama 'alaikal-balagu wa 'alainal-hisab
a wa lam yarau anna na'til-arda nangqusuha min atrafiha, wallahu yahkumu la mu'aqqiba lihukmih, wa huwa sari'ul-hisab
wa qad makarallazina ming qablihim fa lillahil-makru jami'a, ya'lamu ma taksibu kullu nafs, wa saya'lamul-kuffaru liman 'uqbad-dar
wa yaqulullazina kafaru lasta mursala, qul kafa billahi syahidam baini wa bainakum wa man 'indahu 'ilmul-kitab
alif lam ra, kitabun anzalnahu ilaika litukhrijan-nasa minaz-zulumati ilan-nuri bi'izni rabbihim ila siratil-'azizil-hamid
allahillazi lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard, wa wailul lil-kafirina min 'azabin syadid
allazina yastahibbunal-hayatad-dun-ya 'alal-akhirati wa yasudduna 'an sabilillahi wa yabgunaha 'iwaja, ula'ika fi dalalim ba'id
wa ma arsalna mir rasulin illa bilisani qaumihi liyubayyina lahum, fa yudillullahu may yasya'u wa yahdi may yasya', wa huwal-'azizul-hakim
wa laqad arsalna musa bi'ayatina an akhrij qaumaka minaz-zulumati ilan-nuri wa zakkir-hum bi'ayyamillah, inna fi zalika la'ayatil likulli sabbarin syakur
wa iz qala musa liqaumihizkuru ni'matallahi 'alaikum iz anjakum min ali fir'auna yasumunakum su'al-'azabi wa yuzabbihuna abna'akum wa yastahyuna nisa'akum, wa fi zalikum bala'um mir rabbikum 'azim
wa iz ta'azzana rabbukum la'in syakartum la'azidannakum wa la'ing kafartum inna 'azabi lasyadid
wa qala musa in takfuru antum wa man fil-ardi jami'an fa innallaha laganiyyun hamid

a lam ya'tikum naba'ullazina ming qablikum qaumi nuhiw wa 'adiw wa samud, wallazina mim ba'dihim, la ya'lamuhum illallah, ja'at-hum rusuluhum bil-bayyinati fa raddu aidiyahum fi afwahihim wa qalu inna kafarna bima ursiltum bihi wa inna lafi syakkim mimma tad'unana ilaihi murib

qalat rusuluhum a fillahi syakkun fatiris-samawati wal-ard, yad'ukum liyagfira lakum min zunubikum wa yu'akhkhirakum ila ajalim musamma, qalu in antum illa basyarum misluna, turiduna an tasudduna 'amma kana ya'budu aba'una fa'tuna bisultanim mubin

qalat lahum rusuluhum in nahnu illa basyarum mislukum wa lakinnallaha yamunnu 'ala may yasya'u min 'ibadih, wa ma kana lana an na'tiyakum bisultanin illa bi'iznillah, wa 'alallahi falyatawakkalil-mu'minun
wa ma lana alla natawakkala 'alallahi wa qad hadana subulana, wa lanasbiranna 'ala ma azaitumuna, wa 'alallahi falyatawakkalil-mutawakkilun
wa qalallazina kafaru lirusulihim lanukhrijannakum min ardina au lata'udunna fi millatina, fa auha ilaihim rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz-zalimin
wa lanuskinannakumul-arda mim ba'dihim, zalika liman khafa maqami wa khafa wa'id
wastaftahu wa khaba kullu jabbarin 'anid
miw wara'ihi jahannamu wa yusqa mim ma'in sadid
yatajarra'uhu wa la yakadu yusiguhu wa ya'tihil-mautu ming kulli makaniw wa ma huwa bimayyit, wa miw wara'ihi 'azabun galiz
masalullazina kafaru birabbihim a'maluhum karamadinisytaddat bihir-rihu fi yaumin 'asif, la yaqdiruna mimma kasabu 'ala syai', zalika huwad-dalalul-ba'id
a lam tara annallaha khalaqas-samawati wal-arda bil-haqq, iy yasya' yuz-hibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadid
wa ma zalika 'alallahi bi'aziz

wa barazu lillahi jami'an fa qalad-du'afa'u lillazinastakbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fa hal antum mugnuna 'anna min 'azabillahi min syai', qalu lau hadanallahu lahadainakum, sawa'un 'alaina ajazi'na am sabarna ma lana mim mahis

wa qalasy-syaitanu lamma qudiyal-amru innallaha wa'adakum wa'dal-haqqi wa wa'attukum fa akhlaftukum, wa ma kana liya 'alaikum min sultanin illa an da'autukum fastajabtum li, fa la talumuni wa lumu anfusakum, ma ana bimusrikhikum wa ma antum bimusrikhiyy, inni kafartu bima asyraktumuni ming qabl, innaz-zalimina lahum 'azabun alim
wa udkhilallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtihal-an-haru khalidina fiha bi'izni rabbihim, tahiyyatuhum fiha salam
a lam tara kaifa daraballahu masalang kalimatan tayyibatang kasyajaratin tayyibatin asluha sabituw wa far'uha fis-sama'
tu'ti ukulaha kulla hinim bi'izni rabbiha, wa yadribullahul-amsala lin-nasi la'allahum yatazakkarun
wa masalu kalimatin khabisating kasyajaratin khabisatinijtussat min fauqil-ardi ma laha ming qarar
yusabbitullahullazina amanu bil-qaulis-sabiti fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa fil-akhirah, wa yudillullahuz-zalimin, wa yaf'alullahu ma yasya'
a lam tara ilallazina baddalu ni'matallahi kufraw wa ahallu qaumahum daral-bawar
jahannam, yaslaunaha, wa bi'sal-qarar
wa ja'alu lillahi andadal liyudillu 'an sabilih, qul tamatta'u fa inna masirakum ilan-nar
qul li'ibadiyallazina amanu yuqimus-salata wa yunfiqu mimma razaqnahum sirraw wa 'alaniyatam ming qabli ay ya'tiya yaumul la bai'un fihi wa la khilal
allahullazi khalaqas-samawati wal-arda wa anzala minas-sama'i ma'an fa akhraja bihi minas-samarati rizqal lakum, wa sakhkhara lakumul-fulka litajriya fil-bahri bi'amrih, wasakhkhara lakumul-an-har
wa sakhkhara lakumusy-syamsa wal-qamara da'ibain, wa sakhkhara lakumul-laila wan-nahar
wa atakum ming kulli ma sa'altumuh, wa in ta'uddu ni'matallahi la tuhsuha, innal-insana lazalumung kaffar
wa iz qala ibrahimu rabbij'al hazal-balada aminaw wajnubni wa baniyya an na'budal-asnam
rabbi innahunna adlalna kasiram minan-nas, fa man tabi'ani fa innahu minni, wa man 'asani fa innaka gafurur rahim
rabbana inni askantu min zurriyyati biwadin gairi zi zar'in 'inda baitikal-muharrami rabbana liyuqimus-salata faj'al af'idatam minan-nasi tahwi ilaihim warzuq-hum minas-samarati la'allahum yasykurun
rabbana innaka ta'lamu ma nukhfi wa ma nu'lin, wa ma yakhfa 'alallahi min syai'in fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'
al-hamdu lillahillazi wahaba li 'alal-kibari isma'ila wa is-haq, inna rabbi lasami'ud-du'a'
rabbij'alni muqimas-salati wa min zurriyyati rabbana wa taqabbal du'a'
rabbanagfir li wa liwalidayya wa lil-mu'minina yauma yaqumul-hisab
wa la tahsabannallaha gafilan 'amma ya'maluz-zalimun, innama yu'akhkhiruhum liyaumin tasykhasu fihil-absar
muhti'ina muqni'i ru'usihim la yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum, wa af'idatuhum hawa'
wa anzirin-nasa yauma ya'tihimul-'azabu fa yaqulullazina zalamu rabbana akhkhirna ila ajaling qaribin nujib da'wataka wa nattabi'ir-rusul, a wa lam takunu aqsamtum ming qablu ma lakum min zawal
wa sakantum fi masakinillazina zalamu anfusahum wa tabayyana lakum kaifa fa'alna bihim wa darabna lakumul-amsal
wa qad makaru makrahum wa 'indallahi makruhum, wa ing kana makruhum litazula min-hul-jibal
fa la tahsabannallaha mukhlifa wa'dihi rusulah, innallaha 'azizun zuntiqam
yauma tubaddalul-ardu gairal-ardi was-samawatu wa barazu lillahil-wahidil-qahhar
wa taral-mujrimina yauma'izim muqarranina fil-asfad
sarabiluhum ming qatiraniw wa tagsya wujuhahumun-nar
liyajziyallahu kulla nafsim ma kasabat, innallaha sari'ul-hisab
haza balagul lin-nasi wa liyunzaru bihi wa liya'lamu annama huwa ilahuw wahiduw wa liyazzakkara ulul-albab
alif lam ra, tilka ayatul-kitabi wa qur'anim mubin
rubama yawaddullazina kafaru lau kanu muslimin
zar-hum ya'kulu wa yatamatta'u wa yul-hihimul-amalu fa saufa ya'lamun
wa ma ahlakna ming qaryatin illa wa laha kitabum ma'lum
ma tasbiqu min ummatin ajalaha wa ma yasta'khirun
wa qalu ya ayyuhallazi nuzzila 'alaihiz-zikru innaka lamajnun
lau ma ta'tina bil-mala'ikati ing kunta minas-sadiqin
ma nunazzilul-mala'ikata illa bil-haqqi wa ma kanu izam munzarin
inna nahnu nazzalnaz-zikra wa inna lahu lahafizun
wa laqad arsalna ming qablika fi syiya'il-awwalin
wa ma ya'tihim mir rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahzi'un
kazalika naslukuhu fi qulubil-mujrimin
la yu'minuna bihi wa qad khalat sunnatul-awwalin
walau fatahna 'alaihim babam minas-sama'i fa zallu fihi ya'rujun
laqalu innama sukkirat absaruna bal nahnu qaumum mas-hurun
wa laqad ja'alna fis-sama'i burujaw wa zayyannaha lin-nazirin
wa hafiznaha ming kulli syaitanir rajim
illa manistaraqas-sam'a fa atba'ahu syihabum mubin
wal-arda madadnaha wa alqaina fiha rawasiya wa ambatna fiha ming kulli syai'im mauzun
wa ja'alna lakum fiha ma'ayisya wa mal lastum lahu biraziqin
wa im min syai'in illa 'indana khaza'inuhu wa ma nunazziluhu illa biqadarim ma'lum
wa arsalnar-riyaha lawaqiha fa anzalna minas-sama'i ma'an fa asqainakumuh, wa ma antum lahu bikhazinin
wa inna lanahnu nuhyi wa numitu wa nahnul-warisun
wa laqad 'alimnal-mustaqdimina mingkum wa laqad 'alimnal-musta'khirin
wa inna rabbaka huwa yahsyuruhum, innahu hakimun 'alim
wa laqad khalaqnal-insana min salsalim min hama'im masnun
wal-janna khalaqnahu ming qablu min naris-samum
wa iz qala rabbuka lil-mala'ikati inni khaliqum basyaram min salsalim min hama'im masnun
fa iza sawwaituhu wa nafakhtu fihi mir ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidin
fa sajadal-mala'ikatu kulluhum ajma'un
illa iblis, aba ay yakuna ma'as-sajidin
qala ya iblisu ma laka alla takuna ma'as-sajidin
qala lam akul li'asjuda libasyarin khalaqtahu min salsalim min hama'im masnun
qala fakhruj min-ha fa innaka rajim
wa inna 'alaikal-la'nata ila yaumid-din
qala rabbi fa anzirni ila yaumi yub'asun
qala fa innaka minal-munzarin
ila yaumil-waqtil-ma'lum
qala rabbi bima agwaitani la'uzayyinanna lahum fil-ardi wa la'ugwiyannahum ajma'in
illa 'ibadaka min-humul-mukhlasin
qala haza siratun 'alayya mustaqim
inna 'ibadi laisa laka 'alaihim sultanun illa manittaba'aka minal-gawin
wa inna jahannama lamau'iduhum ajma'in
laha sab'atu abwab, likulli babim min-hum juz'um maqsum
innal-muttaqina fi jannatiw wa 'uyun
udkhuluha bisalamin aminin
wa naza'na ma fi sudurihim min gillin ikhwanan 'ala sururim mutaqabilin
la yamassuhum fiha nasabuw wa ma hum min-ha bimukhrajin
nabbi' 'ibadi anni anal-gafurur-rahim
wa anna 'azabi huwal-'azabul-alim
wa nabbi'hum 'an daifi ibrahim
iz dakhalu 'alaihi fa qalu salama, qala inna mingkum wajilun
qalu la taujal inna nubasysyiruka bigulamin 'alim
qala a basysyartumuni 'ala am massaniyal-kibaru fa bima tubasysyirun
qalu basysyarnaka bil-haqqi fa la takum minal-qanitin
qala wa may yaqnatu mir rahmati rabbihi illad-dallun
qala fa ma khatbukum ayyuhal-mursalun
qalu inna ursilna ila qaumim mujrimin
illa ala lut, inna lamunajjuhum ajma'in
illamra'atahu qaddarna innaha laminal-gabirin
fa lamma ja'a ala lutinil-mursalun
qala innakum qaumum mungkarun
qalu bal ji'naka bima kanu fihi yamtarun
wa atainaka bil-haqqi wa inna lasadiqun
fa asri bi'ahlika biqit'im minal-laili wattabi' adbarahum wa la yaltafit mingkum ahaduw wamdu haisu tu'marun
wa qadaina ilaihi zalikal-amra anna dabira ha'ula'i maqtu'um musbihin
wa ja'a ahlul-madinati yastabsyirun
qala inna ha'ula'i daifi fa la tafdahun
wattaqullaha wa la tukhzun
qalu a wa lam nan-haka 'anil-'alamin
qala ha'ula'i banati ing kuntum fa'ilin
la'amruka innahum lafi sakratihim ya'mahun
fa akhazat-humus-saihatu musyriqin
fa ja'alna 'aliyaha safilaha wa amtarna 'alaihim hijaratam min sijjil
inna fi zalika la'ayatil lil-mutawassimin
wa innaha labisabilim muqim
inna fi zalika la'ayatal lil-mu'minin
wa ing kana as-habul-aikati lazalimin
fantaqamna min-hum, wa innahuma labi'imamim mubin
wa laqad kazzaba as-habul-hijril-mursalin
wa atainahum ayatina fa kanu 'an-ha mu'ridin
wa kanu yan-hituna minal-jibali buyutan aminin
fa akhazat-humus-saihatu musbihin
fa ma agna 'an-hum ma kanu yaksibun
wa ma khalaqnas-samawati wal-arda wa ma bainahuma illa bil-haqq, wa innas-sa'ata la'atiyatun fasfahis-saf-hal jamil
inna rabbaka huwal-khallaqul-'alim
wa laqad atainaka sab'am minal-masani wal-qur'anal-'azim
la tamuddanna 'ainaika ila ma matta'na bihi azwajam min-hum wa la tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janahaka lil-mu'minin
wa qul inni anan-nazirul-mubin
kama anzalna 'alal-muqtasimin
allazina ja'alul-qur'ana 'idin
fa wa rabbika lanas'alannahum ajma'in
'amma kanu ya'malun
fasda' bima tu'maru wa a'rid 'anil-musyrikin
inna kafainakal-mustahzi'in
allazina yaj'aluna ma'allahi ilahan akhar, fa saufa ya'lamun
wa laqad na'lamu annaka yadiqu sadruka bima yaqulun
fa sabbih bihamdi rabbika wa kum minas-sajidin
wa'bud rabbaka hatta ya'tiyakal-yaqin
ata amrullahi fa la tasta'jiluh, sub-hanahu wa ta'ala 'amma yusyrikun
yunazzilul-mala'ikata bir-ruhi min amrihi 'ala may yasya'u min 'ibadihi an anziru annahu la ilaha illa ana fattaqun
khalaqas-samawati wal-arda bil-haqq, ta'ala 'amma yusyrikun
khalaqal-insana min nutfatin fa iza huwa khasimum mubin
wal-an'ama khalaqaha lakum fiha dif'uw wa manafi'u wa min-ha ta'kulun
wa lakum fiha jamalun hina turihuna wa hina tasrahun
wa tahmilu asqalakum ila baladil lam takunu baligihi illa bisyiqqil-anfus, inna rabbakum lara'ufur rahim
wal-khaila wal-bigala wal-hamira litarkabuha wa zinah, wa yakhluqu ma la ta'lamun
wa 'alallahi qasdus-sabili wa min-ha ja'ir, walau sya'a lahadakum ajma'in
huwallazi anzala minas-sama'i ma'al lakum min-hu syarabuw wa min-hu syajarun fihi tusimun
yumbitu lakum bihiz-zar'a waz-zaituna wan-nakhila wal-a'naba wa ming kullis-samarat, inna fi zalika la'ayatal liqaumiy yatafakkarun
wa sakhkhara lakumul-laila wan-nahara wasy-syamsa wal-qamar, wan-nujumu musakhkharatum bi'amrih, inna fi zalika la'ayatil liqaumiy ya'qilun
wa ma zara'a lakum fil-ardi mukhtalifan alwanuh, inna fi zalika la'ayatal liqaumiy yazzakkarun
wa huwallazi sakhkharal-bahra lita'kulu min-hu lahman tariyyaw wa tastakhriju min-hu hilyatan talbasunaha, wa taral-fulka mawakhira fihi wa litabtagu min fadlihi wa la'allakum tasykurun
wa alqa fil-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wa an-haraw wa subulal la'allakum tahtadun
wa 'alamat, wa bin-najmi hum yahtadun
a fa may yakhluqu kamal la yakhluq, a fa la tazakkarun
wa in ta'uddu ni'matallahi la tuhsuha, innallaha lagafurur rahim
wallahu ya'lamu ma tusirruna wa ma tu'linun
wallazina yad'una min dunillahi la yakhluquna syai'aw wa hum yukhlaqun
amwatun gairu ahya', wa ma yasy'uruna ayyana yub'asun
ilahukum ilahuw wahid, fallazina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati qulubuhum mungkiratuw wa hum mustakbirun
la jarama annallaha ya'lamu ma yusirruna wa ma yu'linun, innahu la yuhibbul-mustakbirin
wa iza qila lahum maza anzala rabbukum qalu asatirul-awwalin
liyahmilu auzarahum kamilatay yaumal-qiyamati wa min auzarillazina yudillunahum bigairi 'ilm, ala sa'a ma yazirun
qad makarallazina ming qablihim fa atallahu bun-yanahum minal-qawa'idi fa kharra 'alaihimus-saqfu min fauqihim wa atahumul-'azabu min haisu la yasy'urun
summa yaumal-qiyamati yukhzihim wa yaqulu aina syuraka'iyallazina kuntum tusyaqquna fihim, qalallazina utul-'ilma innal-khizyal-yauma was-su'a 'alal-kafirin
allazina tatawaffahumul-mala'ikatu zalimi anfusihim fa alqawus-salama ma kunna na'malu min su', bala innallaha 'alimum bima kuntum ta'malun
fadkhulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha, fa labi'sa maswal-mutakabbirin
wa qila lillazinattaqau maza anzala rabbukum, qalu khaira, lillazina ahsanu fi hazihid-dun-ya hasanah, wa ladarul-akhirati khair, wa lani'ma darul-muttaqin
jannatu 'adniy yadkhulunaha tajri min tahtihal-an-haru lahum fiha ma yasya'un, kazalika yajzillahul-muttaqin
allazina tatawaffahumul-mala'ikatu tayyibina yaquluna salamun 'alaikumudkhulul-jannata bima kuntum ta'malun
hal yanzuruna illa an ta'tiyahumul-mala'ikatu au ya'tiya amru rabbik, kazalika fa'alallazina ming qablihim, wa ma zalamahumullahu wa laking kanu anfusahum yazlimun
fa asabahum sayyi'atu ma 'amilu wa haqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un

wa qalallazina asyraku lau sya'allahu ma 'abadna min dunihi min syai'in nahnu wa la aba'una wa la harramna min dunihi min syai', kazalika fa'alallazina ming qablihim, fa hal 'alar-rusuli illal-balagul-mubin
wa laqad ba'asna fi kulli ummatir rasulan ani'budullaha wajtanibut-tagut, fa min-hum man hadallahu wa min-hum man haqqat 'alaihid-dalalah, fa siru fil-ardi fanzuru kaifa kana 'aqibatul-mukazzibin
in tahris 'ala hudahum fa innallaha la yahdi may yudillu wa ma lahum min nasirin
wa aqsamu billahi jahda aimanihim la yab'asullahu may yamut, bala wa'dan 'alaihi haqqaw wa lakinna aksaran-nasi la ya'lamun
liyubayyina lahumullazi yakhtalifuna fihi wa liya'lamallazina kafaru annahum kanu kazibin
innama qauluna lisyai'in iza aradnahu an naqula lahu kun fa yakun
wallazina hajaru fillahi mim ba'di ma zulimu lanubawwi'annahum fid-dun-ya hasanah, wa la'ajrul-akhirati akbar, lau kanu ya'lamun
allazina sabaru wa 'ala rabbihim yatawakkalun
wa ma arsalna ming qablika illa rijalan nuhi ilaihim fas'alu ahlaz-zikri ing kuntum la ta'lamun
bil-bayyinati waz-zubur, wa anzalna ilaikaz-zikra litubayyina lin-nasi ma nuzzila ilaihim wa la'allahum yatafakkarun
a fa aminallazina makarus-sayyi'ati ay yakhsifallahu bihimul-arda au ya'tiyahumul-'azabu min haisu la yasy'urun
au ya'khuzahum fi taqallubihim fa ma hum bimu'jizin
au ya'khuzahum 'ala takhawwuf, fa inna rabbakum lara'ufur rahim
a wa lam yarau ila ma khalaqallahu min syai'iy yatafayya'u zilaluhu 'anil-yamini wasy-syama'ili sujjadal lillahi wa hum dakhirun
wa lillahi yasjudu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ardi min dabbatiw wal-mala'ikatu wa hum la yastakbirun
yakhafuna rabbahum min fauqihim wa yaf'aluna ma yu'marun
wa qalallahu la tattakhizu ilahainisnain, innama huwa ilahuw wahidun fa iyyaya far-habun
wa lahu ma fis-samawati wal-ardi wa lahud-dinu wasiba, a fa gairallahi tattaqun
wa ma bikum min ni'matin fa minallahi summa iza massakumud-durru fa ilaihi taj'arun
summa iza kasyafad-durra 'angkum iza fariqum mingkum birabbihim yusyrikun
liyakfuru bima atainahum, fa tamatta'u, fa saufa ta'lamun
wa yaj'aluna lima la ya'lamuna nasibam mimma razaqnahum, tallahi latus'alunna 'amma kuntum taftarun
wa yaj'aluna lillahil-banati sub-hanahu wa lahum ma yasytahun
wa iza busysyira ahaduhum bil-unsa zalla waj-huhu muswaddaw wa huwa kazim
yatawara minal-qaumi min su'i ma busysyira bih, a yumsikuhu 'ala hunin am yadussuhu fit-turab, ala sa'a ma yahkumun
lillazina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati masalus-sau', walillahil-masalul-a'la, wa huwal-'azizul-hakim
walau yu'akhizullahun-nasa bizulmihim ma taraka 'alaiha min dabbatiw wa lakiy yu'akhkhiruhum ila ajalim musamma, fa iza ja'a ajaluhum la yasta'khiruna sa'ataw wa la yastaqdimun
wa yaj'aluna lillahi ma yakrahuna wa tasifu alsinatuhumul-kaziba anna lahumul-husna la jarama anna lahumun-nara wa annahum mufratun
tallahi laqad arsalna ila umamim ming qablika fa zayyana lahumusy-syaitanu a'malahum fa huwa waliyyuhumul-yauma wa lahum 'azabun alim
wa ma anzalna 'alaikal-kitaba illa litubayyina lahumullazikhtalafu fihi wa hudaw wa rahmatal liqaumiy yu'minun
wallahu anzala minas-sama'i ma'an fa ahya bihil-arda ba'da mautiha, inna fi zalika la'ayatal liqaumiy yasma'un
wa inna lakum fil-an'ami la'ibrah, nusqikum mimma fi butunihi mim baini farsiw wa damil labanan khalisan sa'igal lisy-syaribin
wa min samaratin-nakhili wal-a'nabi tattakhizuna min-hu sakaraw wa rizqan hasana, inna fi zalika la'ayatal liqaumiy ya'qilun
wa auha rabbuka ilan-nahli anittakhizi minal-jibali buyutaw wa minasy-syajari wa mimma ya'risyun
summa kuli ming kullis-samarati fasluki subula rabbiki zulula, yakhruju mim butuniha syarabum mukhtalifun alwanuhu fihi syifa'ul lin-nas, inna fi zalika la'ayatal liqaumiy yatafakkarun
wallahu khalaqakum summa yatawaffakum wa mingkum may yuraddu ila arzalil-'umuri likai la ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin syai'a, innallaha 'alimung qadir
wallahu faddala ba'dakum 'ala ba'din fir-rizq, fa mallazina fuddilu biraddi rizqihim 'ala ma malakat aimanuhum fa hum fihi sawa', a fa bini'matillahi yaj-hadun
wallahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajaw wa ja'ala lakum min azwajikum banina wa hafadataw wa razaqakum minat-tayyibat, a fa bil-batili yu'minuna wa bini'matillahi hum yakfurun
wa ya'buduna min dunillahi ma la yamliku lahum rizqam minas-samawati wal-ardi syai'aw wa la yastati'un
fa la tadribu lillahil-amsal, innallaha ya'lamu wa antum la ta'lamun
daraballahu masalan 'abdam mamlukal la yaqdiru 'ala syai'iw wa mar razaqnahu minna rizqan hasanan fa huwa yunfiqu min-hu sirraw wa jahra, hal yastawun, al-hamdu lillah, bal aksaruhum la ya'lamun

wa daraballahu masalar rajulaini ahaduhuma abkamu la yaqdiru 'ala syai'iw wa huwa kallun 'ala maulah, ainama yuwajjihhu la ya'ti bikhairin hal yastawi huwa wa may ya'muru bil-'adli wa huwa 'ala siratim mustaqim
wa lillahi gaibus-samawati wal-ard, wa ma amrus-sa'ati illa kalam-hil-basari au huwa aqrab, innallaha 'ala kulli syai'ing qadir
wallahu akhrajakum mim butuni ummahatikum la ta'lamuna syai'aw wa ja'ala lakumus-sam'a wal-absara wal-af'idata la'allakum tasykurun
a lam yarau ilat-tairi musakhkharatin fi jawwis-sama', ma yumsikuhunna illallah, inna fi zalika la'ayatil liqaumiy yu'minun

wallahu ja'ala lakum mim buyutikum sakanaw wa ja'ala lakum min juludil-an'ami buyutan tastakhiffunaha yauma za'nikum wa yauma iqamatikum wa min aswafiha wa aubariha wa asy'ariha asasaw wa mata'an ila hin

wallahu ja'ala lakum mimma khalaqa zilalaw wa ja'ala lakum minal-jibali aknanaw wa ja'ala lakum sarabila taqikumul-harra wa sarabila taqikum ba'sakum, kazalika yutimmu ni'matahu 'alaikum la'allakum tuslimun
fa in tawallau fa innama 'alaikal-balagul-mubin
ya'rifuna ni'matallahi summa yungkirunaha wa aksaruhumul-kafirun
wa yauma nab'asu ming kulli ummatin syahidan summa la yu'zanu lillazina kafaru wa la hum yusta'tabun
wa iza ra'allazina zalamul-'azaba fa la yukhaffafu 'an-hum wa la hum yunzarun
wa iza ra'allazina asyraku syuraka'ahum qalu rabbana ha'ula'i syuraka'unallazina kunna nad'u min dunik, fa alqau ilaihimul-qaula innakum lakazibun
wa alqau ilallahi yauma'izinis-salama wa dalla 'an-hum ma kanu yaftarun
allazina kafaru wa saddu 'an sabilillahi zidnahum 'azaban fauqal-'azabi bima kanu yufsidun
wa yauma nab'asu fi kulli ummatin syahidan 'alaihim min anfusihim wa ji'na bika syahidan 'ala ha'ula', wa nazzalna 'alaikal-kitaba tibyanal likulli syai'iw wa hudaw wa rahmataw wa busyra lil-muslimin
innallaha ya'muru bil-'adli wal-ihsani wa ita'i zil-qurba wa yan-ha 'anil-fahsya'i wal-mungkari wal-bagyi ya'izukum la'allakum tazakkarun
wa aufu bi'ahdillahi iza 'ahattum wa la tangqudul-aimana ba'da taukidiha wa qad ja'altumullaha 'alaikum kafila, innallaha ya'lamu ma taf'alun

wa la takunu kallati naqadat gazlaha mim ba'di quwwatin angkasa, tattakhizuna aimanakum dakhalam bainakum an takuna ummatun hiya arba min ummah, innama yablukumullahu bih, wa layubayyinanna lakum yaumal-qiyamati ma kuntum fihi takhtalifun
walau sya'allahu laja'alakum ummataw wahidataw wa lakiy yudillu may yasya'u wa yahdi may yasya', wa latus'alunna 'amma kuntum ta'malun
wa la tattakhizu aimanakum dakhalam bainakum fa tazilla qadamum ba'da subutiha wa tazuqus-su'a bima sadattum 'an sabilillah, wa lakum 'azabun 'azim
wa la tasytaru bi'ahdillahi samanang qalila, innama 'indallahi huwa khairul lakum ing kuntum ta'lamun
ma 'indakum yanfadu wa ma 'indallahi baq, wa lanajziyannallazina sabaru ajrahum bi'ahsani ma kanu ya'malun
man 'amila saliham min zakarin au unsa wa huwa mu'minun fa lanuhyiyannahu hayatan tayyibah, wa lanajziyannahum ajrahum bi'ahsani ma kanu ya'malun
fa iza qara'tal-qur'ana fasta'iz billahi minasy-syaitanir-rajim
innahu laisa lahu sultanun 'alallazina amanu wa 'ala rabbihim yatawakkalun
innama sultanuhu 'alallazina yatawallaunahu wallazina hum bihi musyrikun
wa iza baddalna ayatam makana ayatiw wallahu a'lamu bima yunazzilu qalu innama anta muftar, bal aksaruhum la ya'lamun
qul nazzalahu ruhul-qudusi mir rabbika bil-haqqi liyusabbitallazina amanu wa hudaw wa busyra lil-muslimin
wa laqad na'lamu annahum yaquluna innama yu'allimuhu basyar, lisanullazi yul-hiduna ilaihi a'jamiyyuw wa haza lisanun 'arabiyyum mubin
innallazina la yu'minuna bi'ayatillahi la yahdihimullahu wa lahum 'azabun alim
innama yaftaril-kaziballazina la yu'minuna bi'ayatillah, wa ula'ika humul-kazibun
mang kafara billahi mim ba'di imanihi illa man ukriha wa qalbuhu mutma'innum bil-imani wa lakim man syaraha bil-kufri sadran fa 'alaihim gadabum minallah, wa lahum 'azabun 'azim
zalika bi'annahumustahabbul-hayatad-dun-ya 'alal-akhirati wa annallaha la yahdil-qaumal-kafirin
ula'ikallazina taba'allahu 'ala qulubihim wa sam'ihim wa absarihim, wa ula'ika humul-gafilun
la jarama annahum fil-akhirati humul-khasirun
summa inna rabbaka lillazina hajaru mim ba'di ma futinu summa jahadu wa sabaru, inna rabbaka mim ba'diha lagafurur rahim
yauma ta'ti kullu nafsin tujadilu 'an nafsiha wa tuwaffa kullu nafsim ma 'amilat wa hum la yuzlamun
wa daraballahu masalang qaryatang kanat aminatam mutma'innatay ya'tiha rizquha ragadam ming kulli makanin fa kafarat bi'an'umillahi fa azaqahallahu libasal-ju'i wal-khaufi bima kanu yasna'un
wa laqad ja'ahum rasulum min-hum fa kazzabuhu fa akhazahumul-'azabu wa hum zalimun
fa kulu mimma razaqakumullahu halalan tayyibaw wasykuru ni'matallahi ing kuntum iyyahu ta'budun
innama harrama 'alaikumul-maitata wad-dama wa lahmal-khinziri wa ma uhilla ligairillahi bih, fa manidturra gaira bagiw wa la 'adin fa innallaha gafurur rahim
wa la taqulu lima tasifu alsinatukumul-kaziba haza halaluw wa haza haramul litaftaru 'alallahil-kazib, innallazina yaftaruna 'alallahil-kaziba la yuflihun
mata'ung qaliluw wa lahum 'azabun alim
wa 'alallazina hadu harramna ma qasasna 'alaika ming qabl, wa ma zalamnahum wa laking kanu anfusahum yazlimun
summa inna rabbaka lillazina 'amilus-su'a bijahalatin summa tabu mim ba'di zalika wa aslahu inna rabbaka mim ba'diha lagafurur rahim
inna ibrahima kana ummatang qanital lillahi hanifa, wa lam yaku minal-musyrikin
syakiral li'an'umihijtabahu wa hadahu ila siratim mustaqim
wa atainahu fid-dun-ya hasanah, wa innahu fil-akhirati laminas-salihin
summa auhaina ilaika anittabi' millata ibrahima hanifa, wa ma kana minal-musyrikin
innama ju'ilas-sabtu 'alallazinakhtalafu fih, wa inna rabbaka layahkumu bainahum yaumal-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifun
ud'u ila sabili rabbika bil-hikmati wal-mau'izatil-hasanati wa jadil-hum billati hiya ahsan, inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabilihi wa huwa a'lamu bil-muhtadin
wa in 'aqabtum fa 'aqibu bimisli ma 'uqibtum bih, wa la'in sabartum lahuwa khairul lis-sabirin
wasbir wa ma sabruka illa billahi wa la tahzan 'alaihim wa la taku fi daiqim mimma yamkurun
innallaha ma'allazinattaqaw wallazina hum muhsinun
sub-hanallazi asra bi'abdihi lailam minal-masjidil-harami ilal-masjidil-aqsallazi barakna haulahu linuriyahu min ayatina, innahu huwas-sami'ul-basir
wa ataina musal-kitaba wa ja'alnahu hudal libani isra'ila alla tattakhizu min duni wakila
zurriyyata man hamalna ma'a nuh, innahu kana 'abdan syakura
wa qadaina ila bani isra'ila fil-kitabi latufsidunna fil-ardi marrataini wa lata'lunna 'uluwwang kabira
fa iza ja'a wa'du ulahuma ba'asna 'alaikum 'ibadal lana uli ba'sin syadidin fa jasu khilalad-diyar, wa kana wa'dam maf'ula
summa radadna lakumul-karrata 'alaihim wa amdadnakum bi'amwaliw wa banina wa ja'alnakum aksara nafira
in ahsantum ahsantum li'anfusikum, wa in asa'tum fa laha, fa iza ja'a wa'dul-akhirati liyasu'u wujuhakum wa liyadkhulul-masjida kama dakhaluhu awwala marratiw wa liyutabbiru ma 'alau tatbira
'asa rabbukum ay yar-hamakum, wa in 'uttum 'udna, wa ja'alna jahannama lil-kafirina hasira
inna hazal-qur'ana yahdi lillati hiya aqwamu wa yubasysyirul-mu'mininallazina ya'malunas-salihati anna lahum ajrang kabira
wa annallazina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati a'tadna lahum 'azaban alima
wa yad'ul-insanu bisy-syarri du'a'ahu bil-khair, wa kanal-insanu 'ajula

wa ja'alnal-laila wan-nahara ayataini fa mahauna ayatal-laili wa ja'alna ayatan-nahari mubsiratal litabtagu fadlam mir rabbikum wa lita'lamu 'adadas-sinina wal-hisab, wa kulla syai'in fassalnahu tafsila
wa kulla insanin alzamnahu ta'irahu fi 'unuqih, wa nukhriju lahu yaumal-qiyamati kitabay yalqahu mansyura
iqra' kitabak, kafa binafsikal-yauma 'alaika hasiba
manihtada fa innama yahtadi linafsih, wa man dalla fa innama yadillu 'alaiha, wa la taziru waziratuw wizra ukhra, wa ma kunna mu'azzibina hatta nab'asa rasula
wa iza aradna an nuhlika qaryatan amarna mutrafiha fa fasaqu fiha fa haqqa 'alaihal-qaulu fa dammarnaha tadmira
wa kam ahlakna minal-quruni mim ba'di nuh, wa kafa birabbika bizunubi 'ibadihi khabiram basira
mang kana yuridul-'ajilata 'ajjalna lahu fiha ma nasya'u liman nuridu summa ja'alna lahu jahannam, yaslaha mazmumam mad-hura
wa man aradal-akhirata wa sa'a laha sa'yaha wa huwa mu'minun fa ula'ika kana sa'yuhum masykura
kullan numiddu ha'ula'i wa ha'ula'i min 'ata'i rabbik, wa ma kana 'ata'u rabbika mahzura
unzur kaifa faddalna ba'dahum 'ala ba'd, wa lal-akhiratu akbaru darajatiw wa akbaru tafdila
la taj'al ma'allahi ilahan akhara fa taq'uda mazmumam makhzula
wa qada rabbuka alla ta'budu illa iyyahu wa bil-walidaini ihsana, imma yabluganna 'indakal-kibara ahaduhuma au kilahuma fa la taqul lahuma uffiw wa la tan-har-huma wa qul lahuma qaulang karima
wakhfid lahuma janahaz-zulli minar-rahmati wa qur rabbir-ham-huma kama rabbayani sagira
rabbukum a'lamu bima fi nufusikum, in takunu salihina fa innahu kana lil-awwabina gafura
wa ati zal-qurba haqqahu wal-miskina wabnas-sabili wa la tubazzir tabzira
innal-mubazzirina kanu ikhwanasy-syayatin, wa kanasy-syaitanu lirabbihi kafura
wa imma tu'ridanna 'an-humubtiga'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjuha fa qul lahum qaulam maisura
wa la taj'al yadaka maglulatan ila 'unuqika wa la tabsut-ha kullal-basti fa taq'uda malumam mahsura
inna rabbaka yabsutur-rizqa limay yasya'u wa yaqdir, innahu kana bi'ibadihi khabiram basira
wa la taqtulu auladakum khasy-yata imlaq, nahnu narzuquhum wa iyyakum, inna qatlahum kana khit'ang kabira
wa la taqrabuz-zina innahu kana fahisyah, wa sa'a sabila
wa la taqtulun-nafsallati harramallahu illa bil-haqq, wa mang qutila mazluman fa qad ja'alna liwaliyyihi sultanan fa la yusrif fil-qatl, innahu kana mansura
wa la taqrabu malal-yatimi illa billati hiya ahsanu hatta yabluga asyuddahu wa aufu bil-'ahdi innal-'ahda kana mas'ula
wa auful-kaila iza kiltum wazinu bil-qistasil-mustaqim, zalika khairuw wa ahsanu ta'wila
wa la taqfu ma laisa laka bihi 'ilm, innas-sam'a wal-basara wal-fu'ada kullu ula'ika kana 'an-hu mas'ula
wa la tamsyi fil-ardi maraha, innaka lan takhriqal-arda wa lan tablugal-jibala tula
kullu zalika kana sayyi'uhu 'inda rabbika makruha
zalika mimma auha ilaika rabbuka minal-hikmah, wa la taj'al ma'allahi ilahan akhara fa tulqa fi jahannama malumam mad-hura
a fa asfakum rabbukum bil-banina wattakhaza minal-mala'ikati inasa, innakum lataquluna qaulan 'azima
wa laqad sarrafna fi hazal-qur'ani liyazzakkaru, wa ma yaziduhum illa nufura
qul lau kana ma'ahu alihatung kama yaquluna izal labtagau ila zil-'arsyi sabila
sub-hanahu wa ta'ala 'amma yaquluna 'uluwwang kabira
tusabbihu lahus-samawatus-sab'u wal-ardu wa man fihinn, wa im min syai'in illa yusabbihu bihamdihi wa lakil la tafqahuna tasbihahum, innahu kana haliman gafura
wa iza qara'tal-qur'ana ja'alna bainaka wa bainallazina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati hijabam mastura
wa ja'alna 'ala qulubihim akinnatan ay yafqahuhu wa fi azanihim waqra, wa iza zakarta rabbaka fil-qur'ani wahdahu wallau 'ala adbarihim nufura
nahnu a'lamu bima yastami'una bihi iz yastami'una ilaika wa iz hum najwa iz yaquluz-zalimuna in tattabi'una illa rajulam mas-hura
unzur kaifa darabu lakal-amsala fa dallu fa la yastati'una sabila
wa qalu a iza kunna 'izamaw wa rufatan a inna lamab'usuna khalqan jadida
qul kunu hijaratan au hadida
au khalqam mimma yakburu fi sudurikum, fa sayaquluna may yu'iduna, qulillazi fatarakum awwala marrah, fa sayun-giduna ilaika ru'usahum wa yaquluna mata huw, qul 'asa ay yakuna qariba
yauma yad'ukum fa tastajibuna bihamdihi wa tazunnuna il labistum illa qalila
wa qul li'ibadi yaqulullati hiya ahsan, innasy-syaitana yanzagu bainahum, innasy-syaitana kana lil-insani 'aduwwam mubina
rabbukum a'lamu bikum iy yasya' yar-hamkum au iy yasya' yu'azzibkum, wa ma arsalnaka 'alaihim wakila
wa rabbuka a'lamu biman fis-samawati wal-ard, wa laqad faddalna ba'dan-nabiyyina 'ala ba'diw wa ataina dawuda zabura
qulid'ullazina za'amtum min dunihi fa la yamlikuna kasyfad-durri 'angkum wa la tahwila
ula'ikallazina yad'una yabtaguna ila rabbihimul-wasilata ayyuhum aqrabu wa yarjuna rahmatahu wa yakhafuna 'azabah, inna 'azaba rabbika kana mahzura
wa im ming qaryatin illa nahnu muhlikuha qabla yaumil-qiyamati au mu'azzibuha 'azaban syadida, kana zalika fil-kitabi mastura
wa ma mana'ana an nursila bil-ayati illa ang kazzaba bihal-awwalun, wa ataina samudan-naqata mubsiratan fa zalamu biha, wa ma nursilu bil-ayati illa takhwifa
wa iz qulna laka inna rabbaka ahata bin-nas, wa ma ja'alnar-ru'yallati arainaka illa fitnatal lin-nasi wasy-syajaratal-mal'unata fil-qur'an, wa nukhawwifuhum fa ma yaziduhum illa tugyanang kabira
wa iz qulna lil-mala'ikatisjudu li'adama fa sajadu illa iblis, qala a asjudu liman khalaqta tina
qala a ra'aitaka hazallazi karramta 'alayya la'in akhkhartani ila yaumil-qiyamati la'ahtanikanna zurriyyatahu illa qalila
qalaz-hab fa man tabi'aka min-hum fa inna jahannama jaza'ukum jaza'am maufura
wastafziz manistata'ta min-hum bisautika wa ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika wa rajilika wa syarik-hum fil-amwali wal-auladi wa 'id-hum, wa ma ya'iduhumusy-syaitanu illa gurura
inna 'ibadi laisa laka 'alaihim sultan, wa kafa birabbika wakila
rabbukumullazi yuzji lakumul-fulka fil-bahri litabtagu min fadlih, innahu kana bikum rahima
wa iza massakumud-durru fil-bahri dalla man tad'una illa iyyah, fa lamma najjakum ilal-barri a'radtum, wa kanal-insanu kafura
a fa amintum ay yakhsifa bikum janibal-barri au yursila 'alaikum hasiban summa la tajidu lakum wakila
am amintum ay yu'idakum fihi taratan ukhra fa yursila 'alaikum qasifam minar-rihi fa yugriqakum bima kafartum summa la tajidu lakum 'alaina bihi tabi'a
wa laqad karramna bani adama wa hamalnahum fil-barri wal-bahri wa razaqnahum minat-tayyibati wa faddalnahum 'ala kasirim mim man khalaqna tafdila
yauma nad'u kulla unasim bi'imamihim, fa man utiya kitabahu biyaminihi fa ula'ika yaqra'una kitabahum wa la yuzlamuna fatila
wa mang kana fi hazihi a'ma fa huwa fil-akhirati a'ma wa adallu sabila
wa ing kadu layaftinunaka 'anillazi auhaina ilaika litaftariya 'alaina gairahu wa izal lattakhazuka khalila
walau la an sabbatnaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim syai'ang qalila
izal la'azaqnaka di'fal-hayati wa di'fal-mamati summa la tajidu laka 'alaina nasira
wa ing kadu layastafizzunaka minal-ardi liyukhrijuka min-ha wa izal la yalbasuna khilafaka illa qalila
sunnata mang qad arsalna qablaka mir rusulina wa la tajidu lisunnatina tahwila
aqimis-salata lidulukisy-syamsi ila gasaqil-laili wa qur'anal-fajr, inna qur'anal-fajri kana masy-huda
wa minal-laili fa tahajjad bihi nafilatal laka 'asa ay yab'asaka rabbuka maqamam mahmuda
wa qur rabbi adkhilni mudkhala sidqiw wa akhrijni mukhraja sidqiw waj'al li mil ladungka sultanan nasira
wa qul ja'al-haqqu wa zahaqal-batilu innal-batila kana zahuqa
wa nunazzilu minal-qur'ani ma huwa syifa'uw wa rahmatul lil-mu'minina wa la yaziduz-zalimina illa khasara
wa iza an'amna 'alal-insani a'rada wa na'a bijanibih, wa iza massahusy-syarru kana ya'usa
qul kulluy ya'malu 'ala syakilatih, fa rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahda sabila
wa yas'alunaka 'anir-ruh, qulir-ruhu min amri rabbi wa ma utitum minal-'ilmi illa qalila
wa la'in syi'na lanaz-habanna billazi auhaina ilaika summa la tajidu laka bihi 'alaina wakila
illa rahmatam mir rabbik, inna fadlahu kana 'alaika kabira
qul la'inijtama'atil-insu wal-jinnu 'ala ay ya'tu bimisli hazal-qur'ani la ya'tuna bimislihi walau kana ba'duhum liba'din zahira
wa laqad sarrafna lin-nasi fi hazal-qur'ani ming kulli masalin fa aba aksarun-nasi illa kufura
wa qalu lan nu'mina laka hatta tafjura lana minal-ardi yambu'a
au takuna laka jannatum min nakhiliw wa 'inabin fa tufajjiral-an-hara khilalaha tafjira
au tusqitas-sama'a kama za'amta 'alaina kisafan au ta'tiya billahi wal-mala'ikati qabila
au yakuna laka baitum min zukhrufin au tarqa fis-sama', wa lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alaina kitaban naqra'uh, qul sub-hana rabbi hal kuntu illa basyarar rasula
wa ma mana'an-nasa ay yu'minu iz ja'ahumul-huda illa ang qalu a ba'asallahu basyarar rasula
qul lau kana fil-ardi mala'ikatuy yamsyuna mutma'innina lanazzalna 'alaihim minas-sama'i malakar rasula
qul kafa billahi syahidam baini wa bainakum, innahu kana bi'ibadihi khabiram basira

wa may yahdillahu fa huwal-muhtad, wa may yudlil fa lan tajida lahum auliya'a min dunih, wa nahsyuruhum yaumal-qiyamati 'ala wujuhihim 'umyaw wa bukmaw wa summa, ma'wahum jahannam, kullama khabat zidnahum sa'ira
zalika jaza'uhum bi'annahum kafaru bi'ayatina wa qalu a iza kunna 'izamaw wa rufatan a inna lamab'usuna khalqan jadida
a wa lam yarau annallahallazi khalaqas-samawati wal-arda qadirun 'ala ay yakhluqa mislahum wa ja'ala lahum ajalal la raiba fih, fa abaz-zalimuna illa kufura
qul lau antum tamlikuna khaza'ina rahmati rabbi izal la'amsaktum khasy-yatal-infaq, wa kanal-insanu qatura
wa laqad ataina musa tis'a ayatim bayyinatin fas'al bani isra'ila iz ja'ahum fa qala lahu fir'aunu inni la'azunnuka ya musa mas-hura
qala laqad 'alimta ma anzala ha'ula'i illa rabbus-samawati wal-ardi basa'ir, wa inni la'azunnuka ya fir'aunu masbura
fa arada ay yastafizzahum minal-ardi fa agraqnahu wa mam ma'ahu jami'a
wa qulna mim ba'dihi libani isra'ilaskunul-arda fa iza ja'a wa'dul-akhirati ji'na bikum lafifa
wa bil-haqqi anzalnahu wa bil-haqqi nazal, wa ma arsalnaka illa mubasysyiraw wa nazira
wa qur'anan faraqnahu litaqra'ahu 'alan-nasi 'ala muksiw wa nazzalnahu tanzila
qul aminu bihi au la tu'minu, innallazina utul-'ilma ming qablihi iza yutla 'alaihim yakhirruna lil-azqani sujjada
wa yaquluna sub-hana rabbina ing kana wa'du rabbina lamaf'ula
wa yakhirruna lil-azqani yabkuna wa yaziduhum khusyu'a
qulid'ullaha awid'ur-rahman, ayyam ma tad'u fa lahul-asma'ul-husna, wa la taj-har bisalatika wa la tukhafit biha wabtagi baina zalika sabila
wa qulil-hamdu lillahillazi lam yattakhiz waladaw wa lam yakul lahu syarikun fil-mulki wa lam yakul lahu waliyyum minaz-zulli wa kabbir-hu takbira
al-hamdu lillahillazi anzala 'ala 'abdihil-kitaba wa lam yaj'al lahu 'iwaja
qayyimal liyunzira ba'san syadidam mil ladun-hu wa yubasysyiral-mu'mininallazina ya'malunas-salihati anna lahum ajran hasana
makisina fihi abada
wa yunzirallazina qaluttakhazallahu walada
ma lahum bihi min 'ilmiw wa la li'aba'ihim, kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim, iy yaquluna illa kaziba
fa la'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka 'ala asarihim il lam yu'minu bihazal-hadisi asafa
inna ja'alna ma 'alal-ardi zinatal laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amala
wa inna laja'iluna ma 'alaiha sa'idan juruza
am hasibta anna as-habal-kahfi war-raqimi kanu min ayatina 'ajaba
iz awal-fityatu ilal-kahfi fa qalu rabbana atina mil ladungka rahmataw wa hayyi' lana min amrina rasyada
fa darabna 'ala azanihim fil-kahfi sinina 'adada
summa ba'asnahum lina'lama ayyul-hizbaini ahsa lima labisu amada
nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba'ahum bil-haqq, innahum fityatun amanu birabbihim wa zidnahum huda
wa rabatna 'ala qulubihim iz qamu fa qalu rabbuna rabbus-samawati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dunihi ilahal laqad qulna izan syatata
ha'ula'i qaumunattakhazu min dunihi alihah, lau la ya'tuna 'alaihim bisultanim bayyin, fa man azlamu mim maniftara 'alallahi kaziba
wa izi'tazaltumuhum wa ma ya'buduna illallaha fa'wu ilal-kahfi yansyur lakum rabbukum mir rahmatihi wa yuhayyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa

wa tarasy-syamsa iza tala'at tazawaru 'ang kahfihim zatal-yamini wa iza garabat taqriduhum zatasy-syimali wa hum fi fajwatim min-h, zalika min ayatillah, may yahdillahu fa huwal-muhtadi wa may yudlil fa lan tajida lahu waliyyam mursyida

wa tahsabuhum aiqazaw wa hum ruquduw wa nuqallibuhum zatal-yamini wa zatasy-syimali wa kalbuhum basitun zira'aihi bil-wasid, lawittala'ta 'alaihim lawallaita min-hum firaraw wa lamuli'ta min-hum ru'ba

wa kazalika ba'asnahum liyatasa'alu bainahum, qala qa'ilum min-hum kam labistum, qalu labisna yauman au ba'da yaum, qalu rabbukum a'lamu bima labistum, fab'asu ahadakum biwariqikum hazihi ilal-madinati falyanzur ayyuha azka ta'aman falya'tikum birizqim min-hu walyatalattaf wa la yusy'iranna bikum ahada
innahum iy yaz-haru 'alaikum yarjumukum au yu'idukum fi millatihim wa lan tuflihu izan abada

wa kazalika a'sarna 'alaihim liya'lamu anna wa'dallahi haqquw wa annas-sa'ata la raiba fiha, iz yatanaza'una bainahum amrahum fa qalubnu 'alaihim bun-yana, rabbuhum a'lamu bihim, qalallazina galabu 'ala amrihim lanattakhizanna 'alaihim masjida

sayaquluna salasatur rabi'uhum kalbuhum, wa yaquluna khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bil-gaib, wa yaquluna sab'atuw wa saminuhum kalbuhum, qur rabbi a'lamu bi'iddatihim ma ya'lamuhum illa qalil, fa la tumari fihim illa mira'an zahiraw wa la tastafti fihim min-hum ahada
wa la taqulanna lisyai'in inni fa'ilun zalika gada
illa ay yasya'allahu wazkur rabbaka iza nasita wa qul 'asa ay yahdiyani rabbi li'aqraba min haza rasyada
wa labisu fi kahfihim salasa mi'atin sinina wazdadu tis'a
qulillahu a'lamu bima labisu, lahu gaibus-samawati wal-ard, absir bihi wa asmi', ma lahum min dunihi miw waliyy, wa la yusyriku fi hukmihi ahada
watlu ma uhiya ilaika ming kitabi rabbik, la mubaddila likalimatih, wa lan tajida min dunihi multahada

wasbir nafsaka ma'allazina yad'una rabbahum bil-gadati wal-'asyiyyi yuriduna waj-hahu wa la ta'du 'ainaka 'an-hum, turidu zinatal-hayatid-dun-ya, wa la tuti' man agfalna qalbahu 'an zikrina wattaba'a hawahu wa kana amruhu furuta

wa qulil-haqqu mir rabbikum, fa man sya'a falyu'miw wa man sya'a falyakfur, inna a'tadna liz-zalimina naran ahata bihim suradiquha, wa iy yastagisu yugasu bima'ing kal-muhli yasywil-wujuh, bi'sasy-syarab, wa sa'at murtafaqa
innallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati inna la nudi'u ajra man ahsana 'amala

ula'ika lahum jannatu 'adnin tajri min tahtihimul-an-haru yuhallauna fiha min asawira min zahabiw wa yalbasuna siyaban khudram min sundusiw wa istabraqim muttaki'ina fiha 'alal-ara'ik, ni'mas-sawab, wa hasunat murtafaqa
wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alna li'ahadihima jannataini min a'nabiw wa hafafnahuma binakhliw wa ja'alna bainahuma zar'a
kiltal-jannataini atat ukulaha wa lam tazlim min-hu syai'aw wa fajjarna khilalahuma nahara
wa kana lahu samar, fa qala lisahibihi wa huwa yuhawiruhu ana aksaru mingka malaw wa a'azzu nafara
wa dakhala jannatahu wa huwa zalimul linafsih, qala ma azunnu an tabida hazihi abada
wa ma azunnus-sa'ata qa'imataw wa la'ir rudittu ila rabbi la'ajidanna khairam min-ha mungqalaba
qala lahu sahibuhu wa huwa yuhawiruhu a kafarta billazi khalaqaka min turabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaka rajula
lakinna huwallahu rabbi wa la usyriku birabbi ahada
walau la iz dakhalta jannataka qulta ma sya'allahu la quwwata illa billah, in tarani ana aqalla mingka malaw wa walada
fa asa rabbi ay yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika wa yursila 'alaiha husbanam minas-sama'i fa tusbiha sa'idan zalaqa
au yusbiha ma'uha gauran fa lan tastati'a lahu talaba
wa uhita bisamarihi fa asbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'ala ma anfaqa fiha wa hiya khawiyatun 'ala 'urusyiha wa yaqulu ya laitani lam usyrik birabbi ahada
wa lam takul lahu fi'atuy yansurunahu min dunillahi wa ma kana muntasira
hunalikal-walayatu lillahil-haqq, huwa khairun sawabaw wa khairun 'uqba
wadrib lahum masalal-hayatid-dun-ya kama'in anzalnahu minas-sama'i fakhtalata bihi nabatul-ardi fa asbaha hasyiman tazruhur-riyah, wa kanallahu 'ala kulli syai'im muqtadira
al-malu wal-banuna zinatul-hayatid-dun-ya, wal-baqiyatus-salihatu khairun 'inda rabbika sawabaw wa khairun amala
wa yauma nusayyirul-jibala wa taral-arda barizataw wa hasyarnahum fa lam nugadir min-hum ahada
wa 'uridu 'ala rabbika saffa, laqad ji'tumuna kama khalaqnakum awwala marratim bal za'amtum allan naj'ala lakum mau'ida

wa wudi'al kitabu fa taral-mujrimina musyfiqina mimma fihi wa yaquluna ya wailatana mali hazal-kitabi la yugadiru sagirataw wa la kabiratan illa ahsaha, wa wajadu ma 'amilu hadira, wa la yazlimu rabbuka ahada

wa iz qulna lil-mala'ikatisjudu li'adama fa sajadu illa iblis, kana minal-jinni fa fasaqa 'an amri rabbih, a fa tattakhizunahu wa zurriyyatahu auliya'a min duni wa hum lakum 'aduww, bi'sa liz-zalimina badala
ma asy-hattuhum khalqas-samawati wal-ardi wa la khalqa anfusihim wa ma kuntu muttakhizal-mudillina 'aduda
wa yauma yaqulu nadu syuraka'iyallazina za'amtum fa da'auhum fa lam yastajibu lahum wa ja'alna bainahum maubiqa
wa ra'al-mujrimunan-nara fa zannu annahum muwaqi'uha wa lam yajidu 'an-ha masrifa
wa laqad sarrafna fi hazal-qur'ani lin-nasi ming kulli masal, wa kanal-insanu aksara syai'in jadala
wa ma mana'an-nasa ay yu'minu iz ja'ahumul-huda wa yastagfiru rabbahum illa an ta'tiyahum sunnatul-awwalina au ya'tiyahumul-'azabu qubula
wa ma nursilul-mursalina illa mubasysyirina wa munzirin, wa yujadilullazina kafaru bil-batili liyud-hidu bihil-haqqa wattakhazu ayati wa ma unziru huzuwa

wa man azlamu mim man zukkira bi'ayati rabbihi fa a'rada 'an-ha wa nasiya ma qaddamat yadah, inna ja'alna 'ala qulubihim akinnatan ay yafqahuhu wa fi azanihim waqra, wa in tad'uhum ilal-huda fa lay yahtadu izan abada
wa rabbukal-gafuru zur-rahmah, lau yu'akhizuhum bima kasabu la'ajjala lahumul-'azab, bal lahum mau'idul lay yajidu min dunihi mau'ila
wa tilkal-qura ahlaknahum lamma zalamu wa ja'alna limahlikihim mau'ida
wa iz qala musa lifatahu la abrahu hatta abluga majma'al-bahraini au amdiya huquba
fa lamma balaga majma'a bainihima nasiya hutahuma fattakhaza sabilahu fil-bahri saraba
fa lamma jawaza qala lifatahu atina gada'ana laqad laqina min safarina haza nasaba
qala a ra'aita iz awaina ilas-sakhrati fa inni nasitul-huta wa ma ansanihu illasy-syaitanu an azkurah, wattakhaza sabilahu fil-bahri 'ajaba
qala zalika ma kunna nabgi fartadda 'ala asarihima qasasa
fa wajada 'abdam min 'ibadina atainahu rahmatam min 'indina wa 'allamnahu mil ladunna 'ilma
qala lahu musa hal attabi'uka 'ala an tu'allimani mimma 'ullimta rusyda
qala innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabra
wa kaifa tasbiru 'ala ma lam tuhit bihi khubra
qala satajiduni in sya'allahu sabiraw wa la a'si laka amra
qala fa inittaba'tani fa la tas'alni 'an syai'in hatta uhdisa laka min-hu zikra
fantalaqa, hatta iza rakiba fis-safinati kharaqaha, qala a kharaqtaha litugriqa ahlaha, laqad ji'ta syai'an imra
qala a lam aqul innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabra
qala la tu'akhizni bima nasitu wa la tur-hiqni min amri 'usra
fantalaqa, hatta iza laqiya gulaman fa qatalahu qala a qatalta nafsan zakiyyatam bigairi nafs, laqad ji'ta syai'an nukra
qala a lam aqul laka innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabra
qala in sa'altuka 'an syai'im ba'daha fa la tusahibni, qad balagta mil ladunni 'uzra
fantalaqa, hatta iza ataya ahla qaryatinistat'ama ahlaha fa abau ay yudayyifuhuma fa wajada fiha jidaray yuridu ay yangqadda fa aqamah, qala lau syi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajra
qala haza firaqu baini wa bainik, sa'unabbi'uka bita'wili ma lam tastati' 'alaihi sabra
ammas-safinatu fa kanat limasakina ya'maluna fil-bahri fa arattu an a'ibaha, wa kana wara'ahum malikuy ya'khuzu kulla safinatin gasba
wa ammal-gulamu fa kana abawahu mu'minaini fa khasyina ay yur-hiqahuma tugyanaw wa kufra
fa aradna ay yubdilahuma rabbuhuma khairam min-hu zakataw wa aqraba ruhma

wa ammal-jidaru fa kana ligulamaini yatimaini fil-madinati wa kana tahtahu kanzul lahuma wa kana abuhuma saliha, fa arada rabbuka ay yabluga asyuddahuma wa yastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatam mir rabbik, wa ma fa'altuhu 'an amri, zalika ta'wilu ma lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra
wa yas'alunaka 'an zil-qarnain, qul sa'atlu 'alaikum min-hu zikra
inna makkanna lahu fil-ardi wa atainahu ming kulli syai'in sababa
fa atba'a sababa
hatta iza balaga magribasy-syamsi wajadaha tagrubu fi 'ainin hami'atiw wa wajada 'indaha qauma, qulna ya zal-qarnaini imma an tu'azziba wa imma an tattakhiza fihim husna
qala amma man zalama fa saufa nu'azzibuhu summa yuraddu ila rabbihi fa yu'azzibuhu 'azaban nukra
wa amma man amana wa 'amila salihan fa lahu jaza'anil-husna, wa sanaqulu lahu min amrina yusra
summa atba'a sababa
hatta iza balaga matli'asy-syamsi wajadaha tatlu'u 'ala qaumil lam naj'al lahum min duniha sitra
kazalik, wa qad ahatna bima ladaihi khubra
summa atba'a sababa
hatta iza balaga bainas-saddaini wajada min dunihima qaumal la yakaduna yafqahuna qaula
qalu ya zal-qarnaini inna ya'juja wa ma'juja mufsiduna fil-ardi fa hal naj'alu laka kharjan 'ala an taj'ala bainana wa bainahum sadda
qala ma makkanni fihi rabbi khairun fa a'inuni biquwwatin aj'al bainakum wa bainahum radma
atuni zubaral-hadid, hatta iza sawa bainas-sadafaini qalanfukhu, hatta iza ja'alahu narang qala atuni ufrig 'alaihi qitra
fa masta'u ay yaz-haruhu wa mastata'u lahu naqba
qala haza rahmatum mir rabbi, fa iza ja'a wa'du rabbi ja'alahu dakka', wa kana wa'du rabbi haqqa
wa tarakna ba'dahum yauma'iziy yamuju fi ba'diw wa nufikha fis-suri fa jama'nahum jam'a
wa 'aradna jahannama yauma'izil lil-kafirina 'arda
allazina kanat a'yunuhum fi gita'in 'an zikri wa kanu la yastati'una sam'a
a fa hasiballazina kafaru ay yattakhizu 'ibadi min duni auliya', inna a'tadna jahannama lil-kafirina nuzula
qul hal nunabbi'ukum bil-akhsarina a'mala
allazina dalla sa'yuhum fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa hum yahsabuna annahum yuhsinuna sun'a
ula'ikallazina kafaru bi'ayati rabbihim wa liqa'ihi fa habitat a'maluhum fa la nuqimu lahum yaumal-qiyamati wazna
zalika jaza'uhum jahannamu bima kafaru wattakhazu ayati wa rusuli huzuwa
innallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati kanat lahum jannatul-firdausi nuzula
khalidina fiha la yabguna 'an-ha hiwala
qul lau kanal-bahru midadal likalimati rabbi lanafidal-bahru qabla an tanfada kalimatu rabbi walau ji'na bimislihi madada
qul innama ana basyarum mislukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahuw wahid, fa mang kana yarju liqa'a rabbihi falya'mal 'amalan salihaw wa la yusyrik bi'ibadati rabbihi ahada
k&f ha ya 'ain s&d
zikru rahmati rabbika 'abdahu zakariyya
iz nada rabbahu nid&'an khafiyya
qala rabbi inni wahanal-'azmu minni wasyta'alar-ra'su syaibaw wa lam akum bidu'&'ika rabbi syaqiyya
wa inni khiftul-mawaliya miw war&'i wa kanatimra'ati 'aqiran fa hab li mil ladungka waliyya
yarisuni wa yarisu min ali ya'quba waj'al-hu rabbi radiyya
ya zakariyy& inna nubasysyiruka bigulaminismuhu yahya lam naj'al lahu ming qablu samiyya
qala rabbi anna yakunu li gulamuw wa kanatimra'ati 'aqiraw wa qad balagtu minal-kibari 'itiyya
qala kazalik, qala rabbuka huwa 'alayya hayyinuw wa qad khalaqtuka ming qablu wa lam taku syai'a
qala rabbij'al li ayah, qala ayatuka alla tukalliman-nasa salasa layalin sawiyya
fa kharaja 'ala qaumihi minal-mihrabi fa auh& ilaihim an sabbihu bukrataw wa 'asyiyya
ya yahya khuzil-kitaba biquwwah, wa atainahul-hukma sabiyya
wa hananam mil ladunna wa zakah, wa kana taqiyya
wa barram biwalidaihi wa lam yakun jabbaran 'asiyya
wa salamun 'alaihi yauma wulida wa yauma yamutu wa yauma yub'asu hayya
wazkur fil-kitabi maryam, izintabazat min ahliha makanan syarqiyya
fattakhazat min dunihim hijaba, fa arsaln& ilaiha ruhana fa tamassala laha basyaran sawiyya
qalat inni a'uzu bir-rahmani mingka ing kunta taqiyya
qala innam& ana rasulu rabbiki li'ahaba laki gulaman zakiyya
qalat anna yakunu li gulamuw wa lam yamsasni basyaruw wa lam aku bagiyya
qala kazalik, qala rabbuki huwa 'alayya hayyin, wa linaj'alahu ayatal lin-nasi wa rahmatam minna, wa kana amram maqdiyya
fa hamalat-hu fantabazat bihi makanang qasiyya
fa aj&'ahal-makhadu ila jiz'in-nakhlah, qalat ya laitani mittu qabla haza wa kuntu nas-yam mansiyya
fa nadaha min tahtih& alla tahzani qad ja'ala rabbuki tahtaki sariyya
wa huzzi ilaiki bijiz'in-nakhlati tusaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyya
fa kuli wasyrabi wa qarri 'aina, fa imma tarayinna minal-basyari ahadan fa quli inni nazartu lir-rahmani sauman fa lan ukallimal-yauma insiyya
fa atat bihi qaumaha tahmiluh, qalu ya maryamu laqad ji'ti syai'an fariyya
y& ukhta haruna ma kana abukimra'a sau'iw wa ma kanat ummuki bagiyya
fa asyarat ilaih, qalu kaifa nukallimu mang kana fil-mahdi sabiyya
qala inni 'abdullah, ataniyal-kitaba wa ja'alani nabiyya
wa ja'alani mubarakan aina ma kuntu wa ausani bis-salati waz-zakati ma dumtu hayya
wa barram biwalidati wa lam yaj'alni jabbaran syaqiyya
was-salamu 'alayya yauma wulittu wa yauma amutu wa yauma ub'asu hayya
zalika 'isabnu maryam, qaulal-haqqillazi fihi yamtarun
ma kana lillahi ay yattakhiza miw waladin sub-hanah, iza qad& amran fa innama yaqulu lahu kun fa yakun
wa innallaha rabbi wa rabbukum fa'buduh, haza siratum mustaqim
fakhtalafal-ahzabu mim bainihim, fa wailul lillazina kafaru mim masy-hadi yaumin 'azim
asmi' bihim wa absir yauma ya'tunana lakiniz-zalimunal-yauma fi dalalim mubin
wa anzir-hum yaumal-hasrati iz qudiyal-amr, wa hum fi gaflatiw wa hum la yu'minun
inna nahnu narisul-arda wa man 'alaiha wa ilaina yurja'un
wazkur fil-kitabi ibrahim, innahu kana siddiqan nabiyya
iz qala li'abihi y& abati lima ta'budu ma la yasma'u wa la yubsiru wa la yugni 'angka syai'a
y& abati inni qad j&'ani minal-'ilmi ma lam ya'tika fattabi'ni ahdika siratan sawiyya
y& abati la ta'budisy-syaitan, innasy-syaitana kana lir-rahmani 'asiyya
y& abati inni akhafu ay yamassaka 'azabum minar-rahmani fa takuna lisy-syaitani waliyya
qala a ragibun anta 'an alihati y& ibrahim, la'il lam tantahi la'arjumannaka wahjurni maliyya
qala salamun 'alaik, sa'astagfiru laka rabbi, innahu kana bi hafiyya
wa a'tazilukum wa ma tad'una min dunillahi wa ad'u rabbi 'as& all& akuna bidu'&'i rabbi syaqiyya
fa lamma'tazalahum wa ma ya'buduna min dunillahi wahabna lahu is-haqa wa ya'qub, wa kullan ja'alna nabiyya
wa wahabna lahum mir rahmatina wa ja'alna lahum lisana sidqin 'aliyya
wazkur fil-kitabi mus& innahu kana mukhlasaw wa kana rasulan nabiyya
wa nadainahu min janibit-turil-aimani wa qarrabnahu najiyya
wa wahabna lahu mir rahmatin& akhahu haruna nabiyya
wazkur fil-kitabi isma'ila innahu kana sadiqal-wa'di wa kana rasulan nabiyya
wa kana ya'muru ahlahu bis-salati waz-zakati wa kana 'inda rabbihi mardiyya
wazkur fil-kitabi idrisa innahu kana siddiqan nabiyya
wa rafa'nahu makanan 'aliyya

ul&'ikallazina an'amallahu 'alaihim minan-nabiyyina min zurriyyati adama wa mim man hamalna ma'a nuhiw wa min zurriyyati ibrahima wa isr&'ila wa mim man hadaina wajtabaina, iza tutla 'alaihim ayatur-rahmani kharru sujjadaw wa bukiyya
fa khalafa mim ba'dihim khalfun ada'us-salata wattaba'usy-syahawati fa saufa yalqauna gayya
illa man taba wa amana wa 'amila salihan fa ul&'ika yadkhulunal-jannata wa la yuzlamuna syai'a
jannati 'adninillati wa'adar-rahmanu 'ibadahu bil-gaib, innahu kana wa'duhu ma'tiyya
la yasma'una fiha lagwan illa salama, wa lahum rizquhum fiha bukrataw wa 'asyiyya
tilkal-jannatullati nurisu min 'ibadina mang kana taqiyya
wa ma natanazzalu illa bi'amri rabbik, lahu ma baina aidina wa ma khalfana wa ma baina zalika wa ma kana rabbuka nasiyya
rabbus-samawati wal-ardi wa ma bainahuma fa'bud-hu wastabir li'ibadatih, hal ta'lamu lahu samiyya
wa yaqulul-insanu a iza ma mittu lasaufa ukhraju hayya
a wa la yazkurul-insanu anna khalaqnahu ming qablu wa lam yaku syai'a
fa wa rabbika lanahsyurannahum wasy-syayatina summa lanuhdirannahum haula jahannama jisiyya
summa lananzi'anna ming kulli syi'atin ayyuhum asyaddu 'alar-rahmani 'itiyya
summa lanahnu a'lamu billazina hum aula biha siliyya
wa im mingkum illa wariduha, kana 'ala rabbika hatmam maqdiyya
summa nunajjillazinattaqaw wa nazaruz-zalimina fiha jisiyya
wa iza tutla 'alaihim ayatuna bayyinating qalallazina kafaru lillazina amanu ayyul-fariqaini khairum maqamaw wa ahsanu nadiyya
wa kam ahlakna qablahum ming qarnin hum ahsanu asasaw wa ri'ya
qul mang kana fid-dalalati falyamdud lahur-rahmanu madda, hatt& iza ra'au ma yu'aduna immal-'azaba wa immas-sa'ah, fa saya'lamuna man huwa syarrum makanaw wa ad'afu junda
wa yazidullahullazinahtadau huda, wal-baqiyatus-salihatu khairun 'inda rabbika sawabaw wa khairum maradda
a fa ra'aitallazi kafara bi'ayatina wa qala la'utayanna malaw wa walada
attala'al-gaiba amittakhaza 'indar-rahmani 'ahda
kalla, sanaktubu ma yaqulu wa namuddu lahu minal-'azabi madda
wa narisuhu ma yaqulu wa ya'tina farda
wattakhazu min dunillahi alihatal liyakunu lahum 'izza
kalla, sayakfuruna bi'ibadatihim wa yakununa 'alaihim didda
a lam tara ann& arsalnasy-syayatina 'alal-kafirina ta'uzzuhum azza
fa la ta'jal 'alaihim, innama na'uddu lahum 'adda
yauma nahsyurul-muttaqina ilar-rahmani wafda
wa nasuqul-mujrimina ila jahannama wirda
la yamlikunasy-syafa'ata illa manittakhaza 'indar-rahmani 'ahda
wa qaluttakhazar-rahmanu walada
laqad ji'tum syai'an idda
takadus-samawatu yatafattarna min-hu wa tansyaqqul-ardu wa takhirrul-jibalu hadda
an da'au lir-rahmani walada
wa ma yambagi lir-rahmani ay yattakhiza walada
ing kullu man fis-samawati wal-ardi ill& atir-rahmani 'abda
laqad ahsahum wa 'addahum 'adda
wa kulluhum atihi yaumal-qiyamati farda
innallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati sayaj'alu lahumur-rahmanu wudda
fa innama yassarnahu bilisanika litubasysyira bihil-muttaqina wa tunzira bihi qaumal ludda
wa kam ahlakna qablahum ming qarn, hal tuhissu min-hum min ahadin au tasma'u lahum rikza
ta ha
ma anzalna 'alaikal-qur'ana litasyqa
illa tazkiratal limay yakhsya
tanzilam mim man khalaqal-arda was-samawatil-'ula
ar-rahmanu 'alal-'arsyistawa
lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ardi wa ma bainahuma wa ma tahtas-sara
wa in taj-har bil-qauli fa innahu ya'lamus-sirra wa akhfa
allahu la ilaha illa huw, lahul-asma'ul-husna
wa hal ataka hadisu musa
iz ra'a naran fa qala li'ahlihimkusu inni anastu naral la'alli atikum min-ha biqabasin au ajidu 'alan-nari huda
fa lamma ataha nudiya ya musa
inni ana rabbuka fakhla' na'laik, innaka bil-wadil-muqaddasi tuwa
wa anakhtartuka fastami' lima yuha
innani anallahu la ilaha illa ana fa'budni wa aqimis-salata lizikri
innas-sa'ata atiyatun akadu ukhfiha litujza kullu nafsim bima tas'a
fa la yasuddannaka 'an-ha mal la yu'minu biha wattaba'a hawahu fa tarda
wa ma tilka biyaminika ya musa
qala hiya 'asay, atawakka'u 'alaiha wa ahusysyu biha 'ala ganami wa liya fiha ma'aribu ukhra
qala alqiha ya musa
fa alqaha fa iza hiya hayyatun tas'a
qala khuz-ha wa la takhaf, sanu'iduha siratahal-ula
wadmum yadaka ila janahika takhruj baida'a min gairi su'in ayatan ukhra
linuriyaka min ayatinal-kubra
iz-hab ila fir'auna innahu taga
qala rabbisyrah li sadri
wa yassir li amri
wahlul 'uqdatam mil lisani
yafqahu qauli
waj'al li waziram min ahli
haruna akhi
usydud bihi azri
wa asyrik-hu fi amri
kai nusabbihaka kasira
wa nazkuraka kasira
innaka kunta bina basira
qala qad utita su'laka ya musa
wa laqad mananna 'alaika marratan ukhra
iz auhaina ila ummika ma yuha
aniqzi fihi fit-tabuti faqzi fihi fil-yammi falyulqihil-yammu bis-sahili ya'khuz-hu 'aduwwul li wa 'aduwwul lah, wa alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatam minni, wa litusna'a 'ala 'aini

iz tamsyi ukhtuka fa taqulu hal adullukum 'ala may yakfuluh, fa raja'naka ila ummika kai taqarra 'ainuha wa la tahzan, wa qatalta nafsan fa najjainaka minal-gammi wa fatannaka futuna, fa labista sinina fi ahli madyana summa ji'ta 'ala qadariy ya musa
wastana'tuka linafsi
iz-hab anta wa akhuka bi'ayati wa la taniya fi zikri
iz-haba ila fir'auna innahu taga
fa qula lahu qaulal layyinal la'allahu yatazakkaru au yakhsya
qala rabbana innana nakhafu ay yafruta 'alaina au ay yatga
qala la takhafa innani ma'akuma asma'u wa ara
fa'tiyahu fa qula inna rasula rabbika fa arsil ma'ana bani isra'ila wa la tu'azzib-hum, qad ji'naka bi'ayatim mir rabbik, was-salamu 'ala manittaba'al-huda
inna qad uhiya ilaina annal-'azaba 'ala mang kazzaba wa tawalla
qala fa mar rabbukuma ya musa
qala rabbunallazi a'ta kulla syai'in khalqahu summa hada
qala fa ma balul-qurunil-ula
qala 'ilmuha 'inda rabbi fi kitab, la yadillu rabbi wa la yansa
allazi ja'ala lakumul-arda mahdaw wa salaka lakum fiha subulaw wa anzala minas-sama'i ma'a, fa akhrajna bihi azwajam min nabatin syatta
kulu war'au an'amakum, inna fi zalika la'ayatil li'ulin-nuha
min-ha khalaqnakum wa fiha nu'idukum wa min-ha nukhrijukum taratan ukhra
wa laqad arainahu ayatina kullaha fa kazzaba wa aba
qala a ji'tana litukhrijana min ardina bisihrika ya musa
fa lana'tiyannaka bisihrim mislihi faj'al bainana wa bainaka mau'idal la nukhlifuhu nahnu wa la anta makanan suwa
qala mau'idukum yaumuz-zinati wa ay yuhsyaran-nasu duha
fa tawalla fir'aunu fa jama'a kaidahu summa ata
qala lahum musa wailakum la taftaru 'alallahi kaziban fa yus-hitakum bi'azab, wa qad khaba maniftara
fa tanaza'u amrahum bainahum wa asarrun-najwa
qalu in hazani lasahirani yuridani ay yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihima wa yaz-haba bitariqatikumul-musla
fa ajmi'u kaidakum summa'tu saffa, wa qad aflahal-yauma manista'la
qalu ya musa imma an tulqiya wa imma an nakuna awwala man alqa
qala bal alqu, fa iza hibaluhum wa 'isiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annaha tas'a
fa aujasa fi nafsihi khifatam musa
qulna la takhaf innaka antal-a'la
wa alqi ma fi yaminika talqaf ma sana'u, innama sana'u kaidu sahir, wa la yuflihus-sahiru haisu ata
fa ulqiyas-saharatu sujjadang qalu amanna birabbi haruna wa musa

qala amantum lahu qabla an azana lakum, innahu lakabirukumullazi 'allamakumus-sihr, fa la'uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilafiw wa la'usallibannakum fi juzu'in-nakhli wa lata'lamunna ayyuna asyaddu 'azabaw wa abqa
qalu lan nu'siraka 'ala ma ja'ana minal-bayyinati wallazi fatarana faqdi ma anta qad, innama taqdi hazihil-hayatad-dun-ya
inna amanna birabbina liyagfira lana khatayana wa ma akrahtana 'alaihi minas-sihr, wallahu khairuw wa abqa
innahu may ya'ti rabbahu mujriman fa inna lahu jahannam, la yamutu fiha wa la yahya
wa may ya'tihi mu'minang qad 'amilas-salihati fa ula'ika lahumud-darajatul-'ula
jannatu 'adnin tajri min tahtihal-an-haru khalidina fiha, wa zalika jaza'u man tazakka
wa laqad auhaina ila musa an asri bi'ibadi fadrib lahum tariqan fil-bahri yabasal la takhafu darakaw wa la takhsya
fa atba'ahum fir'aunu bijunudihi fa gasyiyahum minal-yammi ma gasyiyahum
wa adalla fir'aunu qaumahu wa ma hada
ya bani isra'ila qad anjainakum min 'aduwwikum wa wa'adnakum janibat-turil-aimana wa nazzalna 'alaikumul-manna was-salwa
kulu min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wa la tatgau fihi fa yahilla 'alaikum gadabi, wa may yahlil 'alaihi gadabi fa qad hawa
wa inni lagaffarul liman taba wa amana wa 'amila salihan summahtada
wa ma a'jalaka 'ang qaumika ya musa
qala hum ula'i 'ala asari wa 'ajiltu ilaika rabbi litarda
qala fa inna qad fatanna qaumaka mim ba'dika wa adallahumus-samiriyy
fa raja'a musa ila qaumihi gadbana asifa, qala ya qaumi a lam ya'idkum rabbukum wa'dan hasana, a fa tala 'alaikumul-'ahdu am arattum ay yahilla 'alaikum gadabum mir rabbikum fa akhlaftum mau'idi
qalu ma akhlafna mau'idaka bimalkina wa lakinna hummilna auzaram min zinatil-qaumi fa qazafnaha fa kazalika alqas-samiriyy
fa akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahu khuwarun fa qalu haza ilahukum wa ilahu musa fa nasiy
a fa la yarauna alla yarji'u ilaihim qaulaw wa la yamliku lahum darraw wa la naf'a
wa laqad qala lahum harunu ming qablu ya qaumi innama futintum bih, wa inna rabbakumur-rahmanu fattabi'uni wa ati'u amri
qalu lan nabraha 'alaihi 'akifina hatta yarji'a ilaina musa
qala ya harunu ma mana'aka iz ra'aitahum dallu
alla tattabi'an, a fa 'asaita amri
qala yabna'umma la ta'khuz bilihyati wa la bira'si, inni khasyitu an taqula farraqta baina bani isra'ila wa lam tarqub qauli
qala fa ma khatbuka ya samiriyy
qala basurtu bima lam yabsuru bihi fa qabadtu qabdatam min asarir-rasuli fa nabaztuha wa kazalika sawwalat li nafsi
qala faz-hab fa inna laka fil-hayati an taqula la misasa wa inna laka mau'idal lan tukhlafah, wanzur ila ilahikallazi zalta 'alaihi 'akifa, lanuharriqannahu summa lanansifannahu fil-yammi nasfa
innama ilahukumullahullazi la ilaha illa huw, wasi'a kulla syai'in 'ilma
kazalika naqussu 'alaika min amba'i ma qad sabaq, wa qad atainaka mil ladunna zikra
man a'rada 'an-hu fa innahu yahmilu yaumal-qiyamati wizra
khalidina fih, wa sa'a lahum yaumal-qiyamati himla
yauma yunfakhu fis-suri wa nahsyurul-mujrimina yauma'izin zurqa
yatakhafatuna bainahum il labistum illa 'asyra
nahnu a'lamu bima yaquluna iz yaqulu amsaluhum tariqatan il labistum illa yauma
wa yas'alunaka 'anil-jibali fa qul yansifuha rabbi nasfa
fa yazaruha qa'an safsafa
la tara fiha 'iwajaw wa la amta
yauma'iziy yattabi'unad-da'iya la 'iwaja lah, wa khasya'atil-aswatu lir-rahmani fa la tasma'u illa hamsa
yauma'izil la tanfa'usy-syafa'atu illa man azina lahur-rahmanu wa radiya lahu qaula
ya'lamu ma baina aidihim wa ma khalfahum wa la yuhituna bihi 'ilma
wa 'anatil-wujuhu lil-hayyil-qayyum, wa qad khaba man hamala zulma
wa may ya'mal minas-salihati wa huwa mu'minun fa la yakhafu zulmaw wa la hadma
wa kazalika anzalnahu qur'anan 'arabiyyaw wa sarrafna fihi minal-wa'idi la'allahum yattaquna au yuhdisu lahum zikra
fa ta'alallahul-malikul-haqq, wa la ta'jal bil-qur'ani ming qabli ay yuqda ilaika wahyuhu wa qur rabbi zidni 'ilma
wa laqad 'ahidna ila adama ming qablu fa nasiya wa lam najid lahu 'azma
wa iz qulna lil-mala'ikatisjudu li'adama fa sajadu illa iblisa aba
fa qulna ya adamu inna haza 'aduwwul laka wa lizaujika fa la yukhrijannakuma minal-jannati fa tasyqa
inna laka alla taju'a fiha wa la ta'ra
wa annaka la tazma'u fiha wa la tad-ha
fa waswasa ilaihisy-syaitanu qala ya adamu hal adulluka 'ala syajaratil-khuldi wa mulkil la yabla
fa akala min-ha fa badat lahuma sau'atuhuma wa tafiqa yakhsifani 'alaihima miw waraqil jannah, wa 'asa adamu rabbahu fa gawa
summajtabahu rabbuhu fa taba 'alaihi wa hada
qalahbita min-ha jami'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww, fa imma ya'tiyannakum minni hudan fa manittaba'a hudaya fa la yadillu wa la yasyqa
wa man a'rada 'an zikri fa inna lahu ma'isyatan dangkaw wa nahsyuruhu yaumal-qiyamati a'ma
qala rabbi lima hasyartani a'ma wa qad kuntu basira
qala kazalika atatka ayatuna fa nasitaha, wa kazalikal-yauma tunsa
wa kazalika najzi man asrafa wa lam yu'mim bi'ayati rabbih, wa la'azabul-akhirati asyaddu wa abqa
a fa lam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna qablahum minal-quruni yamsyuna fi masakinihim, inna fi zalika la'ayatil li'ulin-nuha
walau la kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika lakana lizamaw wa ajalum musamma
fasbir 'ala ma yaquluna wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulu'isy-syamsi wa qabla gurubiha, wa min ana'il-laili fa sabbih wa atrafan-nahari la'allaka tarda
wa la tamuddanna 'ainaika ila ma matta'na bihi azwajam min-hum zahratal-hayatid-dun-ya linaftinahum fih, wa rizqu rabbika khairuw wa abqa
wa'mur ahlaka bis-salati wastabir 'alaiha, la nas'aluka rizqa, nahnu narzuquk, wal-'aqibatu lit-taqwa
wa qalu lau la ya'tina bi'ayatim mir rabbih, a wa lam ta'tihim bayyinatu ma fis-suhufil-ula
walau anna ahlaknahum bi'azabim ming qablihi laqalu rabbana lau la arsalta ilaina rasulan fa nattabi'a ayatika ming qabli an nazilla wa nakhza
qul kullum mutarabbisun fa tarabbasu, fa sata'lamuna man as-habus-siratis-sawiyyi wa manihtada
iqtaraba lin-nasi hisabuhum wa hum fi gaflatim mu'ridun
ma ya'tihim min zikrim mir rabbihim muhdasin illastama'uhu wa hum yal'abun
lahiyatang qulubuhum, wa asarrun-najwallazina zalamu hal haza illa basyarum mislukum, a fa ta'tunas-sihra wa antum tubsirun
qala rabbi ya'lamul-qaula fis-sama'i wal-ardi wa huwas-sami'ul-'alim
bal qalu adgasu ahlam, baliftarahu bal huwa sya'ir, falya'tina bi'ayating kama ursilal-awwalun
ma amanat qablahum ming qaryatin ahlaknaha, a fa hum yu'minun
wa ma arsalna qablaka illa rijalan nuhi ilaihim fas'alu ahlaz-zikri ing kuntum la ta'lamun
wa ma ja'alnahum jasadal la ya'kulunat-ta'ama wa ma kanu khalidin
summa sadaqnahumul-wa'da fa anjainahum wa man nasya'u wa ahlaknal-musrifin
laqad anzalna ilaikum kitaban fihi zikrukum, a fa la ta'qilun
wa kam qasamna ming qaryating kanat zalimataw wa ansya'na ba'daha qauman akharin
fa lamma ahassu ba'sana iza hum min-ha yarkudun
la tarkudu warji'u ila ma utriftum fihi wa masakinikum la'allakum tus'alun
qalu ya wailana inna kunna zalimin
fa ma zalat tilka da'wahum hatta ja'alnahum hasidan khamidin
wa ma khalaqnas-sama'a wal-arda wa ma bainahuma la'ibin
lau aradna an nattakhiza lahwal lattakhaznahu mil ladunna ing kunna fa'ilin
bal naqzifu bil-haqqi 'alal-batili fa yadmaguhu fa iza huwa zahiq, wa lakumul-wailu mimma tasifun
wa lahu man fis-samawati wal-ard, wa man 'indahu la yastakbiruna 'an 'ibadatihi wa la yastahsirun
yusabbihunal-laila wan-nahara la yafturun
amittakhazu alihatam minal-ardi hum yunsyirun
lau kana fihima alihatun illallahu lafasadata, fa sub-hanallahi rabbil-'arsyi 'amma yasifun
la yus'alu 'amma yaf'alu wa hum yus'alun
amittakhazu min dunihi alihah, qul hatu bur-hanakum, haza zikru mam ma'iya wa zikru mang qabli, bal aksaruhum la ya'lamunal-haqqa fa hum mu'ridun
wa ma arsalna ming qablika mir rasulin illa nuhi ilaihi annahu la ilaha illa ana fa'budun
wa qaluttakhazar-rahmanu waladan sub-hanah, bal 'ibadum mukramun
la yasbiqunahu bil-qauli wa hum bi'amrihi ya'malun
ya'lamu ma baina aidihim wa ma khalfahum wa la yasyfa'una illa limanirtada wa hum min khasy-yatihi musyfiqun
wa may yaqul min-hum inni ilahum min dunihi fa zalika najzihi jahannam, kazalika najziz-zalimin
a wa lam yarallazina kafaru annas-samawati wal-arda kanata ratqan fa fataqnahuma, wa ja'alna minal-ma'i kulla syai'in hayy, a fa la yu'minun
wa ja'alna fil-ardi rawasiya an tamida bihim wa ja'alna fiha fijajan subulal la'allahum yahtadun
wa ja'alnas-sama'a saqfam mahfuza, wa hum 'an ayatiha mu'ridun
wa huwallazi khalaqal-laila wan-nahara wasy-syamsa wal-qamar, kullun fi falakiy yasbahun
wa ma ja'alna libasyarim ming qablikal-khuld, a fa im mitta fa humul-khalidun
kullu nafsin za'iqatul-maut, wa nablukum bisy-syarri wal-khairi fitnah, wa ilaina turja'un
wa iza ra'akallazina kafaru iy yattakhizunaka illa huzuwa, a hazallazi yazkuru alihatakum, wa hum bizikrir-rahmani hum kafirun
khuliqal-insanu min 'ajal, sa'urikum ayati fa la tasta'jilun
wa yaquluna mata hazal-wa'du ing kuntum sadiqin
lau ya'lamullazina kafaru hina la yakuffuna 'aw wujuhihimun-nara wa la 'an zuhurihim wa la hum yunsarun
bal ta'tihim bagtatan fa tab-hatuhum fa la yastati'una raddaha wa la hum yunzarun
wa laqadistuhzi'a birusulim ming qablika fa haqa billazina sakhiru min-hum ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un
qul may yakla'ukum bil-laili wan-nahari minar-rahman, bal hum 'an zikri rabbihim mu'ridun
am lahum alihatun tamna'uhum min dunina, la yastati'una nasra anfusihim wa la hum minna yus-habun
bal matta'na ha'ula'i wa aba'ahum hatta tala 'alaihimul-'umur, a fa la yarauna anna na'til-arda nangqusuha min atrafiha, a fa humul-galibun
qul innama unzirukum bil-wahyi wa la yasma'us-summud-du'a'a iza ma yunzarun
wa la'im massat-hum naf-hatum min 'azabi rabbika layaqulunna ya wailana inna kunna zalimin
wa nada'ul-mawazinal-qista liyaumil-qiyamati fa la tuzlamu nafsun syai'a, wa ing kana misqala habbatim min khardalin ataina biha, wa kafa bina hasibin
wa laqad ataina musa wa harunal-furqana wa diya'aw wa zikral lil-muttaqin
allazina yakhsyauna rabbahum bil-gaibi wa hum minas-sa'ati musyfiqun
wa haza zikrum mubarakun anzalnah, a fa antum lahu mungkirun
wa laqad ataina ibrahima rusydahu ming qablu wa kunna bihi 'alimin
iz qala li'abihi wa qaumihi ma hazihit-tamasilullati antum laha 'akifun
qalu wajadna aba'ana laha 'abidin
qala laqad kuntum antum wa aba'ukum fi dalalim mubin
qalu a ji'tana bil-haqqi am anta minal-la'ibin
qala bar rabbukum rabbus-samawati wal-ardillazi fatarahunna wa ana 'ala zalikum minasy-syahidin
wa tallahi la'akidanna asnamakum ba'da an tuwallu mudbirin
fa ja'alahum juzazan illa kabiral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'un
qalu man fa'ala haza bi'alihatina innahu laminaz-zalimin
qalu sami'na fatay yazkuruhum yuqalu lahu ibrahim
qalu fa'tu bihi 'ala a'yunin-nasi la'allahum yasy-hadun
qalu a anta fa'alta haza bi'alihatina ya ibrahim
qala bal fa'alahu kabiruhum haza fas'aluhum ing kanu yantiqun
fa raja'u ila anfusihim fa qalu innakum antumuz-zalimun
summa nukisu 'ala ru'usihim, laqad 'alimta ma ha'ula'i yantiqun
qala a fa ta'buduna min dunillahi ma la yanfa'ukum syai'aw wa la yadurrukum
uffil lakum wa lima ta'buduna min dunillah, a fa la ta'qilun
qalu harriquhu wansuru alihatakum ing kuntum fa'ilin
qulna ya naru kuni bardaw wa salaman 'ala ibrahim
wa aradu bihi kaidan fa ja'alnahumul-akhsarin
wa najjainahu wa lutan ilal-ardillati barakna fiha lil-'alamin
wa wahabna lahu is-haqa wa ya'quba nafilah, wa kullan ja'alna salihin
wa ja'alnahum a'immatay yahduna bi'amrina wa auhaina ilaihim fi'lal-khairati wa iqamas-salati wa ita'az-zakah, wa kanu lana 'abidin
wa lutan atainahu hukmaw wa 'ilmaw wa najjainahu minal-qaryatillati kanat ta'malul-khaba'is, innahum kanu qauma sau'in fasiqin
wa adkhalnahu fi rahmatina, innahu minas-salihin
wa nuhan iz nada ming qablu fastajabna lahu fa najjainahu wa ahlahu minal-karbil-'azim
wa nasarnahu minal-qaumillazina kazzabu bi'ayatina, innahum kanu qauma sau'in fa agraqnahum ajma'in
wa dawuda wa sulaimana iz yahkumani fil-harsi iz nafasyat fihi ganamul-qaum, wa kunna lihukmihim syahidin
fa fahhamnaha sulaiman, wa kullan ataina hukmaw wa 'ilmaw wa sakhkharna ma'a dawudal-jibala yusabbihna wat-tair, wa kunna fa'ilin
wa 'allamnahu san'ata labusil lakum lituhsinakum mim ba'sikum, fa hal antum syakirun
wa lisulaimanar-riha 'asifatan tajri bi'amrihi ilal-ardillati barakna fiha, wa kunna bikulli syai'in 'alimin
wa minasy-syayatini may yagusuna lahu wa ya'maluna 'amalan duna zalik, wa kunna lahum hafizin
wa ayyuba iz nada rabbahu anni massaniyad-durru wa anta ar-hamur-rahimin
fastajabna lahu fa kasyafna ma bihi min durriw wa atainahu ahlahu wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam min 'indina wa zikra lil-'abidin
wa isma'ila wa idrisa wa zal-kifl, kullum minas-sabirin
wa adkhalnahum fi rahmatina, innahum minas-salihin
wa zan-nuni iz zahaba mugadiban fa zanna al lan naqdira 'alaihi fa nada fiz-zulumati al la ilaha illa anta sub-hanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
fastajabna lahu wa najjainahu minal-gamm, wa kazalika nunjil-mu'minin
wa zakariyya iz nada rabbahu rabbi la tazarni fardaw wa anta khairul-warisin
fastajabna lahu wa wahabna lahu yahya wa aslahna lahu zaujah, innahum kanu yusari'una fil-khairati wa yad'unana ragabaw wa rahaba, wa kanu lana khasyi'in
wallati ahsanat farjaha fa nafakhna fiha mir ruhina wa ja'alnaha wabnaha ayatal lil-'alamin
inna hazihi ummatukum ummataw wahidataw wa ana rabbukum fa'budun
wa taqatta'u amrahum bainahum, kullun ilaina raji'un
fa may ya'mal minas-salihati wa huwa mu'minun fa la kufrana lisa'yih, wa inna lahu katibun
wa haramun 'ala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarji'un
hatta iza futihat ya'juju wa ma'juju wa hum ming kulli hadabiy yansilun
waqtarabal-wa'dul-haqqu fa iza hiya syakhisatun absarullazina kafaru, ya wailana qad kunna fi gaflatim min haza bal kunna zalimin
innakum wa ma ta'buduna min dunillahi hasabu jahannam, antum laha waridun
lau kana ha'ula'i alihatam ma waraduha, wa kullun fiha khalidun
lahum fiha zafiruw wa hum fiha la yasma'un
innallazina sabaqat lahum minnal-husna ula'ika 'an-ha mub'adun
la yasma'una hasisaha, wa hum fi masytahat anfusuhum khalidun
la yahzunuhumul-faza'ul-akbaru wa tatalaqqahumul-mala'ikah, haza yaumukumullazi kuntum tu'adun
yauma natwis-sama'a katayyis-sijilli lil-kutub, kama bada'na awwala khalqin nu'iduh, wa'dan 'alaina, inna kunna fa'ilin
wa laqad katabna fiz-zaburi mim ba'diz-zikri annal-arda yarisuha 'ibadiyas-salihun
inna fi haza labalagal liqaumin 'abidin
wa ma arsalnaka illa rahmatal lil-'alamin
qul innama yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahuw wahid, fa hal antum muslimun
fa in tawallau fa qul azantukum 'ala sawa', wa in adri a qaribun am ba'idum ma tu'adun
innahu ya'lamul-jahra minal-qauli wa ya'lamu ma taktumun
wa in adri la'allahu fitnatul lakum wa mata'un ila hin
qala rabbihkum bil-haqq, wa rabbunar-rahmanul-musta'anu 'ala ma tasifun
ya ayyuhan-nasuttaqu rabbakum, inna zalzalatas-sa'ati syai'un 'azim
yauma taraunaha taz-halu kullu murdi'atin 'amma arda'at wa tada'u kullu zati hamlin hamlaha wa taran-nasa sukara wa ma hum bisukara wa lakinna 'azaballahi syadid
wa minan-nasi may yujadilu fillahi bigairi 'ilmiw wa yattabi'u kulla syaitanim marid
kutiba 'alaihi annahu man tawallahu fa annahu yudilluhu wa yahdihi ila 'azabis-sa'ir

ya ayyuhan-nasu ing kuntum fi raibim minal-ba'si fa inna khalaqnakum min turabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa mim mudgatim mukhallaqatiw wa gairi mukhallaqatil linubayyina lakum, wa nuqirru fil-ar-hami ma nasya'u ila ajalim musamman summa nukhrijukum tiflan summa litablugu asyuddakum, wa mingkum may yutawaffa wa mingkum may yuraddu ila arzalil-'umuri likai la ya'lama mim ba'di 'ilmin syai'a, wa taral-arda hamidatan fa iza anzalna 'alaihal-ma'ahtazzat wa rabat wa ambatat ming kulli zaujim bahij
zalika bi'annallaha huwal-haqqu wa annahu yuhyil-mauta wa annahu 'ala kulli syai'ing qadir
wa annas-sa'ata atiyatul la raiba fiha wa annallaha yab'asu man fil-qubur
wa minan-nasi may yujadilu fillahi bigairi 'ilmiw wa la hudaw wa la kitabim munir
saniya 'itfihi liyudilla 'an sabilillah, lahu fid-dun-ya khizyuw wa nuziquhu yaumal-qiyamati 'azabal-hariq
zalika bima qaddamat yadaka wa annallaha laisa bizallamil lil-'abid
wa minan-nasi may ya'budullaha 'ala harf, fa in asabahu khairunitma'anna bih, wa in asabat-hu fitnatuningqalaba 'ala waj-hih, khasirad-dun-ya wal-akhirah, zalika huwal-khusranul-mubin
yad'u min dunillahi ma la yadurruhu wa ma la yanfa'uh, zalika huwad-dalalul-ba'id
yad'u laman darruhu aqrabu min naf'ih, labi'sal-maula wa labi'sal-'asyir
innallaha yudkhilullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtihal-an-har, innallaha yaf'alu ma yurid
mang kana yazunnu al lay yansurahullahu fid-dun-ya wal-akhirati falyamdud bisababin ilas-sama'i summalyaqta' falyanzur hal yuz-hibanna kaiduhu ma yagiz
wa kazalika anzalnahu ayatim bayyinatiw wa annallaha yahdi may yurid
