inna haza akhi, lahu tis'uw wa tis'una na'jataw wa liya na'jatuw wahidah, fa qala akfilniha wa 'azzani fil-khitab

qala laqad zalamaka bisu'ali na'jatika ila ni'ajih, wa inna kasiram minal-khulata'i layabgi ba'duhum 'ala ba'din illallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati wa qalilum ma hum, wa zanna dawudu annama fatannahu fastagfara rabbahu wa kharra raki'aw wa anab
fa gafarna lahu zalik, wa inna lahu 'indana lazulfa wa husna ma'ab

ya dawudu inna ja'alnaka khalifatan fil-ardi fahkum bainan-nasi bil-haqqi wa la tattabi'il-hawa fa yudillaka 'an sabilillah, innallazina yadilluna 'an sabilillahi lahum 'azabun syadidum bima nasu yaumal-hisab
wa ma khalaqnas-sama'a wal-arda wa ma bainahuma batila, zalika zannullazina kafaru fa wailul lillazina kafaru minan-nar
am naj'alullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati kal-mufsidina fil-ardi am naj'alul-muttaqina kal-fujjar
kitabun anzalnahu ilaika mubarakul liyaddabbaru ayatihi wa liyatazakkara ulul-albab
wa wahabna lidawuda sulaiman, ni'mal-'abd, innahu awwab
iz 'urida 'alaihi bil-'asyiyyis-safinatul-jiyad
fa qala inni ahbabtu hubbal-khairi 'an zikri rabbi, hatta tawarat bil-hijab
rudduha 'alayy, fa tafiqa mas-ham bis-suqi wal-a'naq
wa laqad fatanna sulaimana wa alqaina 'ala kursiyyihi jasadan summa anab
qala rabbigfir li wa hab li mulkal la yambagi li'ahadim mim ba'di, innaka antal-wahhab
fa sakhkharna lahur-riha tajri bi'amrihi rukha'an haisu asab
wasy-syayatina kulla banna'iw wa gawwas
wa akharina muqarranina fil-asfad
haza 'ata'una famnun au amsik bigairi hisab
wa inna lahu 'indana lazulfa wa husna ma'ab
wazkur 'abdana ayyub, iz nada rabbahu anni massaniyasy-syaitanu binusbiw wa 'azab
urkud birijlik, haza mugtasalum bariduw wa syarab
wa wahabna lahu ahlahu wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam minna wa zikra li'ulil-albab
wa khuz biyadika digsan fadrib bihi wa la tahnas, inna wajadnahu sabira, ni'mal-'abd, innahu awwab
wazkur 'ibadana ibrahima wa is-haqa wa ya'quba ulil-aidi wal-absar
inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin zikrad-dar
wa innahum 'indana laminal-mustafainal-akhyar
wazkur isma'ila walyasa'a wa zal-kifl, wa kullum minal-akhyar
haza zikr, wa inna lil-muttaqina lahusna ma'ab
jannati 'adnim mufattahatal lahumul-abwab
muttaki'ina fiha yad'una fiha bifakihating kasiratiw wa syarab
wa 'indahum qasiratut-tarfi atrab
haza ma tu'aduna liyaumil-hisab
inna haza larizquna ma lahu min nafad
haza, wa inna lit-tagina lasyarra ma'ab
jahannam, yaslaunaha, fa bi'sal-mihad
haza falyazuquhu hamimuw wa gassaq
wa akharu min syaklihi azwaj
haza faujum muqtahimum ma'akum, la mar-habam bihim, innahum salun-nar
qalu bal antum la mar-habam bikum, antum qaddamtumuhu lana, fa bi'sal-qarar
qalu rabbana mang qaddama lana haza fa zid-hu 'azaban di'fan fin-nar
wa qalu ma lana la nara rijalang kunna na'udduhum minal-asyrar
attakhaznahum sikhriyyan am zagat 'an-humul-absar
inna zalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahlin-nar
qul innama ana munziruw wa ma min ilahin illallahul-wahidul-qahhar
rabbus-samawati wal-ardi wa ma bainahumal-'azizul-gaffar
qul huwa naba'un 'azim
antum 'an-hu mu'ridun
ma kana liya min 'ilmim bil-mala'il-a'la iz yakhtasimun
iy yuha ilayya illa annama ana nazirum mubin
iz qala rabbuka lil-mala'ikati inni khaliqum basyaram min tin
fa iza sawwaituhu wa nafakhtu fihi mir ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidin
fa sajadal-mala'ikatu kulluhum ajma'un
illa iblis, istakbara wa kana minal-kafirin
qala ya iblisu ma mana'aka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayy, astakbarta am kunta minal-'alin
qala ana khairum min-hu khalaqtani min nariw wa khalaqtahu min tin
qala fakhruj min-ha fa innaka rajim
wa inna 'alaika la'nati ila yaumid-din
qala rabbi fa anzirni ila yaumi yub'asun
qala fa innaka minal-munzarin
ila yaumil-waqtil-ma'lum
qala fa bi'izzatika la'ugwiyannahum ajma'in
illa 'ibadaka min-humul-mukhlasin
qala fal-haqqu wal-haqqa aqul
la'amla'anna jahannama mingka wa mim man tabi'aka min-hum ajma'in
qul ma as'alukum 'alaihi min ajriw wa ma ana minal-mutakallifin
in huwa illa zikrul lil-'alamin
wa lata'lamunna naba'ahu ba'da hin
tanzilul-kitabi minallahil-'azizil-hakim
inna anzalna ilaikal-kitaba bil-haqqi fa'budillaha mukhlisal lahud-din

ala lillahid-dinul-khalis, wallazinattakhazu min dunihi auliya', ma na'buduhum illa liyuqarribuna ilallahi zulfa, innallaha yahkumu bainahum fi ma hum fihi yakhtalifun, innallaha la yahdi man huwa kazibung kaffar
lau aradallahu ay yattakhiza waladal lastafa mimma yakhluqu ma yasya'u sub-hanah, huwallahul-wahidul-qahhar
khalaqas-samawati wal-arda bil-haqq, yukawwirul-laila 'alan-nahari wa yukawwirun-nahara 'alal-laili wa sakhkharasy-syamsa wal-qamar, kulluy yajri li'ajalim musamma, ala huwal-'azizul-gaffar

khalaqakum min nafsiw wahidatin summa ja'ala min-ha zaujaha wa anzala lakum minal-an'ami samaniyata azwaj, yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fi zulumatin salas, zalikumullahu rabbukum lahul-mulk, la ilaha illa huw, fa anna tusrafun

in takfuru fa innallaha ganiyyun 'angkum, wa la yarda li'ibadihil-kufr, wa in tasykuru yardahu lakum, wa la taziru waziratuw wizra ukhra, summa ila rabbikum marji'ukum fa yunabbi'ukum bima kuntum ta'malun, innahu 'alimum bizatis-sudur

wa iza massal-insana durrun da'a rabbahu muniban ilaihi summa iza khawwalahu ni'matam min-hu nasiya ma kana yad'u ilaihi ming qablu wa ja'ala lillahi andadal liyudilla 'an sabilih, qul tamatta' bikufrika qalilan innaka min as-habin-nar
am man huwa qanitun ana'al-laili sajidaw wa qa'imay yahzarul-akhirata wa yarju rahmata rabbih, qul hal yastawillazina ya'lamuna wallazina la ya'lamun, innama yatazakkaru ulul-albab
qul ya 'ibadillazina amanuttaqu rabbakum, lillazina ahsanu fi hazihid-dun-ya hasanah, wa ardullahi wasi'ah, innama yuwaffas-sabiruna ajrahum bigairi hisab
qul inni umirtu an a'budallaha mukhlisal lahud-din
wa umirtu li'an akuna awwalal-muslimin
qul inni akhafu in 'asaitu rabbi 'azaba yaumin 'azim
qulillaha a'budu mukhlisal lahu dini
fa'budu ma syi'tum min dunih, qul innal-khasirinallazina khasiru anfusahum wa ahlihim yaumal-qiyamah, ala zalika huwal-khusranul-mubin
lahum min fauqihim zulalum minan-nari wa min tahtihim zulal, zalika yukhawwifullahu bihi 'ibadah, ya 'ibadi fattaqun
wallazinajtanabut-taguta ay ya'buduha wa anabu ilallahi lahumul-busyra, fa basysyir 'ibad
allazina yastami'unal-qaula fa yattabi'una ahsanah, ula'ikallazina hadahumullahu wa ula'ika hum ulul-albab
a fa man haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul-'azab, a fa anta tungqizu man fin-nar
lakinillazinattaqau rabbahum lahum gurafum min fauqiha gurafum mabniyyatun tajri min tahtihal-an-har, wa'dallah, la yukhlifullahul-mi'ad

a lam tara annallaha anzala minas-sama'i ma'an fa salakahu yanabi'a fil-ardi summa yukhriju bihi zar'am mukhtalifan alwanuhu summa yahiju fa tarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhu hutama, inna fi zalika lazikra li'ulil-albab
a fa man syarahallahu sadrahu lil-islami fa huwa 'ala nurim mir rabbih, fa wailul lil-qasiyati qulubuhum min zikrillah, ula'ika fi dalalim mubin

allahu nazzala ahsanal-hadisi kitabam mutasyabiham masaniya taqsya'irru min-hu juludullazina yakhsyauna rabbahum, summa talinu juluduhum wa qulubuhum ila zikrillah, zalika hudallahi yahdi bihi may yasya', wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu min had
a fa may yattaqi biwaj-hihi su'al-'azabi yaumal-qiyamah, wa qila liz-zalimina zuqu ma kuntum taksibun
kazzaballazina ming qablihim fa atahumul-'azabu min haisu la yasy'urun
fa azaqahumullahul-khizya fil-hayatid-dun-ya, wa la'azabul-akhirati akbar, lau kanu ya'lamun
wa laqad darabna lin-nasi fi hazal-qur'ani ming kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkarun
qur'anan 'arabiyyan gaira zi 'iwajil la'allahum yattaqun
daraballahu masalar rajulan fihi syuraka'u mutasyakisuna wa rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawiyani masala, al-hamdu lillah, bal aksaruhum la ya'lamun
innaka mayyituw wa innahum mayyitun
summa innakum yaumal-qiyamati 'inda rabbikum takhtasimun
fa man azlamu mim mang kazaba 'alallahi wa kazzaba bis-sidqi iz ja'ah, a laisa fi jahannama maswal lil-kafirin
wallazi ja'a bis-sidqi wa saddaqa bihi ula'ika humul-muttaqun
lahum ma yasya'una 'inda rabbihim, zalika jaza'ul-muhsinin
liyukaffirallahu 'an-hum aswa'allazi 'amilu wa yajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsanillazi kanu ya'malun
a laisallahu bikafin 'abdah, wa yukhawwifunaka billazina min dunih, wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu min had
wa may yahdillahu fa ma lahu mim mudill, a laisallahu bi'azizin zintiqam

wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samawati wal-arda layaqulunnallah, qul a fa ra'aitum ma tad'una min dunillahi in aradaniyallahu bidurrin hal hunna kasyifatu durrihi au aradani birahmatin hal hunna mumsikatu rahmatih, qul hasbiyallah, 'alaihi yatawakkalul-mutawakkilun
qul ya qaumi'malu 'ala makanatikum inni 'amil, fa saufa ta'lamun
may ya'tihi 'azabuy yukhzihi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azabum muqim
inna anzalna 'alaikal-kitaba lin-nasi bil-haqq, fa manihtada fa linafsih, wa man dalla fa innama yadillu 'alaiha, wa ma anta 'alaihim biwakil
allahu yatawaffal-anfusa hina mautiha wallati lam tamut fi manamiha, fa yumsikullati qada 'alaihal-mauta wa yursilul-ukhra ila ajalim musamma, inna fi zalika la'ayatil liqaumiy yatafakkarun
amittakhazu min dunillahi syufa'a', qul a walau kanu la yamlikuna syai'aw wa la ya'qilun
qul lillahisy-syafa'atu jami'a, lahu mulkus-samawati wal-ard, summa ilaihi turja'un
wa iza zukirallahu wahdahusyma'azzat qulubullazina la yu'minuna bil-akhirah, wa iza zukirallazina min dunihi iza hum yastabsyirun
qulillahumma fatiras-samawati wal-ardi 'alimal-gaibi wasy-syahadati anta tahkumu baina 'ibadika fi ma kanu fihi yakhtalifun
walau anna lillazina zalamu ma fil-ardi jami'aw wa mislahu ma'ahu laftadau bihi min su'il-'azabi yaumal-qiyamah, wa bada lahum minallahi ma lam yakunu yahtasibun
wa bada lahum sayyi'atu ma kasabu wa haqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un
fa iza massal-insana durrun da'ana summa iza khawwalnahu ni'matam minna qala innama utituhu 'ala 'ilm, bal hiya fitnatuw wa lakinna aksarahum la ya'lamun
qad qalahallazina ming qablihim fa ma agna 'an-hum ma kanu yaksibun
fa asabahum sayyi'atu ma kasabu, wallazina zalamu min ha'ula'i sayusibuhum sayyi'atu ma kasabu wa ma hum bimu'jizin
a wa lam ya'lamu annallaha yabsutur-rizqa limay yasya'u wa yaqdir, inna fi zalika la'ayatil liqaumiy yu'minun
qul ya 'ibadiyallazina asrafu 'ala anfusihim la taqnatu mir rahmatillah, innallaha yagfiruz-zunuba jami'a, innahu huwal-gafurur-rahim
wa anibu ila rabbikum wa aslimu lahu ming qabli ay ya'tiyakumul-'azabu summa la tunsarun
wattabi'u ahsana ma unzila ilaikum mir rabbikum ming qabli ay ya'tiyakumul-'azabu bagtataw wa antum la tasy'urun
an taqula nafsuy ya hasrata 'ala ma farrattu fi jambillahi wa ing kuntu laminas-sakhirin
au taqula lau annallaha hadani lakuntu minal-muttaqin
au taqula hina taral-'azaba lau anna li karratan fa akuna minal-muhsinin
bala qad ja'atka ayati fa kazzabta biha wastakbarta wa kunta minal-kafirin
wa yaumal-qiyamati tarallazina kazabu 'alallahi wujuhuhum muswaddah, a laisa fi jahannama maswal lil-mutakabbirin
wa yunajjillahullazinattaqau bimafazatihim la yamassuhumus-su'u wa la hum yahzanun
allahu khaliqu kulli syai'iw wa huwa 'ala kulli syai'iw wakil
lahu maqalidus-samawati wal-ard, wallazina kafaru bi'ayatillahi ula'ika humul-khasirun
qul a fa gairallahi ta'murunni a'budu ayyuhal-jahilun
wa laqad uhiya ilaika wa ilallazina ming qablik, la'in asyrakta layahbatanna 'amaluka wa latakunanna minal-khasirin
balillaha fa'bud wa kum minasy-syakirin
wa ma qadarullaha haqqa qadrihi wal-ardu jami'ang qabdatuhu yaumal-qiyamati was-samawatu matwiyyatum biyaminih, sub-hanahu wa ta'ala 'amma yusyrikun
wa nufikha fis-suri fa sa'iqa man fis-samawati wa man fil-ardi illa man sya'allah, summa nufikha fihi ukhra fa iza hum qiyamuy yanzurun
wa asyraqatil-ardu binuri rabbiha wa wudi'al-kitabu waji'a bin-nabiyyina wasy-syuhada'i wa qudiya bainahum bil-haqqi wa hum la yuzlamun
wa wuffiyat kullu nafsim ma 'amilat wa huwa a'lamu bima yaf'alun

wa siqallazina kafaru ila jahannama zumara, hatta iza ja'uha futihat abwabuha wa qala lahum khazanatuha a lam ya'tikum rusulum mingkum yatluna 'alaikum ayati rabbikum wa yunzirunakum liqa'a yaumikum haza, qalu bala wa lakin haqqat kalimatul-'azabi 'alal-kafirin
qiladkhulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha, fa bi'sa maswal-mutakabbirin
wa siqallazinattaqau rabbahum ilal-jannati zumara, hatta iza ja'uha wa futihat abwabuha wa qala lahum khazanatuha salamun 'alaikum tibtum fadkhuluha khalidin
wa qalul-hamdu lillahillazi sadaqana wa'dahu wa aurasanal-arda natabawwa'u minal-jannati haisu nasya', fa ni'ma ajrul-'amilin
wa taral-mala'ikata haffina min haulil-'arsyi yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim, wa qudiya bainahum bil-haqqi wa qilal-hamdu lillahi rabbil-'alamin
ha mim
tanzilul-kitabi minallahil-'azizil-'alim
gafiriz-zambi wa qabilit-taubi syadidil-'iqabi zit-taul, la ilaha illa huw, ilaihil-masir
ma yujadilu fi ayatillahi illallazina kafaru fa la yagrurka taqallubuhum fil-bilad
kazzabat qablahum qaumu nuhiw wal-ahzabu mim ba'dihim wa hammat kullu ummatim birasulihim liya'khuzuhu wa jadalu bil-batili liyud-hidu bihil-haqqa fa akhaztuhum, fa kaifa kana 'iqab
wa kazalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika 'alallazina kafaru annahum as-habun-nar

allazina yahmilunal-'arsya wa man haulahu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wa yu'minuna bihi wa yastagfiruna lillazina amanu, rabbana wasi'ta kulla syai'ir rahmataw wa 'ilman fagfir lillazina tabu wattaba'u sabilaka wa qihim 'azabal-jahim
rabbana wa adkhil-hum jannati 'adninillati wa'attahum wa man salaha min aba'ihim wa azwajihim wa zurriyyatihim, innaka antal-'azizul-hakim
wa qihimus-sayyi'at, wa man taqis-sayyi'ati yauma'izin fa qad rahimtah, wa zalika huwal-fauzul-'azim
innallazina kafaru yunadauna lamaqtullahi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iz tud'auna ilal-imani fa takfurun
qalu rabbana amattanasnataini wa ahyaitanasnataini fa'tarafna bizunubina fa hal ila khurujim min sabil
zalikum bi'annahu iza du'iyallahu wahdahu kafartum, wa iy yusyrak bihi tu'minu, fal-hukmu lillahil-'aliyyil-kabir
huwallazi yurikum ayatihi wa yunazzilu lakum minas-sama'i rizqa, wa ma yatazakkaru illa may yunib
fad'ullaha mukhlisina lahud-dina walau karihal-kafirun
rafi'ud-darajati zul-'arsy, yulqir-ruha min amrihi 'ala may yasya'u min 'ibadihi liyunzira yaumat-talaq
yauma hum barizun, la yakhfa 'alallahi min-hum syai', limanil-mulkul-yaum, lillahil-wahidil-qahhar
al-yauma tujza kullu nafsim bima kasabat, la zulmal-yaum, innallaha sari'ul-hisab
wa anzir-hum yaumal-azifati izil-qulubu ladal-hanajiri kazimin, ma liz-zalimina min hamimiw wa la syafi'iy yuta'
ya'lamu kha'inatal-a'yuni wa ma tukhfis-sudur
wallahu yaqdi bil-haqq, wallazina yad'una min dunihi la yaqduna bisyai', innallaha huwas-sami'ul-basir

a wa lam yasiru fil-ardi fa yanzuru kaifa kana 'aqibatullazina kanu ming qablihim, kanu hum asyadda min-hum quwwataw wa asaran fil-ardi fa akhazahumullahu bizunubihim, wa ma kana lahum minallahi miw waq
zalika bi'annahum kanat ta'tihim rusuluhum bil-bayyinati fa kafaru fa akhazahumullah, innahu qawiyyun syadidul-'iqab
wa laqad arsalna musa bi'ayatina wa sultanim mubin
ila fir'auna wa hamana wa qaruna fa qalu sahirung kazzab
fa lamma ja'ahum bil-haqqi min 'indina qaluqtulu abna'allazina amanu ma'ahu wastahyu nisa'ahum, wa ma kaidul-kafirina illa fi dalal
wa qala fir'aunu zaruni aqtul musa walyad'u rabbah, inni akhafu ay yubaddila dinakum au ay yuz-hira fil-ardil-fasad
wa qala musa inni 'uztu birabbi wa rabbikum ming kulli mutakabbiril la yu'minu biyaumil-hisab

wa qala rajulum mu'minum min ali fir'auna yaktumu imanahu a taqtuluna rajulan ay yaqula rabbiyallahu wa qad ja'akum bil-bayyinati mir rabbikum, wa iy yaku kaziban fa 'alaihi kazibuh, wa iy yaku sadiqay yusibkum ba'dullazi ya'idukum, innallaha la yahdi man huwa musrifung kazzab
ya qaumi lakumul-mulkul-yauma zahirina fil-ardi fa may yansuruna mim ba'sillahi in ja'ana, qala fir'aunu ma urikum illa ma ara wa ma ahdikum illa sabilar-rasyad
wa qalallazi amana ya qaumi inni akhafu 'alaikum misla yaumil-ahzab
misla da'bi qaumi nuhiw wa 'adiw wa samuda wallazina mim ba'dihim, wa mallahu yuridu zulmal lil-'ibad
wa ya qaumi inni akhafu 'alaikum yaumat-tanad
yauma tuwalluna mudbirin, ma lakum minallahi min 'asim, wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu min had

wa laqad ja'akum yusufu ming qablu bil-bayyinati fa ma ziltum fi syakkim mimma ja'akum bih, hatta iza halaka qultum lay yab'asallahu mim ba'dihi rasula, kazalika yudillullahu man huwa musrifum murtab,
allazina yujadiluna fi ayatillahi bigairi sultanin atahum, kabura maqtan 'indallahi wa 'indallazina amanu, kazalika yatba'ullahu 'ala kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbar
wa qala fir'aunu ya hamanubni li sar-hal la'alli ablugul-asbab
asbabas-samawati fa attali'a ila ilahi musa wa inni la'azunnuhu kaziba, wa kazalika zuyyina lifir'auna su'u 'amalihi wa sudda 'anis-sabil, wa ma kaidu fir'auna illa fi tabab
wa qalallazi amana ya qaumittabi'uni ahdikum sabilar-rasyad
ya qaumi innama hazihil-hayatud-dun-ya mata'uw wa innal-akhirata hiya darul-qarar
man 'amila sayyi'atan fa la yujza illa mislaha, wa man 'amila saliham min zakarin au unsa wa huwa mu'minun fa ula'ika yadkhulunal-jannata yurzaquna fiha bigairi hisab
wa ya qaumi ma li ad'ukum ilan-najati wa tad'unani ilan-nar
tad'unani li'akfura billahi wa usyrika bihi ma laisa li bihi 'ilmuw wa ana ad'ukum ilal-'azizil-gaffar
la jarama annama tad'unani ilaihi laisa lahu da'watun fid-dun-ya wa la fil-akhirati wa anna maraddana ilallahi wa annal-musrifina hum as-habun-nar
fasatazkuruna ma aqulu lakum, wa ufawwidu amri ilallah, innallaha basirum bil-'ibad
fa waqahullahu sayyi'ati ma makaru wa haqa bi'ali fir'auna su'ul-'azab
an-naru yu'raduna 'alaiha guduwwaw wa 'asyiyya, wa yauma taqumus-sa'ah, adkhilu ala fir'auna asyaddal-'azab
wa iz yatahajjuna fin-nari fa yaqulud-du'afa'u lillazinastakbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fa hal antum mugnuna 'anna nasibam minan-nar
qalallazinastakbaru inna kullun fiha innallaha qad hakama bainal-'ibad
wa qalallazina fin-nari likhazanati jahannamad'u rabbakum yukhaffif 'anna yaumam minal-'azab
qalu a wa lam taku ta'tikum rusulukum bil-bayyinat, qalu bala, qalu fad'u, wa ma du'a'ul-kafirina illa fi dalal
inna lanansuru rusulana wallazina amanu fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa yauma yaqumul-asy-had
yauma la yanfa'uz-zalimina ma'ziratuhum wa lahumul-la'natu wa lahum su'ud-dar
wa laqad ataina musal-huda wa aurasna bani isra'ilal-kitab
hudaw wa zikra li'ulil-albab
fasbir inna wa'dallahi haqquw wastagfir lizambika wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika bil-'asyiyyi wal-ibkar
innallazina yujadiluna fi ayatillahi bigairi sultanin atahum in fi sudurihim illa kibrum ma hum bibaligih, fasta'iz billah, innahu huwas-sami'ul-basir
lakhalqus-samawati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqin-nasi wa lakinna aksaran-nasi la ya'lamun
wa ma yastawil-a'ma wal-basiru wallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati wa lal-musi', qalilam ma tatazakkarun
innas-sa'ata la'atiyatul la raiba fiha wa lakinna aksaran-nasi la yu'minun
wa qala rabbukumud'uni astajib lakum, innallazina yastakbiruna 'an 'ibadati sayadkhuluna jahannama dakhirin
allahullazi ja'ala lakumul-laila litaskunu fihi wan-nahara mubsira, innallaha lazu fadlin 'alan-nasi wa lakinna aksaran-nasi la yasykurun
zalikumullahu rabbukum khaliqu kulli syai', la ilaha illa huwa fa anna tu'fakun
kazalika yu'fakullazina kanu bi'ayatillahi yaj-hadun
allahullazi ja'ala lakumul-arda qararaw was-sama'a bina'aw wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa razaqakum minat-tayyibat, zalikumullahu rabbukum, fa tabarakallahu rabbul-'alamin
huwal-hayyu la ilaha illa huwa fad'uhu mukhlisina lahud-din, al-hamdu lillahi rabbil-'alamin
qul inni nuhitu an a'budallazina tad'una min dunillahi lamma ja'aniyal-bayyinatu mir rabbi wa umirtu an uslima lirabbil-'alamin

huwallazi khalaqakum min turabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa yukhrijukum tiflan summa litablugu asyuddakum summa litakunu syuyukha, wa mingkum may yutawaffa ming qablu wa litablugu ajalam musammaw wa la'allakum ta'qilun
huwallazi yuhyi wa yumit, fa iza qada amran fa innama yaqulu lahu kun fa yakun
a lam tara ilallazina yujadiluna fi ayatillah, anna yusrafun
allazina kazzabu bil-kitabi wa bima arsalna bihi rusulana, fa saufa ya'lamun
izil-aglalu fi a'naqihim was-salasil, yus-habun
fil-hamimi summa fin-nari yusjarun
summa qila lahum aina ma kuntum tusyrikun
min dunillah, qalu dallu 'anna bal lam nakun nad'u ming qablu syai'a, kazalika yudillullahul-kafirin
zalikum bima kuntum tafrahuna fil-ardi bigairil-haqqi wa bima kuntum tamrahun
udkhulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha, fa bi'sa maswal-mutakabbirin
fasbir inna wa'dallahi haqq, fa imma nuriyannaka ba'dallazi na'iduhum au natawaffayannaka fa ilaina yurja'un

wa laqad arsalna rusulam ming qablika min-hum mang qasasna 'alaika wa min-hum mal lam naqsus 'alaik, wa ma kana lirasulin ay ya'tiya bi'ayatin illa bi'iznillah, fa iza ja'a amrullahi qudiya bil-haqqi wa khasira hunalikal-mubtilun
allahullazi ja'ala lakumul-an'ama litarkabu min-ha wa min-ha ta'kulun
wa lakum fiha manafi'u wa litablugu 'alaiha hajatan fi sudurikum wa 'alaiha wa 'alal-fulki tuhmalun
wa yurikum ayatihi fa ayya ayatillahi tungkirun
a fa lam yasiru fil-ardi fa yanzuru kaifa kana 'aqibatullazina ming qablihim, kanu aksara min-hum wa asyadda quwwataw wa asaran fil-ardi fa ma agna 'an-hum ma kanu yaksibun
fa lamma ja'at-hum rusuluhum bil-bayyinati farihu bima 'indahum minal-'ilmi wa haqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un
fa lamma ra'au ba'sana, qalu amanna billahi wahdahu wa kafarna bima kunna bihi musyrikin
fa lam yaku yanfa'uhum imanuhum lamma ra'au ba'sana, sunnatallahillati qad khalat fi 'ibadih, wa khasira hunalikal-kafirun
ha mim
tanzilum minar-rahmanir-rahim
kitabun fussilat ayatuhu qur'anan 'arabiyyal liqaumiy ya'lamun
basyiraw wa nazira, fa a'rada aksaruhum fa hum la yasma'un
wa qalu qulubuna fi akinnatim mimma tad'una ilaihi wa fi azanina waqruw wa mim bainina wa bainika hijabun fa'mal innana 'amilun
qul innama ana basyarum mislukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahuw wahidun fastaqimu ilaihi wastagfiruh, wa wailul lil-musyrikin
allazina la yu'tunaz-zakata wa hum bil-akhirati hum kafirun
innallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati lahum ajrun gairu mamnun
qul a innakum latakfuruna billazi khalaqal-arda fi yaumaini wa taj'aluna lahu andada, zalika rabbul-'alamin
wa ja'ala fiha rawasiya min fauqiha wa baraka fiha wa qaddara fiha aqwataha fi arba'ati ayyam, sawa'al lis-sa'ilin
summastawa ilas-sama'i wa hiya dukhanun fa qala laha wa lil-ardi'tiya tau'an au karha, qalata ataina ta'i'in
fa qadahunna sab'a samawatin fi yaumaini wa auha fi kulli sama'in amraha, wa zayyannas-sama'ad-dun-ya bimasabiha wa hifza, zalika taqdirul-'azizil-'alim
fa in a'radu fa qul anzartukum sa'iqatam misla sa'iqati 'adiw wa samud
iz ja'at-humur-rusulu mim baini aidihim wa min khalfihim alla ta'budu illallah, qalu lau sya'a rabbuna la'anzala mala'ikatan fa inna bima ursiltum bihi kafirun
fa amma 'adun fastakbaru fil-ardi bigairil-haqqi wa qalu man asyaddu minna quwwah, a wa lam yarau annallahallazi khalaqahum huwa asyaddu min-hum quwwah, wa kanu bi'ayatina yaj-hadun
fa arsalna 'alaihim rihan sarsaran fi ayyamin nahisatil linuziqahum 'azabal-khizyi fil-hayatid-dun-ya, wa la'azabul-akhirati akhza wa hum la yunsarun
wa amma samudu fa hadainahum fastahabbul-'ama 'alal-huda fa akhazat-hum sa'iqatul-'azabil-huni bima kanu yaksibun
wa najjainallazina amanu wa kanu yattaqun
wa yauma yuhsyaru a'da'ullahi ilan-nari fa hum yuza'un
hatta iza ma ja'uha syahida 'alaihim sam'uhum wa absaruhum wa juluduhum bima kanu ya'malun
wa qalu lijuludihim lima syahittum 'alaina, qalu antaqanallahullazi antaqa kulla syai'iw wa huwa khalaqakum awwala marratiw wa ilaihi turja'un
wa ma kuntum tastatiruna ay yasy-hada 'alaikum sam'ukum wa la absarukum wa la juludukum wa lakin zanantum annallaha la ya'lamu kasiram mimma ta'malun
wa zalikum zannukumullazi zanantum birabbikum ardakum fa asbahtum minal-khasirin
fa iy yasbiru fan-naru maswal lahum, wa iy yasta'tibu fa ma hum minal-mu'tabin
wa qayyadna lahum qurana'a fa zayyanu lahum ma baina aidihim wa ma khalfahum wa haqqa 'alaihimul-qaulu fi umaming qad khalat ming qablihim minal-jinni wal-ins, innahum kanu khasirin
wa qalallazina kafaru la tasma'u lihazal-qur'ani walgau fihi la'allakum taglibun
fa lanuziqannallazina kafaru 'azaban syadidaw wa lanajziyannahum aswa'allazi kanu ya'malun
zalika jaza'u a'da'illahin-naru lahum fiha darul-khuld, jaza'am bima kanu bi'ayatina yaj-hadun
wa qalallazina kafaru rabbana arinallazaini adallana minal-jinni wal-insi naj'al-huma tahta aqdamina liyakuna minal-asfalin
innallazina qalu rabbunallahu summastaqamu tatanazzalu 'alaihimul-mala'ikatu alla takhafu wa la tahzanu wa absyiru bil-jannatillati kuntum tu'adun
nahnu auliya'ukum fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa fil-akhirah, wa lakum fiha ma tasytahi anfusukum wa lakum fiha ma tadda'un
nuzulam min gafurir rahim
wa man ahsanu qaulam mim man da'a ilallahi wa 'amila salihaw wa qala innani minal-muslimin
wa la tastawil-hasanatu wa las-sayyi'ah, idfa' billati hiya ahsanu fa izallazi bainaka wa bainahu 'adawatung ka'annahu waliyyun hamim
wa ma yulaqqaha illallazina sabaru, wa ma yulaqqaha illa zu hazzin 'azim
wa imma yanzagannaka minasy-syaitani nazgun fasta'iz billah, innahu huwas-sami'ul-'alim
wa min ayatihil-lailu wan-naharu wasy-syamsu wal-qamar, la tasjudu lisy-syamsi wa la lil-qamari wasjudu lillahillazi khalaqahunna ing kuntum iyyahu ta'budun
fa inistakbaru fallazina 'inda rabbika yusabbihuna lahu bil-laili wan-nahari wa hum la yas'amun
wa min ayatihi annaka taral-arda khasyi'atan fa iza anzalna 'alaihal-ma'ahtazzat wa rabat, innallazi ahyaha lamuhyil-mauta, innahu 'ala kulli syai'ing qadir
innallazina yul-hiduna fi ayatina la yakhfauna 'alaina, a fa may yulqa fin-nari khairun am may ya'ti aminay yaumal-qiyamah, i'malu ma syi'tum innahu bima ta'maluna basir
innallazina kafaru biz-zikri lamma ja'ahum, wa innahu lakitabun 'aziz
la ya'tihil-batilu mim baini yadaihi wa la min khalfih, tanzilum min hakimin hamid
ma yuqalu laka illa ma qad qila lir-rusuli ming qablik, inna rabbaka lazu magfiratiw wa zu 'iqabin alim

walau ja'alnahu qur'anan a'jamiyyal laqalu lau la fussilat ayatuh, a a'jamiyyuw wa 'arabiyy, qul huwa lillazina amanu hudaw wa syifa', wallazina la yu'minuna fi azanihim waqruw wa huwa 'alaihim 'ama, ula'ika yunadauna mim makanim ba'id
wa laqad ataina musal-kitaba fakhtulifa fih, walau la kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika laqudiya bainahum, wa innahum lafi syakkim min-hu murib
man 'amila salihan falinafsihi wa man asa'a fa 'alaiha, wa ma rabbuka bizallamil lil-'abid
ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus-sa'ah, wa ma takhruju min samaratim min akmamiha wa ma tahmilu min unsa wa la tada'u illa bi'ilmih, wa yauma yunadihim aina syuraka'i qalu azannaka ma minna min syahid
wa dalla 'an-hum ma kanu yad'una ming qablu wa zannu ma lahum mim mahis
la yas'amul-insanu min du'a'il-khairi wa im massahusy-syarru fa ya'usung qanut

wa la'in azaqnahu rahmatam minna mim ba'di darra'a massat-hu layaqulanna haza li wa ma azunnus-sa'ata qa'imataw wa la'ir ruji'tu ila rabbi inna li 'indahu lal-husna, fa lanunabbi'annallazina kafaru bima 'amilu wa lanuziqannahum min 'azabin galiz
wa iza an'amna 'alal-insani a'rada wa na'a bijanibih, wa iza massahusy-syarru fa zu du'a'in 'arid
qul a ra'aitum ing kana min 'indillahi summa kafartum bihi man adallu mim man huwa fi syiqaqim ba'id
sanurihim ayatina fil-afaqi wa fi anfusihim hatta yatabayyana lahum annahul-haqq, a wa lam yakfi birabbika annahu 'ala kulli syai'in syahid
ala innahum fi miryatim mil liqa'i rabbihim, ala innahu bikulli syai'im muhit
ha mim
'Ain sin qaf
kazalika yuhi ilaika wa ilallazina ming qablikallahul-'azizul-hakim
lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard, wa huwal-'aliyyul-'azim
takadus-samawatu yatafattarna min fauqihinna wal-mala'ikatu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wa yastagfiruna liman fil-ard, ala innallaha huwal-gafurur-rahim
wallazinattakhazu min dunihi auliya'allahu hafizun 'alaihim wa ma anta 'alaihim biwakil
wa kazalika auhaina ilaika qur'anan 'arabiyyal litunzira ummal-qura wa man haulaha wa tunzira yaumal-jam'i la raiba fih, fariqun fil-jannati wa fariqun fis-sa'ir
walau sya'allahu laja'alahum ummataw wahidataw wa lakiy yudkhilu may yasya'u fi rahmatih, waz-zalimuna ma lahum miw waliyyiw wa la nasir
amittakhazu min dunihi auliya', fallahu huwal-waliyyu wa huwa yuhyil-mauta wa huwa 'ala kulli syai'ing qadir
wa makhtalaftum fihi min syai'in fa hukmuhu ilallah, zalikumullahu rabbi 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi unib
fatirus-samawati wal-ard, ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajaw wa minal-an'ami azwaja, yazra'ukum fih, laisa kamislihi syai', wa huwas-sami'ul-basir
lahu maqalidus-samawati wal-ard, yabsutur-rizqa limay yasya'u wa yaqdir, innahu bikulli syai'in 'alim

syara'a lakum minad-dini ma wassa bihi nuhaw wallazi auhaina ilaika wa ma wassaina bihi ibrahima wa musa wa 'isa an aqimud-dina wa la tatafarraqu fih, kabura 'alal-musyrikina ma tad'uhum ilaih, allahu yajtabi ilaihi may yasya'u wa yahdi ilaihi may yunib

wa ma tafarraqu illa mim ba'di ma ja'ahumul-'ilmu bagyam bainahum, walau la kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika ila ajalim musammal laqudiya bainahum, wa innallazina urisul-kitaba mim ba'dihim lafi syakkim min-hu murib

fa lizalika fad', wastaqim kama umirt, wa la tattabi' ahwa'ahum, wa qul amantu bima anzalallahu ming kitab, wa umirtu li'a'dila bainakum, allahu rabbuna wa rabbukum, lana a'maluna wa lakum a'malukum, la hujjata bainana wa bainakum, allahu yajma'u bainana, wa ilaihil-masir
wallazina yuhajjuna fillahi mim ba'di mastujiba lahu hujjatuhum dahidatun 'inda rabbihim wa 'alaihim gadabuw wa lahum 'azabun syadid
allahullazi anzalal-kitaba bil-haqqi wal mizan, wa ma yudrika la'allas-sa'ata qarib
yasta'jilu bihallazina la yu'minuna biha, wallazina amanu musyfiquna min-ha wa ya'lamuna annahal-haqq, ala innallazina yumaruna fis-sa'ati lafi dalalim ba'id
allahu latifum bi'ibadihi yarzuqu may yasya', wa huwal-qawiyyul-'aziz
mang kana yuridu harsal-akhirati nazid lahu fi harsih, wa mang kana yuridu harsad-dun-ya nu'tihi min-ha wa ma lahu fil-akhirati min nasib
am lahum syuraka'u syara'u lahum minad-dini ma lam ya'zam bihillah, walau la kalimatul-fasli laqudiya bainahum, wa innaz-zalimina lahum 'azabun alim
taraz-zalimina musyfiqina mimma kasabu wa huwa waqi'um bihim, wallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati fi raudatil-jannat, lahum ma yasya'una 'inda rabbihim, zalika huwal-fadlul-kabir

zalikallazi yubasysyirullahu 'ibadahullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihat, qul la as'alukum 'alaihi ajran illal-mawaddata fil-qurba, wa may yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahu fiha husna, innallaha gafurun syakur
am yaqulunaftara 'alallahi kaziba, fa iy yasya'illahu yakhtim 'ala qalbik, wa yam-hullahul-batila wa yuhiqqul-haqqa bikalimatih, innahu 'alimum bizatis-sudur
wa huwallazi yaqbalut-taubata 'an 'ibadihi wa ya'fu 'anis-sayyi'ati wa ya'lamu ma taf'alun
wa yastajibullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati wa yaziduhum min fadlih, wal-kafiruna lahum 'azabun syadid
walau basatallahur-rizqa li'ibadihi labagau fil-ardi wa lakiy yunazzilu biqadarim ma yasya', innahu bi'ibadihi khabirum basir
wa huwallazi yunazzilul-gaisa mim ba'di ma qanatu wa yansyuru rahmatah, wa huwal-waliyyul-hamid
wa min ayatihi khalqus-samawati wal-ardi wa ma bassa fihima min dabbah, wa huwa 'ala jam'ihim iza yasya'u qadir
wa ma asabakum mim musibatin fa bima kasabat aidikum wa ya'fu 'ang kasir
wa ma antum bimu'jizina fil-ard, wa ma lakum min dunillahi miw waliyyiw wa la nasir
wa min ayatihil-jawari fil-bahri kal-a'lam
iy yasya' yuskinir-riha fa yazlalna rawakida 'ala zahrih, inna fi zalika la'ayatil likulli sabbarin syakur
au yubiq-hunna bima kasabu wa ya'fu 'ang kasir
wa ya'lamallazina yujadiluna fi ayatina, ma lahum mim mahis
fa ma utitum min syai'in fa mata'ul-hayatid-dun-ya, wa ma 'indallahi khairuw wa abqa lillazina amanu wa 'ala rabbihim yatawakkalun
wallazina yajtanibuna kaba'iral-ismi wal-fawahisya wa iza ma gadibu hum yagfirun
wallazinastajabu lirabbihim wa aqamus-salata wa amruhum syura bainahum wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqun
wallazina iza asabahumul-bagyu hum yantasirun
wa jaza'u sayyi'atin sayyi'atum misluha, fa man 'afa wa aslaha fa ajruhu 'alallah, innahu la yuhibbuz-zalimin
wa lamanintasara ba'da zulmihi fa ula'ika ma 'alaihim min sabil
innamas-sabilu 'alallazina yazlimunan-nasa wa yabguna fil-ardi bigairil-haqq, ula'ika lahum 'azabun alim
wa laman sabara wa gafara inna zalika lamin 'azmil-umur
wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu miw waliyyim mim ba'dih, wa taraz-zalimina lamma ra'awul-'azaba yaquluna hal ila maraddim min sabil

wa tarahum yu'raduna 'alaiha khasyi'ina minaz-zulli yanzuruna min tarfin khafiyy, wa qalallazina amanu innal-khasirinallazina khasiru anfusahum wa ahlihim yaumal-qiyamah, ala innaz-zalimina fi 'azabim muqim
wa ma kana lahum min auliya'a yansurunahum min dunillah, wa may yudlilillahu fa ma lahu min sabil
istajibu lirabbikum ming qabli ay ya'tiya yaumul la maradda lahu minallah, ma lakum mim malja'iy yauma'iziw wa ma lakum min nakir
fa in a'radu fa ma arsalnaka 'alaihim hafiza, in 'alaika illal-balag, wa inna iza azaqnal-insana minna rahmatan fariha biha, wa in tusib-hum sayyi'atum bima qaddamat aidihim fa innal-insana kafur
lillahi mulkus-samawati wal-ard, yakhluqu ma yasya', yahabu limay yasya'u inasaw wa yahabu limay yasya'uz-zukur
au yuzawwijuhum zukranaw wa inasa, wa yaj'alu may yasya'u 'aqima, innahu 'alimung qadir
wa ma kana libasyarin ay yukallimahullahu illa wahyan au miw wara'i hijabin au yursila rasulan fa yuhiya bi'iznihi ma yasya', innahu 'aliyyun hakim
wa kazalika auhaina ilaika ruham min amrina, ma kunta tadri mal-kitabu wa lal-imanu wa lakin ja'alnahu nuran nahdi bihi man nasya'u min 'ibadina, wa innaka latahdi ila siratim mustaqim
siratillahillazi lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard, ala ilallahi tasirul-umur
ha mim
wal-kitabil-mubin
inna ja'alnahu qur'anan 'arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qilun
wa innahu fi ummil-kitabi ladaina la'aliyyun hakim
a fa nadribu 'angkumuz-zikra saf-han ang kuntum qaumam musrifin
wa kam arsalna min nabiyyin fil-awwalin
wa ma ya'tihim min nabiyyin illa kanu bihi yastahzi'un
fa ahlakna asyadda min-hum batsyaw wa mada masalul-awwalin
wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna khalaqahunnal-'azizul-'alim
allazi ja'ala lakumul-arda mahdaw wa ja'ala lakum fiha subulal la'allakum tahtadun
wallazi nazzala minas-sama'i ma'am biqadar, fa ansyarna bihi baldatam maita, kazalika tukhrajun
wallazi khalaqal-azwaja kullaha wa ja'ala lakum minal-fulki wal-an'ami ma tarkabun
litastawu 'ala zuhurihi summa tazkuru ni'mata rabbikum izastawaitum 'alaihi wa taqulu sub-hanallazi sakhkhara lana haza wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin
wa inna ila rabbina lamungqalibun
wa ja'alu lahu min 'ibadihi juz'a, innal-insana lakafurum mubin
amittakhaza mimma yakhluqu banatiw wa asfakum bil-banin
wa iza busysyira ahaduhum bima daraba lir-rahmani masalan zalla waj-huhu muswaddaw wa huwa kazim
a wa may yunasysya'u fil-hilyati wa huwa fil-khisami gairu mubin
wa ja'alul-mala'ikatallazina hum 'ibadur-rahmani inasa, a syahidu khalqahum, satuktabu syahadatuhum wa yus'alun
wa qalu lau sya'ar-rahmanu ma 'abadnahum, ma lahum bizalika min 'ilmin in hum illa yakhrusun
am atainahum kitabam ming qablihi fa hum bihi mustamsikun
bal qalu inna wajadna aba'ana 'ala ummatiw wa inna 'ala asarihim muhtadun
wa kazalika ma arsalna ming qablika fi qaryatim min nazirin illa qala mutrafuha inna wajadna aba'ana 'ala ummatiw wa inna 'ala asarihim muqtadun
qala a walau ji'tukum bi'ahda mimma wajattum 'alaihi aba'akum, qalu inna bima ursiltum bihi kafirun
fantaqamna min-hum fanzur kaifa kana 'aqibatul-mukazzibin
wa iz qala ibrahimu li'abihi wa qaumihi innani bara'um mimma ta'budun
illallazi fatarani fa innahu sayahdin
wa ja'alaha kalimatam baqiyatan fi 'aqibihi la'allahum yarji'un
bal matta'tu ha'ula'i wa aba'ahum hatta ja'ahumul-haqqu wa rasulum mubin
wa lamma ja'ahumul-haqqu qalu haza sihruw wa inna bihi kafirun
wa qalu lau la nuzzila hazal-qur'anu 'ala rajulim minal-qaryataini 'azim

a hum yaqsimuna rahmata rabbik, nahnu qasamna bainahum ma'isyatahum fil-hayatid-dun-ya wa rafa'na ba'dahum fauqa ba'din darajatil liyattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyya, wa rahmatu rabbika khairum mimma yajma'un
walau la ay yakunan-nasu ummataw wahidatal laja'alna limay yakfuru bir-rahmani libuyutihim suqufam min fiddatiw wa ma'arija 'alaiha yaz-harun
wa libuyutihim abwabaw wa sururan 'alaiha yattaki'un
wa zukhrufa, wa ing kullu zalika lamma mata'ul-hayatid-dun-ya, wal-akhiratu 'inda rabbika lil-muttaqin
wa may ya'syu 'an zikrir-rahmani nuqayyid lahu syaitanan fa huwa lahu qarin
wa innahum layasuddunahum 'anis-sabili wa yahsabuna annahum muhtadun
hatta iza ja'ana qala ya laita baini wa bainaka bu'dal-masyriqaini fa bi'sal-qarin
wa lay yanfa'akumul-yauma iz zalamtum annakum fil-'azabi musytarikun
a fa anta tusmi'us-summa au tahdil-'umya wa mang kana fi dalalim mubin
fa imma naz-habanna bika fa inna min-hum muntaqimun
au nuriyannakallazi wa'adnahum fa inna 'alaihim muqtadirun
fastamsik billazi uhiya ilaik, innaka 'ala siratim mustaqim
wa innahu lazikrul laka wa liqaumik, wa saufa tus'alun
was'al man arsalna ming qablika mir rusulina a ja'alna min dunir-rahmani alihatay yu'badun
wa laqad arsalna musa bi'ayatina ila fir'auna wa mala'ihi fa qala inni rasulu rabbil-'alamin
fa lamma ja'ahum bi'ayatina iza hum min-ha yad-hakun
wa ma nurihim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min ukhtiha, wa akhaznahum bil-'azabi la'allahum yarji'un
wa qalu ya ayyuhas-sahirud'u lana rabbaka bima 'ahida 'indak, innana lamuhtadun
fa lamma kasyafna 'an-humul-'azaba iza hum yangkusun
wa nada fir'aunu fi qaumihi qala ya qaumi a laisa li mulku misra wa hazihil-an-haru tajri min tahti, a fa la tubsirun
am ana khairum min hazallazi huwa mahinuw wa la yakadu yubin
falau la ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratum min zahabin au ja'a ma'ahul-mala'ikatu muqtarinin
fastakhaffa qaumahu fa ata'uh, innahum kanu qauman fasiqin
fa lamma asafunantaqamna min-hum fa agraqnahum ajma'in
fa ja'alnahum salafaw wa masalal lil-akhirin
wa lamma duribabnu maryama masalan iza qaumuka min-hu yasiddun
wa qalu a alihatuna khairun am huw, ma darabuhu laka illa jadala, bal hum qaumun khasimun
in huwa illa 'abdun an'amna 'alaihi wa ja'alnahu masalal libani isra'il
walau nasya'u laja'alna mingkum mala'ikatan fil-ardi yakhlufun
wa innahu la'ilmul lis-sa'ati fa la tamtarunna biha wattabi'un, haza siratum mustaqim
wa la yasuddannakumusy-syaitan, innahu lakum 'aduwwum mubin
wa lamma ja'a 'isa bil-bayyinati qala qad ji'tukum bil-hikmati wa li'ubayyina lakum ba'dallazi takhtalifuna fih, fattaqullaha wa ati'un
innallaha huwa rabbi wa rabbukum fa'buduh, haza siratum mustaqim
fakhtalafal-ahzabu mim bainihim, fa wailul lillazina zalamu min 'azabi yaumin alim
hal yanzuruna illas-sa'ata an ta'tiyahum bagtataw wa hum la yasy'urun
al-akhilla'u yauma'izim ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal-muttaqin
ya 'ibadi la khaufun 'alaikumul-yauma wa la antum tahzanun
allazina amanu bi'ayatina wa kanu muslimin
udkhulul-jannata antum wa azwajukum tuhbarun
yutafu 'alaihim bisihafim min zahabiw wa akwab, wa fiha ma tasytahihil-anfusu wa talazzul-a'yun, wa antum fiha khalidun
wa tilkal-jannatullati uristumuha bima kuntum ta'malun
lakum fiha fakihatung kasiratum min-ha ta'kulun
innal-mujrimina fi 'azabi jahannama khalidun
la yufattaru 'an-hum wa hum fihi mublisun
wa ma zalamnahum wa laking kanu humuz-zalimin
wa nadau ya maliku liyaqdi 'alaina rabbuk, qala innakum makisun
laqad ji'nakum bil-haqqi wa lakinna aksarakum lil-haqqi karihun
am abramu amran fa inna mubrimun
am yahsabuna anna la nasma'u sirrahum wa najwahum, bala wa rusuluna ladaihim yaktubun
qul ing kana lir-rahmani waladun fa ana awwalul-'abidin
sub-hana rabbis-samawati wal-ardi rabbil-'arsyi 'amma yasifun
fa zar-hum yakhudu wa yal'abu hatta yulaqu yaumahumullazi yu'adun
wa huwallazi fis-sama'i ilahuw wa fil-ardi ilah, wa huwal-hakimul-'alim
wa tabarakallazi lahu mulkus-samawati wal-ardi wa ma bainahuma, wa 'indahu 'ilmus-sa'ah, wa ilaihi turja'un
wa la yamlikullazina yad'una min dunihisy-syafa'ata illa man syahida bil-haqqi wa hum ya'lamun
wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqahum layaqulunnallahu fa anna yu'fakun
wa qilihi ya rabbi inna ha'ula'i qaumul la yu'minun
fasfah 'an-hum wa qul salam, fa saufa ya'lamun
ha mim
wal-kitabil-mubin
inna anzalnahu fi lailatim mubarakatin inna kunna munzirin
fiha yufraqu kullu amrin hakim
amram min 'indina, inna kunna mursilin
rahmatam mir rabbik, innahu huwas-sami'ul-'alim
rabbis-samawati wal-ardi wa ma bainahuma, ing kuntum muqinin
la ilaha illa huwa yuhyi wa yumit, rabbukum wa rabbu aba'ikumul-awwalin
bal hum fi syakkiy yal'abun
fartaqib yauma ta'tis-sama'u bidukhanim mubin
yagsyan-nas, haza 'azabun alim
rabbanaksyif 'annal-'azaba inna mu'minun
anna lahumuz-zikra wa qad ja'ahum rasulum mubin
summa tawallau 'an-hu wa qalu mu'allamum majnun
inna kasyiful-'azabi qalilan innakum 'a'idun
yauma nabtisyul-batsyatal-kubra, inna muntaqimun
wa laqad fatanna qablahum qauma fir'auna wa ja'ahum rasulung karim
an addu ilayya 'ibadallah, inni lakum rasulun amin
wa al la ta'lu 'alallah, inni atikum bisultanim mubin
wa inni 'uztu birabbi wa rabbikum an tarjumun
wa il lam tu'minu li fa'tazilun
fa da'a rabbahu anna ha'ula'i qaumum mujrimun
fa asri bi'ibadi lailan innakum muttaba'un
watrukil-bahra rahwa, innahum jundum mugraqun
kam taraku min jannatiw wa 'uyun
wa zuru'iw wa maqaming karim
wa na'mating kanu fiha fakihin
kazalik, wa aurasnaha qauman akharin
fa ma bakat 'alaihimus-sama'u wal-ard, wa ma kanu munzarin
wa laqad najjaina bani isra'ila minal-'azabil-muhin
min fir'aun, innahu kana 'aliyam minal-musrifin
wa laqadikhtarnahum 'ala 'ilmin 'alal-'alamin
wa atainahum minal-ayati ma fihi bala'um mubin
inna ha'ula'i layaqulun
in hiya illa mautatunal-ula wa ma nahnu bimunsyarin
fa'tu bi'aba'ina ing kuntum sadiqin
a hum khairun am qaumu tubba'iw wallazina ming qablihim, ahlaknahum innahum kanu mujrimin
wa ma khalaqnas-samawati wal-arda wa ma bainahuma la'ibin
ma khalaqnahuma illa bil-haqqi wa lakinna aksarahum la ya'lamun
inna yaumal-fasli miqatuhum ajma'in
yauma la yugni maulan 'am maulan syai'aw wa la hum yunsarun
illa mar rahimallah, innahu huwal-'azizur-rahim
inna syajarataz-zaqqum
ta'amul-asim
kal-muhli yagli fil-butun
kagalyil-hamim
khuzuhu fa'tiluhu ila sawa'il-jahim
summa subbu fauqa ra'sihi min 'azabil-hamim
zuq, innaka antal-'azizul-karim
inna haza ma kuntum bihi tamtarun
innal-muttaqina fi maqamin amin
fi jannatiw wa 'uyun
yalbasuna min sundusiw wa istabraqim mutaqabilin
kazalik, wa zawwajnahum bihurin 'in
yad'una fiha bikulli fakihatin aminin
la yazuquna fihal-mauta illal-mautatal-ula, wa waqahum 'azabal-jahim
fadlam mir rabbik, zalika huwal-fauzul-'azim
fa innama yassarnahu bilisanika la'allahum yatazakkarun
fartaqib innahum murtaqibun
ha mim
tanzilul-kitabi minallahil-'azizil-hakim
inna fis-samawati wal-ardi la'ayatil lil-mu'minin
wa fi khalqikum wa ma yabussu min dabbatin ayatul liqaumiy yuqinun
wakhtilafil-laili wan-nahari wa ma anzalallahu minas-sama'i mir rizqin fa ahya bihil-arda ba'da mautiha wa tasrifir-riyahi ayatul liqaumiy ya'qilun
tilka ayatullahi natluha 'alaika bil-haqq, fa bi'ayyi hadisim ba'dallahi wa ayatihi yu'minun
wailul likulli affakin asim
yasma'u ayatillahi tutla 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbirang ka'al lam yasma'ha, fa basysyir-hu bi'azabin alim
wa iza 'alima min ayatina syai'anittakhazaha huzuwa, ula'ika lahum 'azabum muhin
miw wara'ihim jahannam, wa la yugni 'an-hum ma kasabu syai'aw wa la mattakhazu min dunillahi auliya', wa lahum 'azabun 'azim
haza huda, wallazina kafaru bi'ayati rabbihim lahum 'azabum mir rijzin alim
allahullazi sakhkhara lakumul-bahra litajriyal-fulku fihi bi'amrihi wa litabtagu min fadlihi wa la'allakum tasykurun
wa sakhkhara lakum ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ardi jami'am min-h, inna fi zalika la'ayatil liqaumiy yatafakkarun
qul lillazina amanu yagfiru lillazina la yarjuna ayyamallahi liyajziya qaumam bima kanu yaksibun
man 'amila salihan fa linafsih, wa man asa'a fa 'alaiha summa ila rabbikum turja'un
wa laqad ataina bani isra'ilal-kitaba wal-hukma wan-nubuwwata wa razaqnahum minat-tayyibati wa faddalnahum 'alal-'alamin
wa atainahum bayyinatim minal-amr, fa makhtalafu illa mim ba'di ma ja'ahumul-'ilmu bagyam bainahum, inna rabbaka yaqdi bainahum yaumal-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifun
summa ja'alnaka 'ala syari'atim minal-amri fattabi'ha wa la tattabi' ahwa'allazina la ya'lamun
innahum lay yugnu 'angka minallahi syai'a, wa innaz-zalimina ba'duhum auliya'u ba'd, wallahu waliyyul-muttaqin
haza basa'iru lin-nasi wa hudaw wa rahmatul liqaumiy yuqinun
am hasiballazinajtarahus-sayyi'ati an naj'alahum kallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati sawa'am mahyahum wa mamatuhum, sa'a ma yahkumun
wa khalaqallahus-samawati wal-arda bil-haqqi wa litujza kullu nafsim bima kasabat wa hum la yuzlamun
a fa ra'aita manittakhaza ilahahu hawahu wa adallahullahu 'ala 'ilmiw wa khatama 'ala sam'ihi wa qalbihi wa ja'ala 'ala basarihi gisyawah, fa may yahdihi mim ba'dillah, a fa la tazakkarun
wa qalu ma hiya illa hayatunad-dun-ya namutu wa nahya wa ma yuhlikuna illad-dahr, wa ma lahum bizalika min 'ilm, in hum illa yazunnun
wa iza tutla 'alaihim ayatuna bayyinatim ma kana hujjatahum illa ang qalu'tu bi'aba'ina ing kuntum sadiqin
qulillahu yuhyikum summa yumitukum summa yajma'ukum ila yaumil-qiyamati la raiba fihi wa lakinna aksaran-nasi la ya'lamun
wa lillahi mulkus-samawati wal-ard, wa yauma taqumus-sa'atu yauma'iziy yakhsarul-mubtilun
wa tara kulla ummatin jasiyah, kullu ummatin tud'a ila kitabiha, al-yauma tujzauna ma kuntum ta'malun
haza kitabuna yantiqu 'alaikum bil-haqq, inna kunna nastansikhu ma kuntum ta'malun
fa ammallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati fa yudkhiluhum rabbuhum fi rahmatih, zalika huwal-fauzul-mubin
wa ammallazina kafaru, a fa lam takun ayati tutla 'alaikum fastakbartum wa kuntum qaumam mujrimin
wa iza qila inna wa'dallahi haqquw was-sa'atu la raiba fiha qultum ma nadri mas-sa'atu in nazunnu illa zannaw wa ma nahnu bimustaiqinin
wa bada lahum sayyi'atu ma 'amilu wa haqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un
wa qilal-yauma nansakum kama nasitum liqa'a yaumikum haza wa ma'wakumun-naru wa ma lakum min nasirin
zalikum bi'annakumuttakhaztum ayatillahi huzuwaw wa garratkumul-hayatud-dun-ya, fal-yauma la yukhrajuna min-ha wa la hum yusta'tabun
fa lillahil-hamdu rabbis-samawati wa rabbil-ardi rabbil-'alamin
wa lahul-kibriya'u fis-samawati wal-ard, wa huwal-'azizul-hakim
ha mim
tanzilul-kitabi minallahil-'azizil-hakim
ma khalaqnas-samawati wal-arda wa ma bainahuma illa bil-haqqi wa ajalim musamman, wallazina kafaru 'amma unziru mu'ridun
qul a ra'aitum ma tad'una min dunillahi aruni maza khalaqu minal-ardi am lahum syirkun fis-samawati'tuni bikitabim ming qabli haza au asaratim min 'ilmin ing kuntum sadiqin
wa man adallu mim may yad'u min dunillahi mal la yastajibu lahu ila yaumil-qiyamati wa hum 'an du'a'ihim gafilun
wa iza husyiran-nasu kanu lahum a'da'aw wa kanu bi'ibadatihim kafirin
wa iza tutla 'alaihim ayatuna bayyinating qalallazina kafaru lil-haqqi lamma ja'ahum haza sihrum mubin
am yaqulunaftarah, qul iniftaraituhu fa la tamlikuna li minallahi syai'a, huwa a'lamu bima tufiduna fih, kafa bihi syahidam baini wa bainakum, wa huwal-gafurur-rahim
qul ma kuntu bid'am minar-rusuli wa ma adri ma yuf'alu bi wa la bikum, in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya wa ma ana illa nazirum mubin
qul ara'aitum ing kana min 'indillahi wa kafartum bihi wa syahida syahidum mim bani isra'ila 'ala mislihi fa amana wastakbartum, innallaha la yahdil-qaumaz-zalimin
wa qalallazina kafaru lillazina amanu lau kana khairam ma sabaquna ilaih, wa iz lam yahtadu bihi fa sayaquluna haza ifkung qadim
wa ming qablihi kitabu musa imamaw wa rahmah, wa haza kitabum musaddiqul lisanan 'arabiyyal liyunzirallazina zalamu wa busyra lil-muhsinin
innallazina qalu rabbunallahu summastaqamu fa la khaufun 'alaihim wa la hum yahzanun
ula'ika as-habul-jannati khalidina fiha, jaza'am bima kanu ya'malun

wa wassainal-insana biwalidaihi ihsana, hamalat-hu ummuhu kurhaw wa wada'at-hu kurha, wa hamluhu wa fisaluhu salasuna syahra, hatta iza balaga asyuddahu wa balaga arba'ina sanatang qala rabbi auzi'ni an asykura ni'matakallati an'amta 'alayya wa 'ala walidayya wa an a'mala salihan tardahu wa aslih li fi zurriyyati, inni tubtu ilaika wa inni minal-muslimin
ula'ikallazina nataqabbalu 'an-hum ahsana ma 'amilu wa natajawazu 'an sayyi'atihim fi as-habil-jannah, wa'das-sidqillazi kanu yu'adun
wallazi qala liwalidaihi uffil lakuma ata'idanini an ukhraja wa qad khalatil-qurunu ming qabli, wa huma yastagisanillaha wailaka amin inna wa'dallahi haqq, fa yaqulu ma haza illa asatirul-awwalin
ula'ikallazina haqqa 'alaihimul-qaulu fi umaming qad khalat ming qablihim minal-jinni wal-ins, innahum kanu khasirin
wa likullin darajatum mimma 'amilu, wa liyuwaffiyahum a'malahum wa hum la yuzlamun

wa yauma yu'radullazina kafaru 'alan-nar, az-habtum tayyibatikum fi hayatikumud-dun-ya wastamta'tum biha, fal-yauma tujzauna 'azabal-huni bima kuntum tastakbiruna fil-ardi bigairil-haqqi wa bima kuntum tafsuqun
wazkur akha 'ad, iz anzara qaumahu bil-ahqafi wa qad khalatin-nuzuru mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihi alla ta'budu illallah, inni akhafu 'alaikum 'azaba yaumin 'azim
qalu a ji'tana lita'fikana 'an alihatina, fa'tina bima ta'iduna ing kunta minas-sadiqin
qala innamal-'ilmu 'indallahi wa uballigukum ma ursiltu bihi wa lakinni arakum qauman taj-halun
fa lamma ra'auhu 'aridam mustaqbila audiyatihim qalu haza 'aridum mumtiruna, bal huwa masta'jaltum bih, rihun fiha 'azabun alim
tudammiru kulla syai'im bi'amri rabbiha fa'asbahu la yura illa masakinuhum, kazalika najzil-qaumal-mujrimin

wa laqad makkannahum fima im makkannakum fihi wa ja'alna lahum sam'aw wa absaraw wa af'idatan fa ma agna 'an-hum sam'uhum wa la absaruhum wa la af'idatuhum min syai'in iz kanu yaj-haduna bi'ayatillahi wa haqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahzi'un
wa laqad ahlakna ma haulakum minal-qura wa sarrafnal-ayati la'allahum yarji'un
falau la nasarahumullazinattakhazu min dunillahi qurbanan alihah, bal dallu 'an-hum, wa zalika ifkuhum wa ma kanu yaftarun
wa iz sarafna ilaika nafaram minal-jinni yastami'unal-qur'an, fa lamma hadaruhu qalu ansitu, fa lamma qudiya wallau ila qaumihim munzirin
qalu ya qaumana inna sami'na kitaban unzila mim ba'di musa musaddiqal lima baina yadaihi yahdi ilal-haqqi wa ila tariqim mustaqim
ya qaumana ajibu da'iyallahi wa aminu bihi yagfir lakum min zunubikum wa yujirkum min 'azabin alim
wa mal la yujib da'iyallahi fa laisa bimu'jizin fil-ardi wa laisa lahu min dunihi auliya', ula'ika fi dalalim mubin
a wa lam yarau annallahallazi khalaqas-samawati wal-arda wa lam ya'ya bikhalqihinna biqadirin 'ala ay yuhyiyal-mauta, bala innahu 'ala kulli syai'ing qadir
wa yauma yu'radullazina kafaru 'alan-nar, a laisa haza bil-haqq, qalu bala wa rabbina, qala fa zuqul-'azaba bima kuntum takfurun
fasbir kama sabara ulul-'azmi minar-rusuli wa la tasta'jil lahum, ka'annahum yauma yarauna ma yu'aduna lam yalbasu illa sa'atam min nahar, balag, fa hal yuhlaku illal-qaumul-fasiqun
allazina kafaru wa saddu 'an sabilillahi adalla a'malahum
wallazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati wa amanu bima nuzzila 'ala muhammadiw wa huwal-haqqu mir rabbihim, kaffara 'an-hum sayyi'atihim wa aslaha balahum
zalika bi'annallazina kafaruttaba'ul-batila wa annallazina amanuttaba'ul-haqqa mir rabbihim, kazalika yadribullahu lin-nasi amsalahum

fa iza laqitumullazina kafaru fa darbar-riqab, hatta iza askhantumuhum fa syuddul-wasaqa fa imma mannam ba'du wa imma fida'an hatta tada'al-harbu auzaraha, zalika walau yasya'ullahu lantasara min-hum wa lakil liyabluwa ba'dakum biba'd, wallazina qutilu fi sabilillahi fa lay yudilla a'malahum
sayahdihim wa yuslihu balahum
wa yudkhiluhumul-jannata 'arrafaha lahum
ya ayyuhallazina amanu in tansurullaha yansurkum wa yusabbit aqdamakum
wallazina kafaru fa ta'sal lahum wa adalla a'malahum
zalika bi'annahum karihu ma anzalallahu fa ahbata a'malahum
a fa lam yasiru fil-ardi fa yanzuru kaifa kana 'aqibatullazina ming qablihim, dammarallahu 'alaihim wa lil-kafirina amsaluha
zalika bi'annallaha maulallazina amanu wa annal-kafirina la maula lahum
innallaha yudkhilullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtihal-an-har, wallazina kafaru yatamatta'una wa ya'kuluna kama ta'kulul-an'amu wan-naru maswal lahum
wa ka'ayyim ming qaryatin hiya asyaddu quwwatam ming qaryatikallati akhrajatk, ahlaknahum fa la nasira lahum
a fa mang kana 'ala bayyinatim mir rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu su'u 'amalihi wattaba'u ahwa'ahum

masalul-jannatillati wu'idal-muttaqun, fiha an-harum mim ma'in gairi asin, wa an-harum mil labanil lam yatagayyar ta'muh, wa an-harum min khamril lazzatil lisy-syaribin, wa an-harum min 'asalim musaffa, wa lahum fiha ming kullis-samarati wa magfiratum mir rabbihim, kaman huwa khalidun fin-nari wa suqu ma'an hamiman fa qatta'a am'a'ahum
wa min-hum may yastami'u ilaik, hatta iza kharaju min 'indika qalu lillazina utul-'ilma maza qala anifa, ula'ikallazina taba'allahu 'ala qulubihim wattaba'u ahwa'ahum
wallazinahtadau zadahum hudaw wa atahum taqwahum
fa hal yanzuruna illas-sa'ata an ta'tiyahum bagtah, fa qad ja'a asyratuha, fa anna lahum iza ja'at-hum zikrahum
fa'lam annahu la ilaha illallahu wastagfir lizambika wa lil-mu'minina wal-mu'minat, wallahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wa maswakum

wa yaqulullazina amanu lau la nuzzilat surah, fa iza unzilat suratum muhkamatuw wa zukira fihal-qitalu ra'aitallazina fi qulubihim maraduy yanzuruna ilaika nazaral-magsyiyyi 'alaihi minal-maut, fa aula lahum
ta'atuw wa qaulum ma'ruf, fa iza 'azamal-amr, falau sadaqullaha lakana khairal lahum
fa hal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidu fil-ardi wa tuqatti'u ar-hamakum
ula'ikallazina la'anahumullahu fa asammahum wa a'ma absarahum
a fa la yatadabbarunal-qur'ana am 'ala qulubin aqfaluha
innallazinartaddu 'ala adbarihim mim ba'di ma tabayyana lahumul-hudasy-syaitanu sawwala lahum, wa amla lahum
zalika bi'annahum qalu lillazina karihu ma nazzalallahu sanuti'ukum fi ba'dil-amr, wallahu ya'lamu israrahum
fa kaifa iza tawaffat-humul-mala'ikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa adbarahum
zalika bi'annahumuttaba'u ma askhatallaha wa karihu ridwanahu fa ahbata a'malahum
am hasiballazina fi qulubihim maradun al lay yukhrijallahu adganahum
walau nasya'u la'arainakahum fa la'araftahum bisimahum, wa lata'rifannahum fi lahnil-qaul, wallahu ya'lamu a'malakum
wa lanabluwannakum hatta na'lamal-mujahidina mingkum was-sabirina wa nabluwa akhbarakum
innallazina kafaru wa saddu 'an sabilillahi wa syaqqur-rasula mim ba'di ma tabayyana lahumul-huda lay yadurrullaha syai'a, wa sayuhbitu a'malahum
ya ayyuhallazina amanu ati'ullaha wa ati'ur-rasula wa la tubtilu a'malakum
innallazina kafaru wa saddu 'an sabilillahi summa matu wa hum kuffarun fa lay yagfirallahu lahum
fa la tahinu wa tad'u ilas-salmi wa antumul-a'laun, wallahu ma'akum wa lay yatirakum a'malakum
innamal-hayatud-dun-ya la'ibuw wa lahw, wa in tu'minu wa tattaqu yu'tikum ujurakum wa la yas'alkum amwalakum
iy yas'alkumuha fa yuhfikum tabkhalu wa yukhrij adganakum

ha'antum ha'ula'i tud'auna litunfiqu fi sabilillah, fa mingkum may yabkhal, wa may yabkhal fa innama yabkhalu 'an nafsih, wallahul-ganiyyu wa antumul-fuqara', wa in tatawallau yastabdil-qauman gairakum summa la yakunu amsalakum
inna fatahna laka fat-ham mubina
liyagfira lakallahu ma taqaddama min zambika wa ma ta'akhkhara wa yutimma ni'matahu 'alaika wa yahdiyaka siratam mustaqima
wa yansurakallahu nasran 'aziza
huwallazi anzalas-sakinata fi qulubil-mu'minina liyazdadu imanam ma'a imanihim, wa lillahi junudus-samawati wal-ard, wa kanallahu 'aliman hakima
liyudkhilal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati jannatin tajri min tahtihal-an-haru khalidina fiha wa yukaffira 'an-hum sayyi'atihim, wa kana zalika 'indallahi fauzan 'azima

wa yu'azzibal-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-musyrikina wal-musyrikatiz-zannina billahi zannas-sau', 'alaihim da'iratus-sau', wa gadiballahu 'alaihim wa la'anahum wa a'adda lahum jahannam, wa sa'at masira
wa lillahi junudus-samawati wal-ard, wa kanallahu 'azizan hakima
inna arsalnaka syahidaw wa mubasysyiraw wa nazira
litu'minu billahi wa rasulihi wa tu'azziruhu wa tuwaqqiruh, wa tusabbihuhu bukrataw wa asila
innallazina yubayi'unaka innama yubayi'unallah, yadullahi fauqa aidihim, fa man nakasa fa innama yangkusu 'ala nafsih, wa man aufa bima 'ahada 'alaihullaha fa sayu'tihi ajran 'azima

sayaqulu lakal-mukhallafuna minal-a'rabi syagalatna amwaluna wa ahluna fastagfir lana, yaquluna bi'alsinatihim ma laisa fi qulubihim, qul fa may yamliku lakum minallahi syai'an in arada bikum darran au arada bikum naf'a, bal kanallahu bima ta'maluna khabira
bal zanantum al lay yangqalibar-rasulu wal-mu'minuna ila ahlihim abadaw wa zuyyina zalika fi qulubikum wa zanantum zannas-sau', wa kuntum qaumam bura
wa mal lam yu'mim billahi wa rasulihi fa inna a'tadna lil-kafirina sa'ira
wa lillahi mulkus-samawati wal-ard, yagfiru limay yasya'u wa yu'azzibu may yasya', wa kanallahu gafurar rahima

sayaqulul-mukhallafuna izantalaqtum ila maganima lita'khuzuha zaruna nattabi'kum, yuriduna ay yubaddilu kalamallah, qul lan tattabi'una kazalikum qalallahu ming qabl, fa sayaquluna bal tahsudunana, bal kanu la yafqahuna illa qalila

qul lil-mukhallafina minal-a'rabi satud'auna ila qaumin uli ba'sin syadidin tuqatilunahum au yuslimun, fa in tuti'u yu'tikumullahu ajran hasana, wa in tatawallau kama tawallaitum ming qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaban alima
laisa 'alal-a'ma harajuw wa la 'alal-a'raji harajuw wa la 'alal-maridi haraj, wa may yuti'illaha wa rasulahu yudkhil-hu jannatin tajri min tahtihal-an-har, wa may yatawalla yu'azzib-hu 'azaban alima
laqad radiyallahu 'anil-mu'minina iz yubayi'unaka tahtasy-syajarati fa 'alima ma fi qulubihim fa anzalas-sakinata 'alaihim wa asabahum fat-hang qariba
wa maganima kasiratay ya'khuzunaha, wa kanallahu 'azizan hakima
wa 'adakumullahu maganima kasiratan ta'khuzunaha fa 'ajjala lakum hazihi wa kaffa aidiyan-nasi 'angkum, wa litakuna ayatal lil-mu'minina wa yahdiyakum siratam mustaqima
wa ukhra lam taqdiru 'alaiha qad ahatallahu biha, wa kanallahu 'ala kulli syai'ing qadira
walau qatalakumullazina kafaru lawallawul-adbara summa la yajiduna waliyyaw wa la nasira
sunnatallahillati qad khalat ming qabl, wa lan tajida lisunnatillahi tabdila
wa huwallazi kaffa aidiyahum 'angkum wa aidiyakum 'an-hum bibatni makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim, wa kanallahu bima ta'maluna basira

humullazina kafaru wa saddukum 'anil-masjidil-harami wal-hadya ma'kufan ay yabluga mahillah, walau la rijalum mu'minuna wa nisa'um mu'minatul lam ta'lamuhum an tata'uhum fa tusibakum min-hum ma'arratum bigairi 'ilm, liyudkhilallahu fi rahmatihi may yasya', lau tazayyalu la'azzabnallazina kafaru min-hum 'azaban alima

iz ja'alallazina kafaru fi qulubihimul-hamiyyata hamiyyatal-jahiliyyati fa anzalallahu sakinatahu 'ala rasulihi wa 'alal-mu'minina wa alzamahum kalimatat-taqwa wa kanu ahaqqa biha wa ahlaha, wa kanallahu bikulli syai'in 'alima

laqad sadaqallahu rasulahur-ru'ya bil-haqq, latadkhulunnal-masjidal-harama in sya'allahu aminina muhalliqina ru'usakum wa muqassirina la takhafun, fa 'alima ma lam ta'lamu fa ja'ala min duni zalika fat-hang qariba
huwallazi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wa dinil-haqqi liyuz-hirahu 'alad-dini kullih, wa kafa billahi syahida

muhammadur rasulullah, wallazina ma'ahu asyidda'u 'alal-kuffari ruhama'u bainahum tarahum rukka'an sujjaday yabtaguna fadlam minallahi wa ridwanan simahum fi wujuhihim min asaris-sujud, zalika masaluhum fit-taurati wa masaluhum fil-injil, kazar'in akhraja syat'ahu fa azarahu fastaglaza fastawa 'ala suqihi yu'jibuz-zurra'a liyagiza bihimul-kuffar, wa'adallahullazina amanu wa 'amilus-salihati min-hum magfirataw wa ajran 'azima
ya ayyuhallazina amanu la tuqaddimu baina yadayillahi wa rasulihi wattaqullah, innallaha sami'un 'alim
ya ayyuhallazina amanu la tarfa'u aswatakum fauqa sautin-nabiyyi wa la taj-haru lahu bil-qauli kajahri ba'dikum liba'din an tahbata a'malukum wa antum la tasy'urun
innallazina yagudduna aswatahum 'inda rasulillahi ula'ikallazinamtahanallahu qulubahum lit-taqwa, lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun 'azim
innallazina yunadunaka miw wara'il-hujurati aksaruhum la ya'qilun
walau annahum sabaru hatta takhruja ilaihim lakana khairal lahum, wallahu gafurur rahim
ya ayyuhallazina amanu in ja'akum fasiqum binaba'in fa tabayyanu an tusibu qaumam bijahalatin fa tusbihu 'ala ma fa'altum nadimin

wa'lamu anna fikum rasulallah, lau yuti'ukum fi kasirim minal-amri la'anittum wa lakinnallaha habbaba ilaikumul-imana wa zayyanahu fi qulubikum wa karraha ilaikumul-kufra wal-fusuqa wal-'isyan, ula'ika humur-rasyidun
fadlam minallahi wa ni'mah, wallahu 'alimun hakim

wa in ta'ifatani minal-mu'mininaqtatalu fa aslihu bainahuma, fa im bagat ihdahuma 'alal-ukhra fa qatilullati tabgi hatta tafi'a ila amrillah, fa in fa'at fa aslihu bainahuma bil-'adli wa aqsitu, innallaha yuhibbul-muqsitin
innamal-mu'minuna ikhwatun fa aslihu baina akhawaikum wattaqullaha la'allakum tur-hamun

ya ayyuhallazina amanu la yaskhar qaumum ming qaumin 'asa ay yakunu khairam min-hum wa la nisa'um min nisa'in 'asa ay yakunna khairam min-hunn, wa la talmizu anfusakum wa la tanabazu bil-alqab, bi'sa lismul-fusuqu ba'dal-iman, wa mal lam yatub fa ula'ika humuz-zalimun

ya ayyuhallazina amanujtanibu kasiram minaz-zanni inna ba'daz-zanni ismuw wa la tajassasu wa la yagtab ba'dukum ba'da, a yuhibbu ahadukum ay ya'kula lahma akhihi maitan fa karihtumuh, wattaqullah, innallaha tawwabur rahim
ya ayyuhan-nasu inna khalaqnakum min zakariw wa unsa wa ja'alnakum syu'ubaw wa qaba'ila lita'arafu, inna akramakum 'indallahi atqakum, innallaha 'alimun khabir
qalatil-a'rabu amanna, qul lam tu'minu wa laking qulu aslamna wa lamma yadkhulil-imanu fi qulubikum, wa in tuti'ullaha wa rasulahu la yalitkum min a'malikum syai'a, innallaha gafurur rahim
innamal-mu'minunallazina amanu billahi wa rasulihi summa lam yartabu wa jahadu bi'amwalihim wa anfusihim fi sabilillah, ula'ika humus-sadiqun
qul a tu'allimunallaha bidinikum, wallahu ya'lamu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard, wallahu bikulli syai'in 'alim
yamunnuna 'alaika an aslamu, qul la tamunnu 'alayya islamakum, balillahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadakum lil-imani ing kuntum sadiqin
innallaha ya'lamu gaibas-samawati wal-ard, wallahu basirum bima ta'malun
qaf, wal-qur'anil-majid
bal 'ajibu an ja'ahum munzirum min-hum fa qalal-kafiruna haza syai'un 'ajib
a iza mitna wa kunna turaba, zalika raj'um ba'id
qad 'alimna ma tangqusul-ardu min-hum, wa 'indana kitabun hafiz
bal kazzabu bil-haqqi lamma ja'ahum fa hum fi amrim marij
a fa lam yanzuru ilas-sama'i fauqahum kaifa banainaha wa zayyannaha wa ma laha min furuj
wal-arda madadnaha wa alqaina fiha rawasiya wa ambatna fiha ming kulli zaujim bahij
tabsirataw wa zikra likulli 'abdim munib
wa nazzalna minas-sama'i ma'am mubarakan fa ambatna bihi jannatiw wa habbal-hasid
wan-nakhla basiqatil laha tal'un nadid
rizqal lil-'ibadi wa ahyaina bihi baldatam maita, kazalikal-khuruj
kazzabat qablahum qaumu nuhiw wa as-habur-rassi wa samud
wa 'aduw wa fir'aunu wa ikhwanu lut
wa as-habul-aikati wa qaumu tubba', kullung kazzabar-rusula fa haqqa wa'id
a fa 'ayina bil-khalqil-awwal, bal hum fi labsim min khalqin jadid
wa laqad khalaqnal-insana wa na'lamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuh, wa nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil-warid
iz yatalaqqal-mutalaqqiyani 'anil-yamini wa 'anisy-syimali qa'id
ma yalfizu ming qaulin illa ladaihi raqibun 'atid
wa ja'at sakratul-mauti bil-haqq, zalika ma kunta min-hu tahid
wa nufikha fis-sur, zalika yaumul-wa'id
wa ja'at kullu nafsim ma'aha sa'iquw wa syahid
laqad kunta fi gaflatim min haza fa kasyafna 'angka gita'aka fa basarukal-yauma hadid
wa qala qarinuhu haza ma ladayya 'atid
alqiya fi jahannama kulla kaffarin 'anid
manna'il lil-khairi mu'tadim murib
allazi ja'ala ma'allahi ilahan akhara fa alqiyahu fil-'azabisy-syadid
qala qarinuhu rabbana ma atgaituhu wa laking kana fi dalalim ba'id
qala la takhtasimu ladayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bil-wa'id
ma yubaddalul-qaulu ladayya wa ma ana bizallamil lil-'abid
yauma naqulu lijahannama halimtala'ti wa taqulu hal mim mazid
wa uzlifatil-jannatu lil-muttaqina gaira ba'id
haza ma tu'aduna likulli awwabin hafiz
man khasyiyar-rahmana bil-gaibi wa ja'a biqalbim munib
udkhuluha bisalam, zalika yaumul-khulud
lahum ma yasya'una fiha wa ladaina mazid
wa kam ahlakna qablahum ming qarnin hum asyaddu min-hum batsyan fa naqqabu fil-bilad, hal mim mahis
inna fi zalika lazikra limang kana lahu qalbun au alqas-sam'a wa huwa syahid
wa laqad khalaqnas-samawati wal-arda wa ma bainahuma fi sittati ayyamiw wa ma massana mil lugub
fasbir 'ala ma yaquluna wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulu'isy-syamsi wa qablal-gurub
wa minal-laili fa sabbih-hu wa adbaras-sujud
wastami' yauma yunadil-munadi mim makaning qarib
yauma yasma'unas-saihata bil-haqq, zalika yaumul-khuruj
inna nahnu nuhyi wa numitu wa ilainal-masir
yauma tasyaqqaqul-ardu 'an-hum sira'a, zalika hasyrun 'alaina yasir
nahnu a'lamu bima yaquluna wa ma anta 'alaihim bijabbar, fazakkir bil-qur'ani may yakhafu wa'id
waz-zariyati zarwa
fal-hamilati wiqra
fal-jariyati yusra
fal-muqassimati amra
innama tu'aduna lasadiq
wa innad-dina lawaqi'
was-sama'i zatil-hubuk
innakum lafi qaulim mukhtalif
yu'faku 'an-hu man ufik
qutilal-kharrasun
allazina hum fi gamratin sahun
yas'aluna ayyana yaumud-din
yauma hum 'alan-nari yuftanun
zuqu fitnatakum, hazallazi kuntum bihi tasta'jilun
innal-muttaqina fi jannatiw wa 'uyun
akhizina ma atahum rabbuhum, innahum kanu qabla zalika muhsinin
kanu qalilam minal-laili ma yahja'un
wa bil-as-hari hum yastagfirun
wa fi amwalihim haqqul lis-sa'ili wal-mahrum
wa fil-ardi ayatul lil-muqinin
wa fi anfusikum, a fa la tubsirun
wa fis-sama'i rizqukum wa ma tu'adun
fa wa rabbis-sama'i wal-ardi innahu lahaqqum misla ma annakum tantiqun
hal ataka hadisu daifi ibrahimal-mukramin
iz dakhalu 'alaihi fa qalu salama, qala salam, qaumum mungkarun
fa raga ila ahlihi fa ja'a bi'ijlin samin
fa qarrabahu ilaihim, qala ala ta'kulun
fa aujasa min-hum khifah, qalu la takhaf, wa basysyaruhu bigulamin 'alim
fa aqbalatimra'atuhu fi sarratin fa sakkat waj-haha wa qalat 'ajuzun 'aqim
qalu kazaliki qala rabbuk, innahu huwal-hakimul-'alim
qala fa ma khatbukum ayyuhal-mursalun
qalu inna ursilna ila qaumim mujrimin
linursila 'alaihim hijaratam min tin
musawwamatan 'inda rabbika lil-musrifin
fa akhrajna mang kana fiha minal-mu'minin
fa ma wajadna fiha gaira baitim minal-muslimin
wa tarakna fiha ayatal lillazina yakhafunal-'azabal-alim
wa fi musa iz arsalnahu ila fir'auna bisultanim mubin
fa tawalla biruknihi wa qala sahirun au majnun
fa akhaznahu wa junudahu fa nabaznahum fil-yammi wa huwa mulim
wa fi 'adin iz arsalna 'alaihimur-rihal-'aqim
ma tazaru min syai'in atat 'alaihi illa ja'alat-hu kar-ramim
wa fi samuda iz qila lahum tamatta'u hatta hin
fa 'atau 'an amri rabbihim fa akhazat-humus-sa'iqatu wa hum yanzurun
fa mastata'u ming qiyamiw wa ma kanu muntasirin
wa qauma nuhim ming qabl, innahum kanu qauman fasiqin
was-sama'a banainaha bi'aidiw wa inna lamusi'un
wal-arda farasynaha fa ni'mal-mahidun
wa ming kulli syai'in khalaqna zaujaini la'allakum tazakkarun
fa firru ilallah, inni lakum min-hu nazirum mubin
wa la taj'alu ma'allahi ilahan akhar, inni lakum min-hu nazirum mubin
kazalika ma atallazina ming qablihim mir rasulin illa qalu sahirun au majnun
a tawasau bih, bal hum qaumun tagun
fa tawalla 'an-hum fa ma anta bimalum
wa zakkir fa innaz-zikra tanfa'ul-mu'minin
wa ma khalaqtul-jinna wal-insa illa liya'budun
ma uridu min-hum mir rizqiw wa ma uridu ay yut'imun
innallaha huwar-razzaqu zul-quwwatil-matin
fa inna lillazina zalamu zanubam misla zanubi as-habihim fa la yasta'jilun
fa wailul lillazina kafaru miy yaumihimullazi yu'adun
wat-tur
wa kitabim mastur
fi raqqim mansyur
wal-baitil-ma'mur
was-saqfil-marfu'
wal-bahril-masjur

ma lahu min dafi'
yauma tamurus-sama'u maura

allazina hum fi khaudiy yal'abun
yauma yuda''una ila nari jahannama da''a
hazihin-narullati kuntum biha tukazzibun
a fa sihrun haza am antum la tubsirun
islauha fasbiru au la tasbiru, sawa'un 'alaikum, innama tujzauna ma kuntum ta'malun
innal-muttaqina fi jannatiw wa na'im
fakihina bima atahum rabbuhum, wa waqahum rabbuhum 'azabal-jahim
kulu wasyrabu hani'am bima kuntum ta'malun
muttaki'ina 'ala sururim masfufah, wa zawwajnahum bihurin 'in
wallazina amanu wattaba'at-hum zurriyyatuhum bi'imanin alhaqna bihim zurriyyatahum wa ma alatnahum min 'amalihim min syai', kullumri'im bima kasaba rahin
wa amdadnahum bifakihatiw wa lahmim mimma yasytahun
yatanaza'una fiha ka'sal la lagwun fiha wa la ta'sim
wa yatufu 'alaihim gilmanul lahum ka'annahum lu'lu'um maknun
wa aqbala ba'duhum 'ala ba'diy yatasa'alun
qalu inna kunna qablu fi ahlina musyfiqin
fa mannallahu 'alaina wa waqana 'azabas-samum
inna kunna ming qablu nad'uh, innahu huwal-barrur-rahim
fa zakkir fa ma anta bini'mati rabbika bikahiniw wa la majnun
am yaquluna sya'irun natarabbasu bihi raibal-manun
qul tarabbasu fa inni ma'akum minal-mutarabbisin
am ta'muruhum ahlamuhum bihaza am hum qaumun tagun
am yaquluna taqawwalah, bal la yu'minun
falya'tu bihadisim mislihi ing kanu sadiqin
am khuliqu min gairi syai'in am humul-khaliqun
am khalaqus-samawati wal-ard, bal la yuqinun
am 'indahum khaza'inu rabbika am humul-musaitirun
am lahum sullamuy yastami'una fih, falya'ti mustami'uhum bisultanim mubin
am lahul-banatu wa lakumul-banun

am 'indahumul-gaibu fa hum yaktubun

am lahum ilahun gairullah, sub-hanallahi 'amma yusyrikun
wa iy yarau kisfam minas-sama'i saqitay yaqulu sahabum markum
fazar-hum hatta yulaqu yaumahumullazi fihi yus'aqun
yauma la yugni 'an-hum kaiduhum syai'aw wa la hum yunsarun

wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa innaka bi'a'yunina wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika hina taqum
wa minal-laili fa sabbih-hu wa idbaran-nujum

kazzabas samudu bin-nuzur
fa qalu abasyaram minna wahidan nattabi'uhu inna izal lafi dalaliw wa su'ur
a ulqiyaz-zikru 'alaihi mim bainina bal huwa kazzabun asyir
saya'lamuna gadam manil-kazzabul-asyir
inna mursilun-naqati fitnatal lahum fartaqib-hum wastabir
wa nabbi'hum annal-ma'a qismatum bainahum, kullu syirbim muhtadar
fa nadau sahibahum fa ta'ata fa 'aqar
fa kaifa kana 'azabi wa nuzur
inna arsalna 'alaihim saihataw wahidatan fa kanu kahasyimil-muhtazir
wa laqad yassarnal-qur'ana liz-zikri fa hal mim muddakir
kazzabat qaumu lutim bin-nuzur
inna arsalna 'alaihim hasiban illa ala lut, najjainahum bisahar
ni'matam min 'indina, kazalika najzi man syakar
wa laqad anzarahum batsyatana fa tamarau bin-nuzur
wa laqad rawaduhu 'an daifihi fa tamasna a'yunahum fa zuqu 'azabi wa nuzur
wa laqad sabbahahum bukratan 'azabum mustaqirr
fa zuqu 'azabi wa nuzur
wa laqad yassarnal-qur'ana liz-zikri fa hal mim muddakir
wa laqad ja'a ala fir'aunan-nuzur
kazzabu bi'ayatina kulliha fa'akhaznahum akhza 'azizim muqtadir
a kuffarukum khairum min ula'ikum am lakum bara'atun fiz-zubur
am yaquluna nahnu jami'um muntasir
sayuhzamul-jam'u wa yuwallunad-dubur
balis-sa'atu mau'iduhum was-sa'atu ad-ha wa amarr
innal-mujrimina fi dalaliw wa su'ur
yauma yus-habuna fin-nari 'ala wujuhihim, zuqu massa saqar
inna kulla syai'in khalaqnahu biqadar
wa ma amruna illa wahidatung kalam-him bil-basar
wa laqad ahlakna asy-ya'akum fa hal mim muddakir
wa kullu syai'in fa'aluhu fiz-zubur
wa kullu sagiriw wa kabirim mustatar
innal-muttaqina fi jannatiw wa nahar
fi maq'adi sidqin 'inda malikim muqtadir
ar-rahman
'allamal-qur'an
khalaqal-insan
'allamahul-bayan
asy-syamsu wal-qamaru bihusban
wan-najmu wasy-syajaru yasjudan
was-sama'a rafa'aha wa wada'al-mizan
alla tatgau fil-mizan
wa aqimul-wazna bil-qisti wa la tukhsirul-mizan
wal-arda wada'aha lil-anam
fiha fakihatuw wan-nakhlu zatul-akmam
wal-habbu zul-'asfi war-raihan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
khalaqal-insana min salsaling kal-fakhkhar
wa khalaqal-janna mim marijim min nar
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
rabbul-masyriqaini wa rabbul-magribain
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
marajal-bahraini yaltaqiyan

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
yakhruju min-humal-lu'lu'u wal-marjan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
wa lahul-jawaril-munsya'atu fil-bahri kal-a'lam
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
kullu man 'alaiha fan

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
sanafrugu lakum ayyuhas-saqalan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
ya ma'syaral-jinni wal-insi inistata'tum an tanfuzu min aqtaris-samawati wal-ardi fanfuzu, la tanfuzuna illa bisultan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
yursalu 'alaikuma syuwazum min nariw wa nuhasun fa la tantasiran
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
fa izansyaqqatis-sama'u fa kanat wardatang kad-dihan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
fa yauma'izil la yus'alu 'an zambihi insuw wa la jann
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
yu'raful-mujrimuna bisimahum fa yu'khazu bin-nawasi wal-aqdam
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

yatufuna bainaha wa baina hamimin an
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
zawata afnan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

muttaki'ina 'ala furusyim bata'inuha min istabraq, wa janal-jannataini dan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
fihinna qasiratut-tarfi lam yatmis-hunna insung qablahum wa la jann
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
ka'annahunnal-yaqutu wal-marjan
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

fihinna khairatun hisan

hurum maqsuratun fil-khiyam
fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban

fa bi'ayyi ala'i rabbikuma tukazziban
muttaki'ina 'ala rafrafin khudriw wa 'abqariyyin hisan

tabarakasmu rabbika zil-jalali wal-ikram
iza waqa'atil-waqi'ah
laisa liwaq'atiha kazibah
khafidatur rafi'ah
iza rujjatil-ardu rajja
wa bussatil-jibalu bassa
fa kanat haba'am mumbassa
wa kuntum azwajan salasah
fa as-habul-maimanati ma as-habul-maimanah
wa as-habul-masy'amati ma as-habul-masy'amah
was-sabiqunas-sabiqun
ula'ikal-muqarrabun
fi jannatin-na'im

'ala sururim maudunah
muttaki'ina 'alaiha mutaqabilin
yatufu 'alaihim wildanum mukhalladun
bi'akwabiw wa abariqa wa ka'sim mim ma'in
la yusadda'una 'an-ha wa la yunzifun

wa lahmi tairim mimma yasytahun
wa hurun 'in

jaza'am bima kanu ya'malun
la yasma'una fiha lagwaw wa la ta'sima
illa qilan salaman salama
wa as-habul-yamini ma as-habul-yamin
fi sidrim makhdud
wa tal-him mandud

wa fakihating kasirah
la maqtu'atiw wa la mamnu'ah
wa furusyim marfu'ah
inna ansya'nahunna insya'a
fa ja'alnahunna abkara
'uruban atraba
li'as-habil-yamin
sullatum minal-awwalin
wa sullatum minal-akhirin

fi samumiw wa hamim
wa zillim miy yahmum
la baridiw wa la karim
innahum kanu qabla zalika mutrafin
wa kanu yusirruna 'alal-hinsil-'azim
wa kanu yaquluna a iza mitna wa kunna turabaw wa 'izaman a inna lamab'usun
a wa aba'unal-awwalun
qul innal-awwalina wal-akhirin
lamajmu'una ila miqati yaumim ma'lum
summa innakum ayyuhad-dallunal-mukazzibun
la'akiluna min syajarim min zaqqum
fa mali'una min-hal-butun
fa syaribuna 'alaihi minal-hamim
fa syaribuna syurbal-him
haza nuzuluhum yaumad-din
nahnu khalaqnakum falau la tusaddiqun
a fa ra'aitum ma tumnun
a antum takhluqunahu am nahnul-khaliqun
nahnu qaddarna bainakumul-mauta wa ma nahnu bimasbuqin
'ala an nubaddila amsalakum wa nunsyi'akum fi ma la ta'lamun
wa laqad 'alimtumun-nasy'atal-ula falau la tazakkarun
a fa ra'aitum ma tahrusun
a antum tazra'unahu am nahnuz-zari'un
lau nasya'u laja'alnahu hutaman fa zaltum tafakkahun
inna lamugramun
bal nahnu mahrumun
a fa ra'aitumul-ma'allazi tasyrabun
a antum anzaltumuhu minal-muzni am nahnul-munzilun
lau nasya'u ja'alnahu ujajan falau la tasykurun
a fa ra'aitumun-narallati turun
a antum ansya'tum syajarataha am nahnul-munsyi'un
nahnu ja'alnaha tazkirataw wa mata'al lil-muqwin
fa sabbih bismi rabbikal-'azim
fa la uqsimu bimawaqi'in-nujum
wa innahu laqasamul lau ta'lamuna 'azim
innahu laqur'anung karim
fi kitabim maknun
la yamassuhu illal-mutahharun
tanzilum mir rabbil-'alamin
a fa bihazal-hadisi antum mud-hinun

falau la ing kuntum gaira madinin
tarji'unaha ing kuntum sadiqin
fa amma ing kana minal-muqarrabin
fa rauhuw wa raihanuw wa jannatu na'im
wa amma ing kana min as-habil-yamin
fa salamul laka min as-habil-yamin
wa amma ing kana minal-mukazzibinad-dallin
fa nuzulum min hamim
